1<?php
2App::uses('shippingPaymentMatrix','Lib');
3App::uses('Sanitize', 'Utility');
4
5class AccountController extends AppController {
6    public $uses = array(
7        'User',
8        'UsersEmailConfirm',

20        'TextbookSalesCategoryItem',
21        'FileStorage',
22        'Timezone',
23        'Country',
24        'Nationality',
25        'UserVersantTin',
26        'ComplimentaryCode',
27        'UsersCoupon',
28        'UsersCouponV1',
29        'Currency',
30        'Corporate',
31        'PaymentPlanPrice',
32        'CorporateDiscountRate',
33        'NativeOption',
34        'FamilyPlanList',
35        'TeacherCoinBox',
36        'MailmagaCategoriesOptoutUser',
37        'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt',
38        'CoinBox',
39        'UsersRegistrationQuestion',
40        'PhoneVerifyCheckLog',
41        'PhoneVerifyLog',
42        'CountryCode',
43        'CampaignMaster',
44        'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt',
45        'generatePDF',
46        'downloadBatchRecieptPdf',
47        'CorporatesPaymentReceivable',
48        'HeyNCUser',
49        'UserRegistrationStatus',
50        'UserAccessToken',
51        'UserDiscountOptionsTerm',
52        'DiscountOptionsPrice',
53        'UsersDetail'
54    );
55    public $components = array('Image', 'Paginator');
56
57    public function beforeFilter() {
58        
59        parent::beforeFilter();
60        $this->Auth->allow(array(
61            'receipt',
62            'receipt_batch',
63            'saveBatchReceipt',
64            'loadMoreData',
65            'lessonCertificate',
66            'updateNicknameAjax',
67            'checkAllReceipt',
68            'changePassComplete'
69        ));
70        App::uses('GoogleCalendar','Lib');
71    }
72
73    /**
74     * @apiDefine AccountControllerIndex
75     * 
76     * @apiBody {Object} UserImage User's image upload object.
77     * @apiBody {Number} User.id User's unique id.
78     * @apiBody {String} User.nickname User's nickname.
79     * @apiBody {String} gender User's gender.
80     * @apiBody {String} birthday User's birthday.
81     * @apiBody {Number} byear User's birthday year.
82     * @apiBody {Number} bmonth User's birthday month.
83     * @apiBody {Number} bday User's birthday day.
84     * @apiBody {String} native_language User's native language.
85     * @apiBody {String} magazine_notification User's magazine flag.
86     * @apiBody {Object} user User object that contains the notification and profile settings to update.
87     * @apiBody {Number} user.reserve_lesson_schedule_notification Notification for lesson schedule reservation.
88     * @apiBody {Number} user.google_calendar_flag Flag for Google Calendar integration.
89     * @apiBody {Number} user.five_mins_lesson_reservation_notification Notification for lessons starting in 5 minutes.
90     * @apiBody {Number} user.lesson_reservation_cancel_notification Notification for lesson reservation cancellations.
91     * @apiBody {Number} user.comment_own_topic_flg Flag for notifications on user's own topics.
92     * @apiBody {Number} user.topic_user_comment_flg Flag for notifications on other users' comments in topics.
93     * @apiBody {Number} user.error_mail_flg Flag for receiving error email notifications.
94     * @apiBody {Number} user.premium_coin_purchase_flg Flag for premium coin purchases.
95     * @apiBody {String} user.occupation User's occupation.
96     * @apiBody {Number} user.bdayShowFlg Flag for showing the user's birthday.
97     * @apiBody {Number} user.genderShowFlg Flag for showing the user's gender.
98     * @apiBody {Number} user.nationalityShowFlg Flag for showing the user's nationality.
99     * @apiBody {Number} user.residenceShowFlg Flag for showing the user's residence.
100     * @apiBody {Number} user.nationality User's nationality ID.
101     * @apiBody {Number} user.residence User's residence ID.
102     * @apiBody {Number} user.dailyLevelDisclosureFlg Flag for disclosing the daily level of speaking tests.
103     * @apiBody {Object} user.enquate4 JSON object for user enquate data.
104     * @apiBody {Number} user.network_review_flg Flag for network review participation.
105     * @apiBody {Number} user.textbook_review_flg Flag for textbook review participation.
106     * @apiBody {Number} user.teacher_review_flg Flag for teacher review participation.
107     * @apiBody {Number} user.next_textbook_flg Flag for reviewing the next textbook.
108     * @apiBody {Number} user.lesson_review_flg Flag for lesson reviews.
109     * @apiBody {Number} user.cancellation_notice_flg Flag for receiving cancellation notices.
110     * @apiBody {Number} user.show_appreciation_flg Flag for showing appreciation.
111     * @apiBody {Number} user.display_appreciation_message_flg Flag for displaying appreciation messages.
112     * @apiBody {Number} user.automatic_confirmation_flg Flag for automatic confirmation.
113     * @apiBody {Number} user.mail_coupon_delivery Mail coupon delivery flag.
114     * 
115     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} hasAnnualDiscountOptionData Whether the user has an annual discount option (0 or 1).
116     * @apiSuccess {String} discountOptionName Name of the discount option the user is currently subscribed to.
117     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} annualDiscountOptionInUse Indicates if the annual discount option is in use (true or false).
118     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} showOptionLink Whether to show the discount option link to the user.
119     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} showWelcomeModal Indicates if the welcome modal should be displayed (0 or 1).
120     * @apiSuccess {String} showWelcomeModalName Name of the welcome modal trigger.
121     * @apiSuccess {Number} welcomeBonusCoin Amount of bonus coin the user receives upon welcome back.
122     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} userLocationSharingFlg User's location sharing flag (0 or 1).
123     * @apiSuccess {String} localizeDir User's localization direction (language).
124     * @apiSuccess {Number} timeDiffSecond User's time difference in seconds.
125     * @apiSuccess {String} userTimezone User's current timezone label.
126     * @apiSuccess {Object} userNickNameChangeData Data related to user's nickname change.
127     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} telecomUserFlg Indicates if the user is a telecom user (0 or 1).
128     * @apiSuccess {Object} heyncUser HeyNC user data.
129     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} userAutomaticConfirmationFlg Indicates if the user has automatic confirmation enabled (true or false).
130     * @apiSuccess {Object} referrer The referrer information.
131     * @apiSuccess {Object} data Contains user details including complimentary plan expiry date and remaining lessons.
132     * @apiSuccess {Object} usersPoint User's point information.
133     * @apiSuccess {Array} timezone_list List of timezones with DST.
134     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} corpUserCanChangeCard Indicates if corporate individual user can change card.
135     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} corporateCompanyPayment Indicates if corporate company payment can change card.
136     * @apiSuccess {String} nextChargeDate Next charge date, if applicable.
137     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} telecomUserFlg Telecom user flag.
138     * @apiSuccess {String} invite_link Referral link for the user.
139     * @apiSuccess {Array} nationalityLists List of nationalities.
140     * @apiSuccess {Array} residenceList List of countries for residence.
141     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} familyManagementFlg Family management flag.
142     * @apiSuccess {Number} versantTinCount Count of user's Versant TINs.
143     * @apiSuccess {Object} availableCoupon Available coupons for the user.
144     * @apiSuccess {Array} allowedLanguages Allowed languages for the user.
145     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} showResumePlanLink Indicates if resume plan link is shown for failed users.
146     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} studentNicknameSettingFlg Student nickname setting flag for corporate users.
147     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} studentEmailSettingFlg Student email setting flag for corporate users.
148     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} apprFamilyFlg Appreciation Family flag for family plan users.
149     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} apprCantPurchaseCoin Indicates if appreciation coin purchase is disabled.
150     * @apiSuccess {String} symbol The coupon symbol based on user's currency code.
151     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} nativeOptionManageFlg Native option management flag.
152     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} callanOptionManageFlg Callan option management flag.
153     * @apiSuccess {Object} nativeOptionData Data for native option management.
154     * @apiSuccess {Object} callanOptionData Data for Callan option management.
155     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} displayPremiumCoinPurchase Indicates if premium coin purchase is displayed.
156     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} allowPremiumCoinPurchaseFlg Indicates if premium coin purchase is allowed.
157     * @apiSuccess {String} dailyEnglishTestLevel The user's English test level.
158     * @apiSuccess {String} dailyEnglishTestDateTaken Date when the user took the English test.
159     * @apiSuccess {Array} countryCodes List of country codes for phone verification.
160     * @apiSuccess {Number} countTotalVerify Count of total SMS verifications.
161     * @apiSuccess {Array} noNextTextbookModal List of plans that do not show the next textbook modal.
162     * @apiSuccess {Object} litePlanDataUser Lite plan data for the user.
163     * @apiSuccess {String} google_access_token Google access token for the user.
164     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} automatic_confirmation_flg Automatic confirmation flag for the user.
165     *
166     * @apiError {Object} UserData Object not found.
167     */
168
169    /**
170     * @api {post} /account index()
171     * @apiName account
172     * @apiGroup Account
173     * 
174     * @apiUse AccountControllerIndex
175     * @apiSampleRequest off
176     */
177    /**
178     * @api {get} /account/:referrer index()
179     * @apiName referrer
180     * @apiGroup Account
181     * 
182     * @apiParam {String} referrer User's referrer.
183     * 
184     * @apiUse AccountControllerIndex
185     * @apiSampleRequest off
186     */
187    /**
188     * @api {get} /:language/account/:referrer index()
189     * @apiName language_account_referrer
190     * @apiGroup Account
191     * 
192     * @apiParam {String} referrer User's referrer.
193     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
194     * 
195     * @apiUse AccountControllerIndex
196     * @apiSampleRequest off
197     */
198    /**
199     * @api {get} /:language/account index()
200     * @apiName language_account
201     * @apiGroup Account
202     * 
203     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
204     * 
205     * @apiUse AccountControllerIndex
206     * @apiSampleRequest off
207     */
208    public function index(){    
209
210        # remove corporate sms authentication sessions
211        $this->Session->delete('corp_user_authenticated');
212        $this->Session->delete('corpLoggedUser');
213        $this->Session->delete('corpTeachersID');
214        $this->Session->delete('corpLoginCs');
215        $this->Session->delete('corpLoginMobappCs');
216
217        //get the data of the login user
218        $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
219
220        // get user annual discount option term
221        $discountOptionTermData = $this->UserDiscountOptionsTerm->getTerm([
222            'user_id' => $userData['User']['id'],
223            'status' => 1
224        ]);
225        $zeroStudentDiscountOptionId = Configure::read('discount_option.zero_student.plan_id');
226        $paymentPlans = Configure::read('payment_plans');
227        $userDataObj = new UserTable($userData['User']);
228        $membershipType = $userDataObj->getMembershipTypeIndex();
229
230        $discountOptionName = '';
231        $annualDiscountOptionInUse = false;
232        $showOptionLink = false;
233
234
235        if ($userDataObj->currency_code == Configure::read('currency_jpy') && $this->localizeDir == Configure::read('default.user_language')) {
236            if (
237                $discountOptionTermData && 
238                !in_array($userDataObj->payment_plan_id, [$paymentPlans['light_plan_free'], $paymentPlans['light_plan']]) && 
239                $discountOptionTermData['discount_option_id'] != Configure::read('discount_option.zero_student.plan_id')
240            ) {
241                $showOptionLink = true;
242                $discountOptionName = $discountOptionTermData['discount_option_name'];
243                
244                if ($discountOptionTermData['discount_option_id'] == Configure::read('discount_option.annual.id')) {
245                    $annualDiscountOptionInUse = true;
246                }
247            } elseif (in_array($membershipType, Configure::read('membership_type_lightplan'))) {
248                // get zero student discount option data
249                $zeroStudentDiscountOptionData = $this->DiscountOptionsPrice->getPaymentData([
250                    'currencyCode' => $userDataObj->currency_code,
251                    'discountOptionId' => Configure::read('discount_option.zero_student.plan_id')
252                ]);
253
254                $discountOptionName = isset($zeroStudentDiscountOptionData['discount_option_name']) ? $zeroStudentDiscountOptionData['discount_option_name'] : '';
255    
256                if (
257                    $zeroStudentDiscountOptionData &&
258                    (
259                        (isset($userData['UsersDetail']['show_zero_student_discount_option_flg']) && $userData['UsersDetail']['show_zero_student_discount_option_flg']) ||
260                        !isset($userData['UsersDetail']['show_zero_student_discount_option_flg'])
261                    )
262                ) {
263                    $showOptionLink = true;
264                }
265
266
267                if ($discountOptionTermData && $discountOptionTermData['discount_option_id'] == Configure::read('discount_option.zero_student.plan_id')) {
268                    $showOptionLink = true;
269                // if user has completed the zero student discount option
270                } elseif ($this->UserDiscountOptionsTerm->isCompletedTerm(['userId' => $userData['User']['id'], 'discountOptionId' => Configure::read('discount_option.zero_student.plan_id')])) {
271                    $showOptionLink = false;
272                    $discountOptionName = '';
273                }
274            } 
275        }
276        //TODO NJ-15759: used for new withdrawal process
277        $this->Session->write('newProcessWithdrawalType', myTools::newProcessWithdrawalType($userDataObj->getMembershipTypeIndex()));
278
279        // check user annual discount option
280        $annualDiscountOptionData = $this->UserDiscountOptionsTerm->getTerm([
281            'user_id' => $userData['User']['id'],
282            'discount_option_id' => Configure::read('discount_option.annual.plan_id'),
283            'status' => 1
284        ]);
285
286        $hasAnnualDiscountOptionData = 0;
287
288        if ($annualDiscountOptionData) {
289            $hasAnnualDiscountOptionData = 1;
290        }
291
292        $this->set('hasAnnualDiscountOptionData', $hasAnnualDiscountOptionData);
293
294        //TODO NJ-15759: used for new withdrawal process
295        $this->Session->write('newProcessWithdrawalType', myTools::newProcessWithdrawalType($userDataObj->getMembershipTypeIndex()));
296
297        $this->set('discountOptionName', $discountOptionName);
298        $this->set('annualDiscountOptionInUse', $annualDiscountOptionInUse);
299        $this->set('showOptionLink', $showOptionLink);
300        
301        if($this->RequestHandler->isMobile()) {
302            return $this->spIndex();
303        }
304        $this->set('headtext', Configure::read('my.meta.account-index.headtext'));
305        $referrer = $this->params['referrer'];
306
307        //get the data of the login user
308        $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
309        $userLocationSharingFlg = (isset($userData['User']['location_sharing_flg']) && $userData['User']['location_sharing_flg']) ? 1 : 0;
310        $this->set('userLocationSharingFlg', $userLocationSharingFlg);
311
312        $this->set('localizeDir', $this->localizeDir);
313
314        // - NJ-23812 : support start display welcome modal
315        $showWelcomeModal = 0;
316        $showWelcomeModalName = "trigger_modal_welcome_home";// the name of the modal trigger
317        $checkShowWelcomeModal = $this->Session->read('show_welcome_back_modal');
318        $welcomeBonusCoin = 0;
319
320        if ($checkShowWelcomeModal) {
321
322            // - delete the session
323            $this->Session->delete('show_welcome_back_modal');
324
325            $showWelcomeModal = 1;
326
327            // - check if complimentary user 
328            $_isCompUser = (isset($userData['User']['complimentary_code']) && $userData['User']['complimentary_code'] ? true : false);
329
330            $_isFromRegisterPayment = $userData['is_register_card'] ?? false;
331
332            // - change the  trigger button name if  complimentary users
333            if ($_isCompUser && $_isFromRegisterPayment) {
334                $showWelcomeModalName = "trigger_modal_complete_register";
335            }
336
337            // - fetch bonus coin from the session
338            $welcomeBonusCoin = $checkShowWelcomeModal['auth_bonus_coin'] ?? 0;
339        }
340
341        // check session welcome mod
342        $this->set('showWelcomeModal',$showWelcomeModal);
343        $this->set('showWelcomeModalName',$showWelcomeModalName);
344        $this->set('welcomeBonusCoin',$welcomeBonusCoin);
345
346        // - NJ-23812 : support end display welcome modal 
347
348
349        //query timezone data
350        $this->Timezone->openDBReplica();
351        $timezoneData = $this->Timezone->find('first', array(
352            'fields' => array(
353                'Timezone.continent_id',
354                'Timezone.city_eng'
355            ),
356            'conditions' => array('Timezone.id' => $userData['User']['timezone_id'])
357        ));
358        $this->Timezone->closeDBReplica();
359
360        //set params 
361        $params = array(
362                'continent_id' => $timezoneData['Timezone']['continent_id'],
363                'city' => $timezoneData['Timezone']['city_eng']
364            );
365
366        //get user time difference for mobapp
367        $userTimeDiff = $this->Timezone->getTimeDiff(
368            array(
369                'id' => $userData['User']['timezone_id']
370            )
371        );
372
373        //compute to seconds
374        $userTimeDiffSecond = $userTimeDiff * 60;
375        $userTimezoneLabel = $this->Timezone->getTimezoneName($userData['User']['timezone_id']);
376        $userNickNameChangeData = $this->userNickNameChangeData();
377
378        $this->set('userNickNameChangeData', $userNickNameChangeData);
379        $this->set('timeDiffSecond', $userTimeDiffSecond);
380        $this->set('userTimezone', $userTimezoneLabel);
381        $this->set('enquate4_options', UserTable::getEnquate4());
382        if (!empty($userData['User']['charge_flg']) && $userData['User']['charge_flg']==1) {
383            App::uses('telecomcheckout','Vendor');
384            $telecom = new telecomcheckout();
385            $this->set('telecom_change_member_form', $telecom->getChangeMemberForm($userData['User']['hash16']));
386        }
387
388        //カード変更を促す為、テレコムユーザにフラグを持たせる。
389        $telecomUserFlg = 0;
390        if((int)$userData['User']['charge_flg'] === 1 && (int)$userData['User']['card_company'] === 0 && (int)$userData['User']['fail_flg'] === 0){

392        }
393
394        // NJ-18785
395        $heyncUser = $this->HeyNCUser->getDataByUserId($this->Auth->User('id'));
396        $heyncUser = isset($heyncUser['HeyNCUser']) ? $heyncUser['HeyNCUser'] : array();
397        $this->set('heyncUser', $heyncUser);
398
399        //TODO NJ-37295: check if user already has automatic confirmation flg in the users detail table
400        $userAutomaticConfirmationFlg = isset($userData['UsersDetail']) && !empty($userData['UsersDetail']['automatic_confirmation_flg']) ? true : false;
401
402        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
403
404            if (array_key_exists('UserImage', $this->request->data)) {
405                $this->changeImage();
406            }
407
408            $this->request->data['User']['id'] = $this->Auth->user('id');
409            $this->User->set($this->request->data);
410
411            if($this->User->validates()){
412                $data = $this->request->data;
413                $user = $data['User'];
414                $birthday = null;
415                $bdayShowFlg = 1;
416
417                if (isset($this->request->data['User']['nickname'])) {
418                    // NC-1656: disable update for nickname
419                    /*$this->User->set(array('nickname' => $user['nickname']));*/
420                } else {
421                    $this->User->set('gender',(isset($user['gender']) ? $user['gender'] : $userData['User']['gender']));
422                    if (isset($user['birthday'])) {
423                        $birthday = UserTable::setBirthday($user['birthday'], true);
424                        $this->User->set('birthday', $birthday);
425                    } else {
426                        if (!empty($user['byear']) && !empty($user['bmonth']) && !empty($user['bday'])) {
427                            $birthday = $user['byear']."-".$user['bmonth']."-".$user['bday'];
428                            $birthday = date("Y-m-d", strtotime($birthday));
429                            $this->User->set('birthday', $birthday);
430                        }
431                    }
432
433                    //check if not in family plan
434                    $_userObj = new UserTable($this->sharedUserData['User']);
435                    $_userMemIndex = $_userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex();
436                    
437                    // NJ-45455: calculate age and set kid_ui_flg if user is 13 years old or younger
438                    if ($birthday) {
439                        // Calculate age
440                        $age = myTools::getAge($birthday);
441                        // Check if user is a kid (under 13 years old)
442                        $kidUiFlag = ($age < 13) && myTools::checkKidsPlans($_userObj) ? 1 : 0;
443                    
444                        // Update UsersDetail
445                        $this->UsersDetail->clear();
446                        $this->UsersDetail->set(array(
447                            'user_id' => $this->Auth->user('id'),
448                            'kid_ui_flg' => $kidUiFlag
449                        ));
450                        $this->UsersDetail->validate = [];
451                        $this->UsersDetail->save();
452                    }
453
454                    $_appreciationSupportedMembership = Configure::read("appreciation.supported_membership_type");
455                    $_userPaymentPlan = $this->sharedUserData['User']['payment_plan_id'];
456
457                    $_appreciationSupportedMembership = Configure::read("appreciation.payment_plan_id");
458                    $_appreciationFamilyPlan = Configure::read('appreciation.can_coin_purchase_check');
459
460                    //NJ-7548 : check if there is changes in the birthdate
461                    //check if allowed appreciation member and not family plan
462                    if (
463                        $userData['User']['birthday'] != $birthday && 
464                        in_array($_userPaymentPlan, $_appreciationSupportedMembership) && 
465                        !in_array($_userPaymentPlan,$_appreciationFamilyPlan)
466                    ) {
467                        
468                        //set the show appreciation flag
469                        $showAppreciationFlg = UserTable::setUpdatedShowAppFlag($_userPaymentPlan,$birthday);

472                        $this->User->set('show_appreciation_flg', $showAppreciationFlg);
473                        //default value for allow FLAG for eligible membership types
474                        $this->User->set('allow_appreciation_flg', 1);
475                    }
476

478                    if ($userData['User']['birthday'] != $birthday) {
479                        $this->User->set('display_appreciation_message_flg', 1);
480                        $this->User->set('allow_appreciation_message_flg', 1);
481                    }
482                    
483                    if (isset($user['native_language'])) {
484                        $this->User->set('native_language', $user['native_language']);
485                    } else {
486                        if($userData['User']['native_language'] != NULL){
487                            $this->User->set('native_language', $userData['User']['native_language']);
488                        }
489                    }
490
491                    if (isset($user['magazine_notification'])) {
492                        $this->User->set('magazine_flg', $user['magazine_notification']);
493                    } else {
494                        if($userData['User']['magazine_flg'] != NULL){
495                            $this->User->set('magazine_flg', $userData['User']['magazine_flg']);
496                        }
497                    }
498

501                    } else {

600                    }

603                    }

605

609                    }

614                    }

616
617                // NJ-7978: additional spec
618                $tcbParams = array('user_id' => $this->Auth->user('id'));
619                if (isset($user['show_appreciation_flg']) && $user['show_appreciation_flg'] == 0) {
620                    $tcbParams['appreciation_field'] = 1;
621                    $this->TeacherCoinBox->updateDoneFlg($tcbParams);
622                }
623                if (isset($user['display_appreciation_message_flg']) && $user['display_appreciation_message_flg'] == 0) {
624                    $tcbParams['appreciation_field'] = 2;
625                    $this->TeacherCoinBox->updateDoneFlg($tcbParams);
626                }
627
628                //TODO: NJ-37295 - add automatic confimation flg
629                $this->UsersDetail->clear();
630                if ($userAutomaticConfirmationFlg) {
631                    $this->UsersDetail->id = $userAutomaticConfirmationFlg['UsersDetail']['id'];
632                } else {
633                    $this->UsersDetail->create();
634                }
635                $this->UsersDetail->set(array(
636                    'user_id' => $this->Auth->user('id'),
637                    'automatic_confirmation_flg' => isset($data['automatic_confirmation_flg']) ? $data['automatic_confirmation_flg'] : 1
638                ));
639                $this->UsersDetail->validate = [];
640                $this->UsersDetail->save();
641
642                $this->User->save();
643                /* update users_class_evaluations table */
644                $this->UsersClassEvaluation->updateAllAge($birthday, $bdayShowFlg, $this->Auth->User('id'));
645
646                if (isset($user['mail_coupon_delivery'])) {
647                    $setOptout = $user['mail_coupon_delivery'] == 1 ? 0 : 1; # ~1 for off notif in DB 
648                    $this->MailmagaCategoriesOptoutUser->updateOrCreateOptout($this->Auth->User('id'), $setOptout);
649                }
650
651                // NJ-18785
652                if(isset($data['HeyNCUser']) && isset($heyncUser['id']) && $heyncUser['id']){
653                    $this->HeyNCUser->updateData($data['HeyNCUser'],$heyncUser['id']);
654                }
655
656                $this->Session->delete('Message.account'); 
657                $this->Session->setFlash(__d('validate','設定が更新されました。'),'default', array(), 'account');
658                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/account');
659            } else {
660                $errors = myError::validation($this->User->validationErrors);
661                $this->Session->setFlash(implode('<br>',$errors),'default', array(), 'account');
662                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/account');
663            }
664        }
665        $this->set('referrer',$referrer);
666        $userObj = new UserTable($this->sharedUserData['User']);
667        if ($comPlanData = $this->ComplimentaryCode->getCCLessonRemAndExpiryDate($userObj)) {
668            $userData['User']['complimentary_plan_expiry_date'] = date('Y/m/d H:i', strtotime($comPlanData['expiryDate']));
669            $userData['User']['complimentary_plan_lesson_remaining'] = $comPlanData['lessonRem'];
670        }
671
672        $data = $userData;
673        $usersPoint = $this->UsersPoint->findByUserId($this->Auth->user('id'));
674        $this->set('data',$data);
675        $this->set('usersPoint', $usersPoint);
676
677        $timezone_list = $this->Timezone->getTimezonesWithDST(array('user' => true));
678        $this->set('timezone_list', $timezone_list);
679
680        $corpUserCanChangeCard = false;
681        $corporateCompanyPayment = false;
682        
683        // check if corporate individual user can change card
684        if (
685            isset($userData['User']['corporate_id']) && isset($userData['User']['payment_plan_id']) &&
686            isset($userData['User']['card_brand']) && isset($userData['User']['card_number'])
687        ) {
688            $corpUserCanChangeCard = true;
689        }
690
691        //check if corporate company payment can change card
692        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_allowed_user'))){
693            $corporateCompanyPayment = true;
694        }
695
696        $this->set('corpUserCanChangeCard', $corpUserCanChangeCard);
697        $this->set('corporateCompanyPayment', $corporateCompanyPayment);
698
699        # set next charge date
700        $nextChargeDate = NULL;
701        if (
702            !is_null($data["User"]["next_charge_date"])
703            && $data["User"]["charge_flg"] == 1
704            && $data["User"]["fail_flg"] == 0
705        ) {
706            $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($data["User"]["next_charge_date"]) + $this->timeDiffSecond);
707        }
708        $this->set('nextChargeDate', $nextChargeDate);
709
710        $this->set('telecomUserFlg',$telecomUserFlg);
711
712        //set referral link
713        $referralLink = $this->User->generateRefLink(array('lang' => $this->localizeDir));
714        $this->set('invite_link', $referralLink);
715
716        //*NC-5072
717        $nationalityLists = $this->Nationality->nationalityOptions();
718        $this->set('nationalityLists', $nationalityLists);
719
720        $countryList = $this->Country->countryOptions();
721        $this->set('residenceList', $countryList);
722
723        // check if user currency has supported family plan payment
724        $familyPaymentData = $this->PaymentPlanPrice->getPaymentData(array(
725            'currencyCode' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
726            'paymentPlanId' => Configure::read('payment_plans.family_plan')
727        ));
728
729        $isLitePlanUser = in_array($userData['User']['payment_plan_id'], Configure::read('lite_payment_plans')) ? true : false;
730
731        $familyManagementFlg = false;
732        if (
733            !$isLitePlanUser && 
734            !$userData['User']['corporate_id'] && $userData['User']['charge_flg'] &&
735            $userData['User']['card_company'] == (Configure::read('card_company.zeus') || Configure::read('card_company.worldpay') || Configure::read('card_company.paypal') || Configure::read('card_company.aftee') || Configure::read('card_company.stripe')) &&
736            $familyPaymentData
737        ) {
738            $familyManagementFlg = true;
739        }
740
741        $this->set('familyManagementFlg', $familyManagementFlg);
742
743        # NC-6696 VERSANT TIN
744        $versantTinCount = count($this->UserVersantTin->getUsersVersantTin($this->Auth->user('id')));
745        $this->set(compact('versantTinCount'));
746
747        #coupon
748        $this->set('availableCoupon', $this->UsersCouponV1->availableCoupon($this->Auth->user('id')));
749
750        $this->set(myTools::getSnsType($userData['User']));
751
752        // get allowed languages
753        $allowedLanguages = array_flip(Configure::read('pc_allowed_currencies'));
754        $this->set('allowedLanguages', $allowedLanguages);
755
756        // if failed user
757        if ($userData['User']['fail_flg']) {
758            $showResumePlanLink = true;
759
760            // if corporate user
761            if (isset($userData['User']['corporate_id']) && $userData['User']['corporate_id']) {
762                $showResumePlanLink = false;
763
764                // get corporate admin payment method
765                $corporatePaymentMethod = $this->Corporate->getPaymentMethod($userData['User']['corporate_id']);
766                $showResumePlanLink = $corporatePaymentMethod == 1 ? true : false;
767            }
768
769            $this->set('showResumePlanLink', $showResumePlanLink);
770        }
771
772        // NC-9617
773        $corporateData = $this->Corporate->findById($userData['User']['corporate_id']);
774        $this->set('studentNicknameSettingFlg', ($corporateData ? $corporateData['Corporate']['student_nickname_setting_flg'] : 1));
775        $this->set('studentEmailSettingFlg', ($corporateData ? $corporateData['Corporate']['student_email_setting_flg'] : 1));
776
777        //NJ-1562 Appreciation Family Plan
778        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(8, 14))) {//If user is family plan paid or free
779            $appreciationFamilyFlg = true;
780            $appreciationCantPurchaseCoin = $this->FamilyPlanList->cantCoinPurchase($userObj->id);
781
782            //set view 
783            $this->set("apprFamilyFlg",$appreciationFamilyFlg);
784            $this->set('apprCantPurchaseCoin',$appreciationCantPurchaseCoin);
785        }
786
787        $this->set('symbol', UsersCouponTable::getCouponSymbol($userData['User']['currency_code']));
788
789        $corpTypeUserObject = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userObj->payment_plan_id);
790        
791        //NC-8704 Native option plan
792        $nativeOptionManageFlg = false;
793        $showNativeOptionUrl = true;
794        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('native_speaker.valid_memberships'))){
795            //If user is family plan paid or free
796            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(8, 14))){
797                if ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseNativeOption($userObj->id)) {
798                    $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
799                }
800            } else {
801                $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
802            }
803        } elseif (isset($corpTypeUserObject) && in_array($corpTypeUserObject , array(1,2))) {
804            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array_merge(Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_allowed_user'), Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_fail_users')))){
805                $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
806            } else {
807                $showNativeOptionUrl = false;
808                if ($userObj->charge_flg) {
809                    $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
810                }
811            }
812        }
813
814        // - callan option manage flag
815        $callanOptionManageFlg = false;
816        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('callan_unlimited.valid_memberships'))){
817            //If user is family plan paid or free
818            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(8, 14))){
819                if ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseCallanOption($userObj->id)) {
820                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
821                } elseif ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseNativeOption($userObj->id)) {
822                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
823                }
824            } else {
825                $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
826            }
827        } elseif (isset($corpTypeUserObject) && in_array($corpTypeUserObject , array(1,2))) {
828            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array_merge(Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_allowed_user'), Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_fail_users')))){
829                $showNativeOptionUrl = true;
830            } else {
831                $showNativeOptionUrl = false;
832                if ($userObj->charge_flg) {
833                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
834                }    
835            }
836        }
837        if ($callanOptionManageFlg) {
838            $callanOptionData = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionData(array(
839                'user_currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
840                'option_id' => Configure::read('callan_unlimited.options.callan_unlimited_option')
841            ));
842            $this->set('callanOptionManageFlg', $callanOptionManageFlg);
843            $this->set('callanOptionFlg', $userData['User']['callan_option']);
844            $this->set('callanOptionData', ($callanOptionData) ? $callanOptionData : array());
845        }
846
847
848        //NJ-10798 - Show/not show premium coin purchase option
849        $displayPremiumCoinPurchase = false;
850        $allowedDisplayPremCoinPurchaseMem = array(
851            1, 
852            2,
853            Configure::read('membership_type_lightplan_free'),
854            Configure::read('membership_type_lightplan_paid')
855        );
856        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), $allowedDisplayPremCoinPurchaseMem )) {//If user is....refer to NJ-10798 hehe
857            $displayPremiumCoinPurchase  = true;
858        }
859
860        if ($nativeOptionManageFlg) {
861            $nativeOptionData = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionData(array(
862                'user_currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
863                'option_id' => Configure::read('native_speaker.options.all_you_can_eat')
864            ));
865            $this->set('nativeOptionManageFlg', $nativeOptionManageFlg);
866            $this->set('nativeOptionFlg', $userData['User']['native_option']);
867            $this->set('nativeOptionData', ($nativeOptionData) ? $nativeOptionData : array());
868        }
869        
870        # ~if premium paid/free get coupon mail flg
871        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('allow_coupon.membership_type'))) {
872            $isMailCouponBool = $this->MailmagaCategoriesOptoutUser->getUserOptout($this->Auth->User('id'));
873            $this->set('isMailCoupon', $isMailCouponBool);
874        }
875
876        $this->set('showNativeOptionUrl', $showNativeOptionUrl);
877
878        # NJ-7978: Appreciation
879        // for tips appreciation
880        $allowAppreciationTipsFlg = $userData['User']['allow_appreciation_flg'];
881        $displayAppreciationTipsFlg = $userData['User']['show_appreciation_flg'];
882
883        // for message appreciation
884        $allowAppreciationMessageFlg = $userData['User']['allow_appreciation_message_flg'];
885        $displayAppreciationMessageFlg = $userData['User']['display_appreciation_message_flg'];
886
887        // NJ-10798 - coin purchase flag
888        $allowPremiumCoinPurchaseFlg = $userData['User']['premium_coin_purchase_flg'];
889
890        //set the view data for the appreciation
891        $this->set('allowAppreciationTipsFlg',$allowAppreciationTipsFlg);
892        $this->set('displayAppreciationTipsFlg',$displayAppreciationTipsFlg);
893        $this->set('allowAppreciationMessageFlg',$allowAppreciationMessageFlg);
894        $this->set('displayAppreciationMessageFlg',$displayAppreciationMessageFlg);
895
896        // for coin purchase flag
897        $this->set('displayPremiumCoinPurchase',$displayPremiumCoinPurchase);
898        $this->set('allowPremiumCoinPurchaseFlg',$allowPremiumCoinPurchaseFlg);
899
900        //NJ-7101 - get latest monthly test result for english speaking
901        $dailyEnglishTestLevel = $dailyEnglishTestDateTaken = "";
902        $usersChivoxMonthlyDiagnosis = ClassRegistry::init('UsersChivoxMonthlyDiagnosis');
903        $userMonthlyLevelResult = $usersChivoxMonthlyDiagnosis->getUserMonthlyTestLevel($userData['User']['id']);
904        if ($userMonthlyLevelResult) {
905            $dateFormatParams = array(
906                'datetime' => $userMonthlyLevelResult['date_taken'],
907                'removeDay' => true,
908                'removeTime' => true,
909                'lang' => $this->localizeDir
910            );
911            $dailyEnglishTestLevel = $userMonthlyLevelResult['level'];
912            $dailyEnglishTestDateTaken = myTools::formatDateByLanguage($dateFormatParams);
913        }
914
915        $this->set('dailyEnglishTestLevel', $dailyEnglishTestLevel);
916        $this->set('dailyEnglishTestDateTaken', $dailyEnglishTestDateTaken);
917        // - end of NJ-7101
918
919        $this->setCorporateMonthlyPrice();
920        //SMS認証回数
921        $this->PhoneVerifyCheckLog->openDBReplica();
922        $countTotalVerify = $this->PhoneVerifyCheckLog->find('count',array(
923            'conditions'=> array(
924                'user_id' => $this->Auth->user('id'),
925                'status' => 0
926            )
927        ));
928        $this->PhoneVerifyCheckLog->closeDBReplica();
929        //電話番号入力対象会員の場合、国コードを取得
930        $this->CountryCode->openDBReplica();
931        $countryCodes = $this->CountryCode->find('all',array(
932            'fields' => array(
933                'code',
934                'country_name'
935            ),
936            'order' => 'country_name ASC'
937        ));
938        $this->CountryCode->closeDBReplica();
939        $this->set('countryCodes', $countryCodes);
940        $this->set('countTotalVerify', $countTotalVerify);
941        //NJ-14905
942        $this->setCorporateContractPeriod();
943        //NJ-10542
944        $noNextTextbookModal = array(
945            11, //'Corporate Limited Plan(Company payment-Bank transfer)'
946            35, //'Study Sapuri ENGLISH School Plan (Paid)',
947            16, //'Corporate Light Plan(Company payment-Bank transfer)',
948            25, //'Corporate Light Plan (Company payment-Card)',
949            17, //'Corporate Light Plan (Individual payment)',
950        );
951
952        $this->set('noNextTextbookModal', $noNextTextbookModal);
953
954        $this->set('litePlanDataUser',$userData['User']);
955
956        // NJ-18780 : check enable lite plan change
957         $this->checkLitePlanSupported($userData['User'],true);
958
959        //-- NJ-8019
960        $userAccessToken = $this->UserAccessToken->getAccessToken($this->Auth->user('id'));
961        $access_token = $userAccessToken['UserAccessToken']['access_token'] ?? '';
962        //-- set acess token in view
963        $this->set('google_access_token', $access_token);
964        
965        //TODO NJ-37295: include the user's automatic confirmation flg in the view
966        $automatic_confirmation_flg = isset($userData['UsersDetail']['automatic_confirmation_flg']) ? $userData['UsersDetail']['automatic_confirmation_flg'] : 1;
967        $this->set('automatic_confirmation_flg', $automatic_confirmation_flg);
968
969    }
970    /**
971     * @apiDefine EnquateUpdate
972     * 
973     * @apiBody {String} enquate6 Value for the enquate6 field.
974     * @apiBody {String} enquate7 Value for the enquate7 field.
975     * 
976     * @apiSuccess {Number} 1 Returns the status of the update which is 1.
977     */
978
979     /**
980     * @api {post} /account/enquate_update enquate_update()
981     * @apiName account_enquate_update
982     * @apiGroup Account
983     * 
984     * @apiUse EnquateUpdate
985     * @apiSampleRequest off
986     */
987
988     /**
989     * @api {post} /:language/account/enquate_update enquate_update()
990     * @apiName language_account_enquate_update
991     * @apiGroup Account
992     * 
993     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
994     * 
995     * @apiUse EnquateUpdate
996     * @apiSampleRequest off
997     */
998    public function enquate_update() {
999        $this->autoRender = false;
1000        // proceed to default function
1001        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
1002            $this->User->set($this->request->data);
1003            if($this->User->validates()){
1004                $data = $this->request->data;
1005                $user = $data['User'];
1006                
1007                $enquate6 = (isset($user['enquate6']) && $user['enquate6'] != '') ? $user['enquate6'] : NULL;
1008                $enquate7 = (isset($user['enquate7']) && $user['enquate7'] != '') ? $user['enquate7'] : NULL;
1009                $enquate6 = Sanitize::escape($enquate6, 'default');
1010                $enquate7 = Sanitize::escape($enquate7, 'default');
1011                
1012                $this->User->validate='';
1013                $this->User->updateAll(
1014                    array(
1015                        'User.enquate6' => $enquate6,
1016                        'User.enquate7' => $enquate7,
1017                    ),
1018                    array('User.id' => $this->Auth->user('id'))
1019                );
1020            } else {
1021            }
1022        } else {
1023        }
1024        return 1;
1025    }
1026    /**
1027     * @api {post} /user/account/changeImage changeImage()
1028     * @apiName ChangeImage
1029     * @apiGroup Account
1030     * 
1031     * @apiBody {File} image-upload Image file to upload (required).
1032     * 
1033     * @apiSuccess {View} redirect Redirects to the user account page after updating the image.
1034     * 
1035     * @apiError {String} error Error message if image upload fails.
1036     * @apiSampleRequest off
1037     */
1038    public function changeImage() {
1039        $id = $this->Auth->user('id');
1040
1041        $fileOK = $this->uploadFiles(array(
1042                'folder' => 'img/uploads', 
1043                'formdata' => array($this->request->data['UserImage']['image-upload'])
1044            ));
1045        $image = NULL;
1046
1047        //check if image passes checkers
1048        if(array_key_exists('filename', $fileOK)) {
1049            //$this->deletePrevImage('img/uploads');
1050
1051            $image = $fileOK['filename'];
1052        }
1053
1054        //check if image had errors
1055        if (array_key_exists('errors', $fileOK)) {
1056            $this->Session->setFlash(implode('<br>',$fileOK['errors']),'default', array(), 'account');
1057        }
1058
1059        $this->User->validate = array();
1060        $this->User->read(array('profile_image', 'image_url'), $id);
1061        $this->User->set(array('profile_image' => $image, 'image_url' => null));
1062        $this->User->save();
1063
1064        return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/account');
1065    }
1066    /**
1067     * @apiDefine ChangeEmail
1068     * 
1069     * @apiBody {String} email New email address.
1070     * @apiBody {String} email_confirm Confirmation of the new email address.
1071     * @apiBody {String} password User's current password.
1072     * @apiBody {Number} User.id Assign user id to auth user id.
1073     * 
1074     * @apiSuccess {Number} send Set status of the email sending process (1 - default).
1075     * @apiSuccess {String} headtext Set account email head text.
1076     * @apiSuccess {Object} user Set value for user object.
1077     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} skipEmailSuggestion Set skip email suggestion. 
1078     * 
1079     * @apiError {String} errors Error message if email validation fails or other issues occur.
1080     */
1081
1082     /**
1083     * @api {post} /account/change-email changeEmail()
1084     * @apiName change_email
1085     * @apiGroup Account
1086     *
1087     * @apiUse ChangeEmail
1088     * @apiSampleRequest off
1089     */
1090    /**
1091     * @api {post} /:language/account/change-email changeEmail()
1092     * @apiName language_change_email
1093     * @apiGroup Account
1094     * 
1095     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1096      *
1097     * @apiUse ChangeEmail
1098     * @apiSampleRequest off
1099     */
1100    public function changeEmail() {
1101        $this->set('headtext', Configure::read('my.meta.account-changeemail.headtext'));
1102        if($this->RequestHandler->isMobile()){
1103            return $this->sp_change_email();
1104        }
1105
1106        $id = $this->Auth->user('id');
1107        $data = $this->User->findById($id);
1108        $user = new UserTable($data['User']);
1109
1110        // check corporate users
1111        if ($user->corporate_id) {
1112            $corpAdminData = $this->Corporate->findById($user->corporate_id);
1113            if($corpAdminData['Corporate']['student_email_setting_flg'] == 0) {
1114                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/error_corporate_account', 301);
1115            }
1116        }
1117        $membershipsCorpSupuri = [
1118            9 => 'Corporate Standard Plan(Company payment-Bank transfer)',
1119            10 => 'Corporate Premium Plan(Company payment-Bank transfer)',
1120            11 => 'Corporate Limited Plan(Company payment-Bank transfer)',
1121            16 => 'Corporate Light Plan(Company payment-Bank transfer)',
1122            23 => 'Corporate Standard Plan (Company payment-Card)',
1123            24 => 'Corporate Premium Plan (Company payment-Card)',
1124            25 => 'Corporate Light Plan (Company payment-Card)',
1125            26 => 'Corporate Standard Plan (Individual payment)',
1126            27 => 'Corporate Premium Plan (Individual payment)',
1127            17 => 'Corporate Light Plan (Individual payment)',
1128            28 => 'Corporate Standard Plan (Company payment-Settlement Failed)',
1129            29 => 'Corporate Premium Plan (Company payment-Settlement Failed)',
1130            30 => 'Corporate Light Plan (Company payment-Settlement Failed)',
1131            31 => 'Corporate Standard Plan (Individual payment-Settlement Failed)',
1132            32 => 'Corporate Premium Plan (Individual payment-Settlement Failed)',
1133            18 => 'Corporate Light Plan (Individual payment - Settlement Failed)',
1134            19 => 'Study Sapuri ENGLISH Business English Course English Conversation Set Plan(Paid)',
1135            20 => 'Study Sapuri ENGLISH Business English Course English Conversation Set Plan(Free)',
1136            21 => 'Study Sapuri ENGLISH New Daily English Course English Conversation Set Plan(Paid)',
1137            22 => 'Study Sapuri ENGLISH New daily English Course English Conversation set Plan(Free)',
1138            33 => 'Study Sapuri ENGLISH Business English Course English Conversation Set Plan(Organization)',
1139            34 => 'Study Sapuri ENGLISH New Daily English Course English Conversation Set Plan(Organization)',
1140            35 => 'Study Sapuri ENGLISH School Plan (Paid)'
1141        ];
1142        $skipEmailSuggestion = in_array($user->getMembershipTypeIndex(),  array_keys($membershipsCorpSupuri));
1143        $this->set('skipEmailSuggestion', $skipEmailSuggestion);
1144        
1145        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
1146            $this->request->data['User']['id'] = $this->Auth->user('id');
1147            $this->User->set($this->request->data);
1148            $email = (isset($this->request->data['User']['email'])) ? trim($this->request->data['User']['email']) : NULL;
1149            if (UserTable::checkEmail($email,$id)) {
1150                $this->User->invalidate('email', __d('validate','入力されたメールアドレスは使用できません。'));
1151            }
1152            if ($this->request->data['User']['email'] != $this->request->data['User']['email_confirm']) {
1153                $this->User->invalidate('email', __d('validate','新しいメールアドレスが違います。'));
1154            }
1155
1156            if ($this->User->validates()) {
1157                // if has pasword save password
1158                if (isset($this->request->data['User']['password'])) {                    
1159                    $password = AuthComponent::password($this->request->data['User']['password']);
1160                    $this->User->clear();
1161                    $this->User->id = $id;
1162                    $this->User->saveField('password', $password);
1163                }
1164                $hash = AuthComponent::password(uniqid(rand()));
1165
1166                $this->UsersEmailConfirm->set('user_id', $id);
1167                $this->UsersEmailConfirm->set('hash',$hash);
1168                $this->UsersEmailConfirm->save();
1169
1170                $ssl_url = $this->baseUrl; // change link to dynamic
1171
1172                $userData = $this->User->findById($id);
1173                $userData['User']['new_email']  = $email;
1174                
1175                // $userData['User']['active_url'] = Router::url('/', true) . 'account/activate/' . $hash;
1176                $userData['User']['active_url'] = $ssl_url . '/account/activate/' . $hash;
1177                // myMailer::changeEmailAddress($userData['User'],$hash);
1178
1179                $mail_id = Configure::read('site_in_mail.student_changed_email');
1180                myMailer::sendTemplateMail($mail_id, $email, $userData['User'], $userData['User']);
1181
1182                $this->Session->write('userData', array('id' => $id, 'email' => $email, 'invalid_email_flg' => $userData['User']['invalid_email_flg']));
1183
1184                $this->set('send', 1);
1185            } else {
1186                $errors = myError::validation($this->User->validationErrors);
1187                $errors[0] .= '<br>';
1188                $errors[0] .= __d('validate','ご不明点はお問い合わせよりご連絡ください。');
1189                $this->Session->setFlash(implode('<br>',$errors),'default', array(), 'account');
1190            }
1191        }
1192        $this->set('user',$user);
1193    }
1194/*
1195    public function changeEmailConfirm() {
1196        $data = $this->Session->read('userData');
1197        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
1198            if(!$data) {
1199                return $this->redirect('/account/change-email');
1200            }
1201            $hash = AuthComponent::password(uniqid(rand()));
1202
1203            $this->UsersEmailConfirm->set('user_id', $data['id']);
1204            $this->UsersEmailConfirm->set('hash',$hash);
1205            $this->UsersEmailConfirm->save();
1206
1207            $userData = $this->User->findById($data['id']);
1208            $userData['User']['new_email'] = $data['email'];
1209            myMailer::changeEmailAddress($userData['User'],$hash);
1210            return $this->render('/Register/confirm_email');
1211        }
1212        $this->set('user',$data);
1213    }*/
1214    /**
1215     * @apiDefine Activate
1216     * @apiParam {String} code Unique confirmation code sent to the user's email (required).
1217     * 
1218     * @apiSuccess {View} change_email_complete Render the change email complete page..
1219     * @apiError {View} url Redirect to default url(/).
1220     */
1221
1222     /**
1223     * @api {get} /account/activate/:code activate()
1224     * @apiName activate_code
1225     * @apiGroup Account
1226     *
1227     * @apiUse Activate
1228     * @apiSampleRequest off
1229     */
1230    /**
1231     * @api {get} /:language/account/activate/:code activate()
1232     * @apiName language_activate_code
1233     * @apiGroup Account
1234     * 
1235     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1236      *
1237     * @apiUse Activate
1238     * @apiSampleRequest off
1239     */
1240    public function activate() {
1241        $code = $this->params['code'];
1242        $conditions = array(
1243            'UsersEmailConfirm.hash' => $code,
1244            'UsersEmailConfirm.created >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY'
1245        );
1246        $uec = $this->UsersEmailConfirm->find('first',array('conditions'=>$conditions));
1247        if($uec){
1248
1249            $data = $this->Session->read('userData');
1250
1251            #to update
1252            $toUpdate = array(
1253                'id' => $data['id'],
1254                'email' => $data['email']
1255            );
1256
1257            #Update Invalid email flag
1258            if (isset($data['invalid_email_flg']) && $data['invalid_email_flg'] == 1) {
1259                $toUpdate['invalid_email_flg'] = 0;
1260            }
1261
1262            $this->User->clear();
1263            $this->User->set($toUpdate);
1264            $this->User->save();
1265            //delete
1266            //user confirmation code
1267            $this->UsersEmailConfirm->delete($uec['UsersEmailConfirm']['id']);
1268            $this->set('email', $data['email']);
1269
1270            $this->HeyNCUser->openDBReplica();
1271            $checkUserExist = $this->HeyNCUser->find('first', array(
1272                'fields' => array('HeyNCUser.email', 'HeyNCUser.id'),
1273                'conditions' => array('HeyNCUser.ncuser_id' => $data['id']),
1274                'recursive' => -1
1275            ));
1276            $this->HeyNCUser->closeDBReplica();
1277
1278            $heyncUserData = array(
1279                'ncuser_id' => $data['id'],
1280                'email' => $data['email']
1281            );
1282
1283            if($checkUserExist) {
1284                $this->HeyNCUser->updateData($heyncUserData, $checkUserExist['HeyNCUser']['id']);
1285            }
1286
1287            return $this->render('change_email_complete');
1288        } else {
1289            return $this->redirect('/');
1290        }
1291    }
1292    /**
1293     * @apiDefine ChangePassword
1294     * 
1295     * @apiBody {String} password User's current password.
1296     * @apiBody {String} password_custom User's custom password.
1297     * @apiBody {String} password_new User's new password.
1298     * 
1299     * @apiSuccess {View} redirect Redirect to this page : /account/change-pass/complete.
1300     * @apiError {View} validation Set validationErrors in the view.
1301     * @apiError {View} invalidate Invalidate user password.
1302     */
1303     /**
1304     * @api {post} /account/change-pass changePass()
1305     * @apiName change_password
1306     * @apiGroup Account
1307     *
1308     * @apiUse ChangePassword
1309     * @apiSampleRequest off
1310     */
1311    /**
1312     * @api {post} /:language/account/change-pass changePass()
1313     * @apiName language_change_password
1314     * @apiGroup Account
1315     * 
1316     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1317      *
1318     * @apiUse ChangePassword
1319     * @apiSampleRequest off
1320     */
1321    public function changePass() {
1322        $userData = isset($this->sharedUserData['User']) ? $this->sharedUserData['User'] : array();
1323        $enabledSNS = myTools::getEnabledSNS($userData);
1324        $isAddPassword = $enabledSNS['hasActiveSNS'] && empty($userData['password']);
1325
1326        // NJ-15191 - change password validation for specific corporate users
1327        $corporate_id = $this->Auth->user('corporate_id');
1328
1329        $this->set('corporateId', $corporate_id);
1330        $this->set('isAddPassword', $isAddPassword);
1331        $this->set('headtext', Configure::read('my.meta.account-changepass.headtext'));
1332
1333        if ($this->RequestHandler->isMobile()){
1334            return $this->sp_change_pass();
1335        }
1336        $id = $this->Auth->user('id');
1337        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
1338            $this->User->set($this->request->data);
1339
1340            unset($this->User->validate['password']);
1341            unset($this->User->validate['password_confirm']);
1342
1343            # ~don't check current pass if add password 
1344            if (!$isAddPassword) {
1345                $current = $this->request->data['User']['password'];
1346                
1347                if ($current) {
1348                    $current = AuthComponent::password($current);
1349                    $this->User->openDBReplica();
1350                    $userData = $this->User->find('first', array(
1351                        'fields' => [
1352                            'User.id',
1353                            'UsersExtend.id',
1354                            'UsersExtend.temporary_pw_flg'
1355                        ],
1356                        'joins' => [
1357                            [
1358                                'table' => 'users_extend',
1359                                'alias' => 'UsersExtend',
1360                                'type' => 'LEFT',
1361                                'conditions' => 'UsersExtend.user_id = User.id'
1362                            ]
1363                        ],
1364                        'conditions' => array(
1365                            'User.id' => $id,
1366                            'User.password' => $current
1367                        )
1368                    ));
1369                    $this->User->closeDBReplica();
1370                } else {
1371                    $this->User->invalidate('password',__d('validate','必須項目です'));
1372                }
1373                
1374                if ($current && !$userData) {
1375                    $this->User->invalidate('password',__d('validate','現在のパスワードが正しくありません。'));
1376                } 
1377            }
1378
1379            if ($this->User->validates()) {
1380                $this->User->validate = array();
1381                $this->User->read(null,$id);
1382                $new = AuthComponent::password(!empty($corporate_id) ? $this->request->data['User']['password_custom'] : $this->request->data['User']['password_new']);
1383
1384                $this->User->set('password',$new);
1385                $this->User->save();
1386
1387                //- Sapuri
1388                if(isset($userData['UsersExtend']) && isset($userData['UsersExtend']['id'])) {
1389                    // set temporary password flag to 0
1390                    $this->loadModel('UsersExtend');
1391                    $this->UsersExtend->clear();
1392                    $this->UsersExtend->read(['temporary_pw', 'temporary_pw_flg'], $userData['UsersExtend']['id']);
1393                    $this->UsersExtend->set(['temporary_pw_flg' => 0]);
1394                    $this->UsersExtend->save();
1395                    return $this->redirect('/account/change-pass/complete');
1396                }
1397
1398                //- Corporate
1399                if (!empty($this->Auth->user('corporate_id')) || !empty($userData['CorporateActivationManagement']['id'])) {
1400                    // set temporary password flag to 0
1401                    $this->loadModel('CorporateActivationManagement');
1402                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->clear();
1403                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->read(['temporary_pw_flg'], $userData['CorporateActivationManagement']['id']);
1404                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->set(['temporary_pw_flg' => 0]);
1405                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->save();
1406                    return $this->redirect('/account/change-pass/complete');
1407                }
1408                //TODO NJ-38158: redirect to change pass complete
1409                return $this->redirect('/account/change-pass/complete');
1410            } else {
1411                $errors = myError::validation($this->User->validationErrors);
1412                $this->Session->setFlash(implode('<br>',$errors),'default', array(), 'account');
1413                $this->set('validationErrors', $this->User->validationErrors);
1414            }
1415        }
1416    }
1417    /**
1418     * @apiDefine ChangeFirstPassword
1419     * 
1420     * @apiBody {String} User.password Current password.
1421      * @apiBody {String} User.password_new New password.
1422      * @apiBody {String} User.password_custom Password custom.
1423     * 
1424     * @apiSuccess {View} redirect Redirect to this page : /account/change-pass/complete.
1425     * @apiError {View} validation Set validationErrors in the view.
1426     * @apiError {View} invalidate Invalidate user password.
1427     */
1428     /**
1429     * @api {post} /account/change-first-pass changeFirstPass()
1430     * @apiName change_first_password
1431     * @apiGroup Account
1432     *
1433     * @apiUse ChangeFirstPassword
1434     * @apiSampleRequest off
1435     */
1436    /**
1437     * @api {post} /:language/account/change-first-pass changeFirstPass()
1438     * @apiName language_change_first_password
1439     * @apiGroup Account
1440     * 
1441     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1442      *
1443     * @apiUse ChangeFirstPassword
1444     * @apiSampleRequest off
1445     */
1446    public function changeFirstPass() {
1447        $userData = isset($this->sharedUserData['User']) ? $this->sharedUserData['User'] : array();
1448        $enabledSNS = myTools::getEnabledSNS($userData);
1449        $isAddPassword = $enabledSNS['hasActiveSNS'] && empty($userData['password']);
1450
1451        $this->set('isAddPassword', $isAddPassword);
1452        $this->set('headtext', Configure::read('my.meta.account-changepass.headtext'));
1453        $id = $this->Auth->user('id');
1454        //check if already added as corporate
1455        $corpManagement = $this->CorporateActivationManagement->find('count', array(
1456            'conditions' => array(
1457                'CorporateActivationManagement.user_id' => $id,
1458            )
1459        ));
1460        $isCorporate = (!empty($this->Auth->user('corporate_id')) || $corpManagement) ? true : false;
1461        $this->set('isCorporate', $isCorporate);
1462
1463        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
1464            $this->User->set($this->request->data);
1465            unset($this->User->validate['password']);
1466            unset($this->User->validate['password_confirm']);
1467            $this->User->validator()->remove('password_new', 'lengthBetween');
1468            $this->User->validator()->remove('password_confirm_new', 'lengthBetween');
1469            $this->User->validator()->add('password_confirm_new', 'compare', [
1470                'rule' => ['equaltofield', 'password_new'],
1471                'message' => 'パスワードが一致しません。'
1472            ]);
1473
1474            # ~don't check current pass if add password 
1475            if (!$isAddPassword) {
1476                $current = $this->request->data['User']['password'];
1477                
1478                if ($current) {
1479                    $current = AuthComponent::password($current);
1480                    $this->User->openDBReplica();
1481                    $userData = $this->User->find('first', array(
1482                        'fields' => [
1483                            'User.id',
1484                            'UsersExtend.id',
1485                            'UsersExtend.temporary_pw_flg'
1486                        ],
1487                        'joins' => [
1488                            [
1489                                'table' => 'users_extend',
1490                                'alias' => 'UsersExtend',
1491                                'type' => 'LEFT',
1492                                'conditions' => 'UsersExtend.user_id = User.id'
1493                            ]
1494                        ],
1495                        'conditions' => array(
1496                            'User.id' => $id,
1497                            'User.password' => $current
1498                        )
1499                    ));
1500                    $this->User->closeDBReplica();
1501                } else {
1502                    $this->User->invalidate('password',__d('validate','必須項目です'));
1503                }
1504                
1505                if ($current && !$userData) {
1506                    $this->User->invalidate('password',__d('validate','現在のパスワードが正しくありません。'));
1507                }
1508            }
1509
1510            if ($this->User->validates()) {
1511                $this->User->validate = array();
1512                $this->User->read(null,$id);
1513                $passwordField = ($isCorporate) ? 'password_custom' : 'password_new';
1514                $new = AuthComponent::password($this->request->data['User'][$passwordField]);
1515                $this->User->set('password',$new);
1516                $this->User->save();
1517
1518                if (!empty($this->Auth->user('corporate_id')) || $corpManagement) {
1519                    // NJ-23929: update temporary password for users registered through corporate
1520                    $this->loadModel('CorporateActivationManagement');
1521                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->updateAll(
1522                        ['temporary_pw_flg' => 0],
1523                        ['user_id' => $id]
1524                    );
1525                }else{
1526                    // set temporary password flag to 0
1527                    $this->loadModel('UsersExtend');
1528                    $this->UsersExtend->clear();
1529                    $this->UsersExtend->read(['temporary_pw', 'temporary_pw_flg'], $userData['UsersExtend']['id']);
1530                    $this->UsersExtend->set(['temporary_pw_flg' => 0]);
1531                    $this->UsersExtend->save();
1532                }
1533                return $this->redirect('/account/change-pass/complete');
1534            } else {
1535                $errors = myError::validation($this->User->validationErrors);
1536                $this->Session->setFlash(implode('<br>',$errors),'default', array(), 'account');
1537                $this->set('validationErrors', $this->User->validationErrors);
1538            }
1539        }
1540    }
1541    /**
1542     * @apiDefine ChangeEmailComplete
1543     * 
1544     * @apiSuccess {View} redirect Redirect to changeEmailComplete page. 
1545     */
1546    /**
1547     * @api {get} /account/change-email/complete changeEmailComplete()
1548     * @apiName change_email_complete
1549     * @apiGroup Account
1550     *
1551     * @apiUse ChangeEmailComplete
1552     * @apiSampleRequest off
1553     */
1554    /**
1555     * @api {get} /:language/account/change-email/complete changeEmailComplete()
1556     * @apiName language_change_email_complete
1557     * @apiGroup Account
1558     * 
1559     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1560      *
1561     * @apiUse ChangeEmailComplete
1562     * @apiSampleRequest off
1563     */
1564    public function changeEmailComplete(){

1566    }
1567    /**
1568     * @apiDefine ChangePassComplete
1569     * 
1570     * @apiSuccess {View} redirect Redirect to changePassComplete page. 
1571     */
1572    /**
1573     * @api {get} /account/change-pass/complete ChangePassComplete()
1574     * @apiName change_pass_complete
1575     * @apiGroup Account
1576     *
1577     * @apiUse ChangePassComplete
1578     * @apiSampleRequest off
1579     */
1580    /**
1581     * @api {get} /:language/account/change-pass/complete ChangePassComplete()
1582     * @apiName language_change_pass_complete
1583     * @apiGroup Account
1584     * 
1585     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1586      *
1587     * @apiUse ChangePassComplete
1588     * @apiSampleRequest off
1589     */
1590    public function changePassComplete(){
1591        if ($this->RequestHandler->isMobile()) {
1592            $this->layout = "mobile";
1593            return $this->render('/Mobile/Account/change_pass_complete');
1594        } else {
1595            return $this->render('changePassComplete');
1596        }
1597    }
1598
1599   /**
1600     * uploads files to the server
1601     * @params:
1602     *      $folder     = the folder to upload the files e.g. 'img/files'
1603     *      $formdata   = the array containing the form files
1604     *      $itemId     = id of the item (optional) will create a new sub folder
1605     * @return:
1606     *      will return an array with the success of each file upload
1607     */
1608    private function uploadFiles($params = array()) {
1609        // setup dir names absolute and relative
1610        $app = '/user/webroot';
1611
1612        //$folder_url = WWW_ROOT.$folder;
1613        $folder_url = ROOT.$app.'/'.$params['folder'];
1614
1615        // create the folder if it does not exist
1616        if (!is_dir($folder_url)) {
1617            mkdir($folder_url);
1618        }
1619
1620        // list of permitted file types, this is only images but documents can be added
1621        $permitted = array('image/gif','image/jpeg','image/pjpeg','image/png');
1622        $permittedExt = array('gif', 'jpeg', 'jpg', 'png');
1623        // loop through and deal with the files
1624
1625        foreach($params['formdata'] as $file) {
1626            // replace spaces with underscores
1627            //$filename = str_replace(' ', '_', $file['name']);
1628            $now = date('Y_m_d_His');
1629            $ext = $this->getFileExtension($file['name']);
1630            $filename = $now.uniqid().'.'.$ext;
1631            // assume filetype is false
1632            $typeOK = false;
1633            
1634            if (in_array(strtolower($ext), $permittedExt)) {
1635                // check filetype is ok
1636                foreach($permitted as $type) {
1637                    if ($type == $file['type']) {
1638                        $typeOK = true;
1639                        break;
1640                    }
1641                }
1642            }
1643        
1644            $result = array();
1645            // if file type ok upload the file
1646            if ($typeOK) {
1647                // switch based on error code
1648                switch($file['error']) {
1649                    case 0:
1650                        // check file size
1651                        $sizeLimit = 5245329; // 5mb limit
1652                        if ($file['size'] > $sizeLimit) {
1653                            $result['errors'][] = 'Max limit upload size 5mb.';
1654                        } else {
1655                            $full_url = $folder_url.'/'.$filename;
1656                            //$url = $rel_url.'/'.$filename;
1657                            //$success = move_uploaded_file($file['tmp_name'], $full_url);
1658                            $imageCom = new ImageComponent(new ComponentCollection());
1659                            $imageCom->prepare($file['tmp_name']);
1660                            $imageCom->imagickResize(300,300);
1661                            $imageCom->imagickSave($full_url);
1662                            $saveSucess = $this->FileStorage->uploadFile(array(
1663                                'source' => $full_url,
1664                                'key' => $filename,
1665                                'uploader_type' => 1,//user
1666                                'uploader_id' => $this->Auth->user('id'),
1667                                'file' => $file
1668                            ));
1669
1670                            // if upload was successful
1671                            if ($saveSucess) {
1672                                $result['filename'] = $saveSucess['FileStorage']['filename'];
1673                                if(file_exists($full_url)){
1674                                    unlink($full_url); // Delete the temporary file
1675                                }
1676                            } else {
1677                                $result['errors'][] = "Error uploaded $filename. Please try again.";
1678                            }
1679                        }
1680                        break;
1681                    case 3:
1682                        // an error occured
1683                        $result['errors'][] = "Error uploading $filename. Please try again.";
1684                        break;
1685                    default:
1686                        // an error occured
1687                        $result['errors'][] = "System error uploading $filename. Contact webmaster.";
1688                        break;
1689                }
1690            } elseif($file['error'] == 4) {
1691                // no file was selected for upload
1692                $result['errors'][] = "No file Selected";
1693            } else {
1694                // unacceptable file type
1695                $result['errors'][] = "{$file['name']} cannot be uploaded. Acceptable file types: gif, jpg, png.";
1696            }
1697        }
1698        return $result;
1699    }
1700
1701    private function getFileExtension($fileName) {
1702        return @strtolower(end(explode(".", basename($fileName))));
1703    }
1704
1705    private function deletePrevImage($folder) {
1706        //remove image 
1707        $this->FileStorage->removeFile(array('url' => $this->sharedUserData['User']['image_url']));
1708    }
1709    /**
1710     * @apiDefine Calendar
1711     * @apiParam {Date} date Set the selected `datetime`
1712     * @apiSuccess {View} date Set `date` value. 
1713     */
1714    /**
1715     * @api {get} /account/calendar calendar()
1716     * @apiName calendar
1717     * @apiGroup Account
1718     *
1719     * @apiUse Calendar
1720     * @apiSampleRequest off
1721     */
1722    /**
1723     * @api {get} /:language/account/calendar calendar()
1724     * @apiName language_calendar
1725     * @apiGroup Account
1726     * 
1727     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1728      *
1729     * @apiUse Calendar
1730     * @apiSampleRequest off
1731     */
1732    public function calendar(){
1733        $this->layout = null;
1734        if (isset($this->params->query['date'])) {
1735            $date = $this->params->query['date'];
1736        } else {
1737            $date = time();
1738        }
1739        $this->set('date',$date);
1740    }

1765    }
