1793
1794    /**
1795     * @apiDefine PaymentHistory
1796     * @apiParam {Boolean} isMobile Check if request is mobile or not.
1797     * @apiParam {String} token Unique identifier for user(s).
1798     * 
1799     * @apiSuccess {String} fromDate The start date for the account's payment history.
1800     * @apiSuccess {String} userCreated The creation date of the user account.
1801     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} isMoreThan A flag indicating whether the account has been active for more than one year.
1802     * @apiSuccess {Integer} displayTime The timestamp of the last settlement date, if applicable.
1803     * @apiSuccess {Array} payments List of payment records for the user.
1804     * @apiSuccess {Integer} payments.Payment.id The ID of the payment.
1805     * @apiSuccess {Integer} payments.Payment.type_id The type ID of the payment.
1806     * @apiSuccess {Integer} payments.Payment.pay_kbn The payment classification.
1807     * @apiSuccess {String} payments.Payment.reference_id The reference ID of the payment.
1808     * @apiSuccess {Float} payments.Payment.amount The amount of the payment.
1809     * @apiSuccess {Float} payments.Payment.discounted_amount The discounted amount for the payment.
1810     * @apiSuccess {Integer} payments.Payment.status The status of the payment.
1811     * @apiSuccess {String} payments.Payment.created The creation date of the payment.
1812     * @apiSuccess {Integer} payments.Payment.user_id The ID of the user associated with the payment.
1813     * @apiSuccess {Integer} payments.Payment.form_type The form type of the payment.
1814     * @apiSuccess {String} payments.Payment.card_company The card company used for payment, if applicable.
1815     * @apiSuccess {Float} payments.Payment.basic_fee The basic fee associated with the payment.
1816     * @apiSuccess {Float} payments.Payment.lesson_fee The lesson fee associated with the payment.
1817     * @apiSuccess {String} payments.Payment.lesson_fee_date_started The date the lesson fee started.
1818     * @apiSuccess {Integer} payments.Payment.receivable_payment_cnt Count of receivable payments for this payment.
1819     * @apiSuccess {Float} payments.Payment.original_payment_amount The original amount before any discounts.
1820     * @apiSuccess {Float} DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory.amount The discounted amount from settlement history.
1821     * @apiSuccess {Array} paidCorporateReceivablePayment Merged corporate receivable payments, if applicable.
1822     * @apiSuccess {Integer} receivablePayment The computed receivable payment for the user.
1823     * @apiSuccess {Integer} receivablePaymentCount The count of receivable payments for the user.
1824     * @apiSuccess {Integer} familyReceivablePayment The computed receivable payment for family members.
1825     * @apiSuccess {Array} familyMemberReceivablePayment The list of receivable payments for family members.
1826     * @apiSuccess {Array} familyMemberAppreciationPayment The list of appreciation payments for family members.
1827     * @apiSuccess {Array} familyMemberLIVEPayment The list of live lesson payments for family members.
1828     * @apiSuccess {Integer} appreciationPayment The computed appreciation payment for the user.
1829     * @apiSuccess {Integer} appreciationPaymentCount The count of appreciation payments for the user.
1830     * @apiSuccess {Integer} livePayment The computed live lesson payment for the user.
1831     * @apiSuccess {Integer} livePaymentCount The count of live lesson payments for the user.
1832     * @apiSuccess {Array} payments Payment history list.
1833     * @apiSuccess {Object} payments.Payment Details of a single payment.
1834     * @apiSuccess {String} payments.Payment.nextChargeDate The next charge date for the user.
1835     * @apiSuccess {Object} payments.Payment.optionDateRange Date range for the payment option.
1836     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} showTax Indicates whether tax is applicable.
1837     * @apiSuccess {String} title_for_layout Page title.
1838     * @apiSuccess {String} page_css CSS class for the page.
1839     * @apiSuccess {String} nextChargeDate The upcoming charge date for the user.
1840     * @apiSuccess {String} lastChargeDate The last charge date of the user.
1841     * @apiSuccess {Number} receivablePayment Count of receivable payments.
1842     * @apiSuccess {Number} receivablePaymentCount Total number of receivable payments.
1843     * @apiSuccess {Number} familyMemberReceivablePayments Family member's receivable payments.
1844     * @apiSuccess {Number} familyMemberAppreciationPayments Family member's appreciation payments.
1845     * @apiSuccess {Number} familyMemberLIVEPayments Family member's live payments.
1846     * @apiSuccess {Number} appreciationPaymentCount Total number of appreciation payments.
1847     * @apiSuccess {Number} livePaymentCount Total number of live payments.
1848     * @apiSuccess {Array} appPlanFormTypes Form types for app plan payments.
1849     * @apiSuccess {Array} premiumPlanFormTypes Form types for premium plan payments.
1850     * @apiSuccess {Array} litePlanFormTypes Form types for lite plan payments.
1851     * @apiSuccess {Array} chocottoPlanFormTypes Form types for chocotto plan payments.
1852     * @apiSuccess {Array} textbookPurchaseFormType Form types for textbook purchases.
1853     * @apiSuccess {Array} coinPurchaseFormType Form types for coin purchases.
1854     * @apiSuccess {Array} paymentReceivableFormType Form types for payment receivables.
1855     * @apiSuccess {Array} familyMonthlyFormType Form types for family monthly payments.
1856     * @apiSuccess {Array} corporateIndiFormTypes Form types for corporate and individual payments.
1857     * @apiSuccess {Array} nativeOptioFormTypes Form types for native option payments.
1858     * @apiSuccess {Array} callanOptioFormTypes Form types for Callan option payments.
1859     * @apiSuccess {String} currencySymbol Currency symbol.
1860     * @apiSuccess {Number} prefixSuffixFlg Indicates whether the currency symbol is a prefix or suffix.
1861     * @apiSuccess {Number} nativeOptionMonthlyAmount The monthly amount for native option.
1862     * @apiSuccess {Number} callanOptionMonthlyAmount The monthly amount for Callan option.
1863     * @apiSuccess {Number} nextMonthlyPayment The next scheduled monthly payment.
1864     * @apiSuccess {Number} liteMonthlyPayment The lite monthly payment amount.
1865     * @apiSuccess {Number} chocottoMonthlyPayment The chocotto monthly payment amount.
1866     * @apiSuccess {Number} familyPlanMonthlySettlementAmount Family plan monthly settlement amount.
1867     * @apiSuccess {Number} discountOptionAmount The total discount applied to the user.
1868     * @apiSuccess {String} userLang The user's language.
1869     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} chckLitePlan Flag indicating if the lite plan is active.
1870     * @apiSuccess {Boolean} chckChocottoCampPlan Flag indicating if the chocotto camp plan is active.
1871     * @apiSuccess {Number} monthlyCouponUsed Total coupons applied for the monthly settlement.
1872     * @apiSuccess {Number} nativeCouponUsed Total coupons applied for the native option.
1873     * @apiSuccess {Number} callanCouponUsed Total coupons applied for the Callan option.
1874     */
1875
1876     /**
1877     * @api {get} /payment_history payment_history()
1878     * @apiName payment_history
1879     * @apiGroup Account
1880      *
1881     * @apiUse PaymentHistory
1882     * @apiSampleRequest off
1883     */
1884    /**
1885     * @api {get} /:language/payment_history payment_history()
1886     * @apiName language_payment_history
1887     * @apiGroup Account
1888     * 
1889     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1890      *
1891     * @apiUse PaymentHistory
1892     * @apiSampleRequest off
1893     */
1894    /**
1895     * @api {get} /:language/account/payment_history/* payment_history()
1896     * @apiName language_account_payment_history
1897     * @apiGroup Account
1898     * 
1899     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
1900      *
1901     * @apiUse PaymentHistory
1902     * @apiSampleRequest off
1903     */
1904    public function payment_history() {    
1905              
1906        $userData = $this->sharedUserData['User'];
1907        $sqlFamField = null;
1908        $userId = $userData['id'];
1909        $userCorpId = (isset($userData['corporate_id'])) ? $userData['corporate_id'] : '';
1910        $tax = 0.10;
1911        // payment conditions
1912        $conditionArr = $this->Payment->getAccountPaymentCondition($userId);
1913        $conditions = $conditionArr["conditions"];
1914        $lastChargeDate = $this->sharedUserData['User']['last_charge_date'];
1915        
1916        // count receivable payment
1917        $this->Payment->virtualFields['receivable_payment_cnt'] = "(SELECT count(*) FROM payment_receivables pr WHERE pr.payment_id = Payment.id AND status = 2 AND pr.payment_element_type IN (1,2,3) AND pr.payment_element_id IS NOT NULL)";
1918        
1919        if( $conditionArr["has_family"] ) {
1920            // family plan start date
1921            $this->Payment->virtualFields['family_plan_start_date'] = "( Select created from payments where user_id = Payment.user_id and form_type = ".Configure::read("payment_credit_family_monthly_payment")."  order by created ASC limit 1)";
1922            $sqlFamField = 'Payment.family_plan_start_date';
1923            $this->Payment->virtualFields['latest_premium_plan_payment_date'] = "( Select created from payments where user_id = Payment.user_id and form_type = ".Configure::read("payment_credit_monthly_payment")."  order by created DESC limit 1)";
1924            $sqlFamField = 'Payment.latest_premium_plan_payment_date';
1925            $this->set('parentId', $userId);
1926        }
1927        
1928        if( $conditionArr["status"] == "child" ){
1929            $this->Payment->virtualFields['family_plan_start_date'] = "( Select created from payments where user_id = Payment.user_id and form_type = ".Configure::read("payment_credit_family_monthly_payment")."  order by created ASC limit 1)";
1930            $sqlFamField = 'Payment.family_plan_start_date';
1931        }
1932
1933        $showTax = false;
1934        $userCreated = $userData['created'];
1935        $toDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
1936        $dateMinus1Year = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 year'));
1937        $paidCorporateReceivablePayment = array();
1938        $joins = array();
1939
1940        if(strtotime($userCreated) >= strtotime($dateMinus1Year)){
1941            $defFromDate = $userCreated;
1942            $isMoreThan = 'true';
1943        } else {
1944            $defFromDate = $dateMinus1Year;
1945            $isMoreThan = 'false';
1946        }
1947
1948        $this->set('fromDate', $userCreated);
1949        $this->set('userCreated', $defFromDate);
1950        $this->set('isMoreThan', $isMoreThan);
1951
1952        // if corporate user
1953        if ($userCorpId) {

1955            if ($corporateAdminPaymentMethod != "") {
1956                $showTax = true;
1957                
1958                $joins[] = array(
1959                    'type' => 'LEFT',
1960                    'table' => 'users',
1961                    'alias' => 'User',
1962                    'conditions' => array('User.id = Payment.user_id')
1963                );
1964                $joins[] = array(
1965                    'type' => 'LEFT',
1966                    'table' => 'corporates',
1967                    'alias' => 'Corporate',
1968                    'conditions' => array('Corporate.id = User.corporate_id')
1969                );

1974                if (in_array($corporateAdminPaymentMethod, [0, 2])) {
1975                    $corpParams = array(
1976                        'user_id' => $userId,
1977                        'startDate' => $defFromDate,
1978                        'endDate' => $toDate,
1979                        'limit' => 10,

1981                    );

1983                }
1984            }
1985        }
1986

1988            'type' => 'LEFT',
1989            'table' => 'discount_options_settlement_histories',

1991            'conditions' => "DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory.payment_id = Payment.id AND DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory.amount > 0"
1992        ];
1993
1994        $userCreated = $userData['created'];
1995        $toDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
1996
1997        $dateMinus1Year = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 year'));
1998
1999        // Check the last settlement date
2000        $this->Payment->openDBReplica();
2001        $lastSettlement = $this->Payment->find('first', array(
2002            'fields' => array('Payment.created'),
2003            'conditions' => $conditions,
2004            'order' => array('Payment.created DESC'),
2005            'recursive' => -1
2006        ));
2007        $this->Payment->closeDBReplica();
2008
2009        // if last settlement date is more than 1 year ago, adjust $toDate to last settlement date
2010        if ($lastSettlement && strtotime($lastSettlement['Payment']['created']) < strtotime($dateMinus1Year)) {
2011            $toDate = $lastSettlement['Payment']['created'];
2012            $dateMinus1Year = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($toDate . '-1 year'));
2013            $this->set('displayTime', strtotime($lastSettlement['Payment']['created']));
2014        }
2015

2019        } else {
2020            $defFromDate = $dateMinus1Year;
2021            $isMoreThan = 'false';
2022        }
2023
2024        $this->set('fromDate', $userCreated);
2025        $this->set('userCreated', $defFromDate);

2034            'Payment.id',

2053                FROM `payment_receivables` AS `pr`
2054                WHERE `pr`.`payment_id` = `Payment`.`id` LIMIT 1
2055             ) AS `payment_element_type`',

2063                'recursive' => -1,
2064                'conditions' => $conditions,
2065                'joins' => $joins,
2066                'fields' => $fields,
2067                'limit' => 10,

2070                    'Payment.id' => 'DESC'

2072            )
2073        );

2078

2080            usort($payments, function($a, $b) {
2081                $dateA = isset($a['Payment']['created']) ? $a['Payment']['created'] : $a['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['created'];
2082                $dateB = isset($b['Payment']['created']) ? $b['Payment']['created'] : $b['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['created'];
2083                $dateA = strtotime($dateA);
2084                $dateB = strtotime($dateB);
2085
2086                if ($dateA === false || $dateB === false) {
2087                    return 0;
2088                }
2089
2090                return $dateB <=> $dateA;
2091            });
2092        } else if(!$payments && $paidCorporateReceivablePayment) {
2093            $payments = $paidCorporateReceivablePayment;

2338            && ($conditionArr['status'] == 'parent' || $conditionArr['status'] == 'normal')
2339        ) {
2340            $chckLitePlan = in_array($userData['payment_plan_id'], [Configure::read('payment_plans.light_plan'), Configure::read('payment_plans.light_plan_free')] ) ? 1 : 0;
2341            $priceId = !empty($userData['price_id']) ? $userData['price_id'] : null;
2342
2343            $chckChocottoCampPlan = ($userData['payment_plan_id'] == Configure::read('payment_plans.chocotto_plan') ) ? 1 : 0;
2344            
2345            // if light plan free and zero student discount user
2346            if (
2347                $userData['payment_plan_id'] == Configure::read('payment_plans.light_plan_free') &&
2348                $discountOptionData && $discountOptionData['discount_option_id'] == Configure::read('discount_option.zero_student.plan_id')
2349            ) {
2350                $priceId = null;
2351                $chckLitePlan = 1;
2352            }
2353
2354            if (
2355                in_array($userData['payment_plan_id'], [Configure::read('payment_plans.free_trial'), Configure::read('payment_plans.premium_plan')]) &&
2356                $userData['currency_code'] == Configure::read('currency_jpy') &&
2357                in_array($userData['card_company'], [Configure::read('card_company.zeus'), Configure::read('card_company.paypal'), Configure::read('card_company.stripe.apple'), Configure::read('card_company.stripe.google')]) &&
2358                !isset($userData['corporate_id']) &&
2359                !isset($userData['studysapuri_id'])
2360            ) {
2361                $priceId = null;
2362            }
2363
2364            // - get parameters
2365            $monthlyPParams = array(
2366                'currencyCode' => $userData['currency_code'],
2367                'paymentPlanId' => ($chckLitePlan) ? Configure::read('payment_plans.light_plan') : ($chckChocottoCampPlan ? Configure::read('payment_plans.chocotto_plan') : Configure::read('payment_plans.premium_plan')),
2368            );
2369
2370            // - if jpy
2371            if (in_array(strtoupper($userData['currency_code']), array("JPY", "TWD"))) {
2372                //$monthlyPParams['forceUpdate'] = true;
2373                
2374            // - else, use start date
2375            } else {
2376                $monthlyPParams['datetime'] = isset($userData['first_charge_date']) && $userData['first_charge_date'] ? $userData['first_charge_date'] : date("Y-m-d H:i:s");
2377            
2378            }
2379
2380            // get total monthly settlement
2381            $ppData = $this->PaymentPlanPrice->getPaymentData($monthlyPParams);
2382            
2383            $couponAmountUsed = $this->UsersCouponV1->getCouponAmountUse(array(
2384                'userId' => $userData['id'], 
2385                'use_type' => array(1,2,3) // monthly settlement, native, callan
2386            ));
2387
2388            if($ppData) {
2389                $nextMonthlyPayment = $ppData['amount'] - (isset($couponAmountUsed['monthly_payment']) ? (int)$couponAmountUsed['monthly_payment'] : 0); 
2390                $liteMonthlyPayment = ($chckLitePlan && $nextMonthlyPayment > 0) ? $nextMonthlyPayment : 0;
2391            }
2392
2393            // get native option
2394            if ($userData['native_option'] == 1 && $userData['status'] == 1) {
2395                $nativeOptionAmount = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionAmount(array(
2396                    'startDate' => $nextChargeDate,
2397                    'currencyCode' => $userData['currency_code'],
2398                ));
2399                $nativeOptionAmount -= !empty($couponAmountUsed['native_option']) ? $couponAmountUsed['native_option'] : 0;
2400            }
2401
2402            // get callan option
2403            if ($userData['callan_option'] == 1 && $userData['status'] == 1) {
2404                $callanOptionAmount = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionAmount(array(
2405                    'startDate' => $nextChargeDate,
2406                    'currencyCode' => $userData['currency_code'],
2407                    'option_type' => Configure::read('callan_unlimited.options.callan_unlimited_option')
2408                ));
2409                $callanOptionAmount -= !empty($couponAmountUsed['callan_option']) ? $couponAmountUsed['callan_option'] : 0;
2410            }
2411            // family plan monthly settlement
2412            $familyPlanMonthlySettlementAmount = $this->User->getFamilyPlanMonthlySettlement(array(
2413                'parentId' => $userData['id'],
2414                'currencyCode' => $userData['currency_code']
2415            ));
2416
2417            $discountOptionAmount = $discountOptionData ? $discountOptionData['amount'] : 0;
2418            $nextMonthlyPayment -= $discountOptionAmount;
2419
2420            //if next monthly payment is negative, set value to 0s
2421            if ($nextMonthlyPayment < 0) {
2422                $nextMonthlyPayment = 0;
2423            }
2424        }
2425        $userLang = $this->localizeDir;
2426        $this->set('userLang', $userLang);
2427        $this->set('nextMonthlyPayment', $nextMonthlyPayment);
2428        $this->set('chckLitePlan', $chckLitePlan);
2429        $this->set('liteMonthlyPayment', $liteMonthlyPayment);
2430        $this->set('monthlyCouponUsed', $couponAmountUsed['monthly_payment']);
2431        $this->set('callanCouponUsed', $couponAmountUsed['callan_option']);
2432        $this->set('nativeCouponUsed', $couponAmountUsed['native_option']);
2433        $this->set('nativeOptionAmount', $nativeOptionAmount);
2434        $this->set('callanOptionAmount', $callanOptionAmount);
2435        $this->set('familyPlanMonthlySettlementAmount', $familyPlanMonthlySettlementAmount);
2436        $this->set('discountOptionAmount', $discountOptionAmount);
2437        $this->set('chckChocottoCampPlan', $chckChocottoCampPlan);
2438        $this->set('chocottoMonthlyPayment', $chocottoMonthlyPayment);
2439
2440        $isMobile = $this->request->isMobile();
2441
2442        if ($isMobile) {
2443            $this->layout = "mobapp";
2444            $token = !empty($this->request->query['token']) ? $this->request->query['token'] : "";
2445            // if no token
2446            if(empty($token)) {
2447                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/mobapp/retrypage'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
2448            }
2449
2450            // get user by token
2451            $userData = UserTable::validToken($token);
2452
2453            // if has no user information
2454            if (!$userData) {
2455                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/mobapp/retrypage'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
2456            }
2457        } else {
2458            $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
2459        }
2460
2461        // if no user data
2462        if (!$userData) {
2463            return $this->redirect('/'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
2464        }
2465    }
2466     /**
2467     * @apiDefine CheckAllReceipt
2468     * 
2469     * @apiParam {String} token Unique identifier token.
2470     * 
2471     * @apiBody {Date} fromDate Date range for start date.
2472     * @apiBody {Date} toDate Date range for end date.
2473     * @apiBody {String} user_batch_receipt Unique identifier batch receipt.
2474     * @apiBody {String} corporate_receivable_ids Unique identifier corporate id's.
2475     * 
2476     * @apiSuccessExample {json} Success-Response:
2477     * {
2478     *   "user_batch_receipt": [Objects],
2479     *   "batch_receipt_id": 1001
2480     * }
2481     * 
2482     * @apiError {View} fromDateNotFound The fromDate of the User was not found.
2483     * @apiError {View} toDateNotFound The toDate of the User was not found.
2484     * @apiError {View} user_batch_receiptNotFound The user_batch_receipt of the User was not found.
2485     * @apiError {View} corporate_receivable_idsNotFound The corporate_receivable_ids of the User was not found.
2486     */
2487    /**
2488     * @api {post} /payment_history/check-all-receipt checkAllReceipt()
2489     * @apiName check_all_receipt
2490     * @apiGroup Account
2491     *
2492     * @apiUse CheckAllReceipt
2493     * @apiSampleRequest off
2494     */
2495    /**
2496     * @api {post} /:language/payment_history/check-all-receipt checkAllReceipt()
2497     * @apiName language_check_all_receipt
2498     * @apiGroup Account
2499     * 
2500     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
2501      *
2502     * @apiUse CheckAllReceipt
2503     * @apiSampleRequest off
2504     */
2505    public function checkAllReceipt() {
2506        $this->layout = false;
2507        $this->autoRender = false;
2508    
2509        $userData = $this->sharedUserData['User'];
2510        $sqlFamField = null;
2511        $userId = $userData['id'];
2512        $userCorpId = (isset($userData['corporate_id'])) ? $userData['corporate_id'] : '';
2513        $tax = 0.10;
2514        // payment conditions
2515        $conditionArr = $this->Payment->getAccountPaymentCondition($userId);
2516        $conditions = $conditionArr["conditions"];
2517        $lastChargeDate = $this->sharedUserData['User']['last_charge_date'];
2518        
2519        // count receivable payment
2520        $this->Payment->virtualFields['receivable_payment_cnt'] = "(SELECT count(*) FROM payment_receivables pr WHERE pr.payment_id = Payment.id AND status = 2 AND pr.payment_element_type IN (1,2,3) AND pr.payment_element_id IS NOT NULL)";
2521        $this->Payment->virtualFields['latest_premium_plan_payment_date'] = "IFNULL(( SELECT created FROM payments WHERE user_id = Payment.user_id and form_type = ".Configure::read("payment_credit_monthly_payment")."  ORDER BY created DESC LIMIT 1), '')";
2522        if( $conditionArr["has_family"] ) {
2523            // family plan start date
2524            $this->Payment->virtualFields['family_plan_start_date'] = "( Select created from payments where user_id = Payment.user_id and form_type = ".Configure::read("payment_credit_family_monthly_payment")."  order by created ASC limit 1)";
2525            $sqlFamField = 'Payment.family_plan_start_date';
2526            $this->set('parentId', $userId);
2527        }
2528        
2529        if( $conditionArr["status"] == "child" ){
2530            $this->Payment->virtualFields['family_plan_start_date'] = "( Select created from payments where user_id = Payment.user_id and form_type = ".Configure::read("payment_credit_family_monthly_payment")."  order by created ASC limit 1)";
2531            $sqlFamField = 'Payment.family_plan_start_date';
2532        }
2533
2534        $showTax = false;
2535        $joins = array();
2536
2537        if ($userCorpId) {
2538            $corporateAdminPaymentMethod = $this->Corporate->getPaymentMethod($userCorpId);
2539            if (!empty($corporateAdminPaymentMethod)) {
2540                // show tax if corporate individual
2541                if ($corporateAdminPaymentMethod == 1) {
2542                    $showTax = true;
2543
2544                    $joins[] = array(
2545                        'type' => 'LEFT',
2546                        'table' => 'users',
2547                        'alias' => 'User',
2548                        'conditions' => array('User.id = Payment.user_id')
2549                    );
2550                    $joins[] = array(
2551                        'type' => 'LEFT',
2552                        'table' => 'corporates',
2553                        'alias' => 'Corporate',
2554                        'conditions' => array('Corporate.id = User.corporate_id')
2555                    );
2556
2557                // if corporate bank transfer or company card
2558                }
2559            }
2560        }
2561
2562        if($this->request->data['fromDate'] && $this->request->data['toDate']) {
2563            $getFromDate = strval($this->request->data['fromDate'] . ' 00:00:00');
2564            $getToDate = strval($this->request->data['toDate'] . ' 23:59:59');
2565
2566            $conditions["Payment.created BETWEEN ? AND ?"] = array(
2567                $getFromDate,
2568                $getToDate
2569            );
2570        }
2571        
2572        if($this->request->data['user_batch_receipt'] && $this->request->data['user_batch_receipt'] !== null) {
2573            $conditions["Payment.id NOT IN"] = $this->request->data['user_batch_receipt'];
2574        }
2575
2576        // payment fields
2577        $fields = array(
2578            'Payment.id',
2579            'Payment.type_id',
2580            'Payment.pay_kbn',
2581            'Payment.reference_id',
2582            'Payment.amount',
2583            'Payment.discounted_amount',
2584            'Payment.status',
2585            'Payment.created',
2586            'Payment.user_id',
2587            'Payment.form_type',
2588            'Payment.card_company',
2589            'Payment.basic_fee',
2590            'Payment.lesson_fee',
2591            'Payment.lesson_fee_date_started',
2592            'Payment.receivable_payment_cnt',
2593            'Payment.latest_premium_plan_payment_date',
2594            'Payment.payment_id',
2595            $sqlFamField,
2596            'CASE WHEN Payment.form_type = 5 THEN DATE_ADD(Payment.created, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) - INTERVAL 1 DAY WHEN Payment.form_type = 21 THEN DATE_ADD(Payment.created, INTERVAL 1 WEEK) - INTERVAL 1 DAY ELSE NULL END AS created_end',
2597            '(SELECT `payment_element_type`
2598                FROM `payment_receivables` AS `pr`
2599                WHERE `pr`.`payment_id` = `Payment`.`id` LIMIT 1
2600             ) AS `payment_element_type`'
2601        );
2602
2603        $this->Payment->openDBReplica();
2604        $payments = $this->Payment->find('all', array(
2605                'recursive' => -1,
2606                'conditions' => $conditions,
2607                'joins' => $joins,
2608                'fields' => $fields,
2609                'order' => array(
2610                    'Payment.created' => 'DESC',
2611                    'Payment.id' => 'DESC'
2612                )
2613            )
2614        );
2615        $this->Payment->closeDBReplica();
2616
2617        $this->log(__METHOD__ . " : checkAllpaymentssssssss -> " .  json_encode($payments), "debug");
2618
2619        $familyReceivablePayment = $receivablePaymentCount = $receivablePayment = 0;
2620        $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount = 0;
2621        $familyIds = [];
2622        if ($conditionArr['status'] == 'parent') {
2623            // compute receivable payment
2624            $receivablePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($userId);
2625            $receivablePaymentCount = $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;
2626
2627            // get parent family ids
2628            $familyIds = $this->User->getChildId($userId);
2629            if ($familyIds) {
2630                $familyReceivablePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($familyIds);
2631            }
2632            $receivablePayment += $familyReceivablePayment;
2633            $receivablePaymentCount += $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;
2634        } elseif ($conditionArr['status'] == 'normal') {
2635            // compute receivable payment
2636            $receivablePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($userId);
2637            $receivablePaymentCount = $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;
2638        }
2639
2640        // get appreciation payments
2641        $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount = 0;
2642        $familyAppreciationReceivablePayment = $appreciationPaymentCount = $appreciationPayment = 0;
2643        if ($conditionArr['status'] == 'parent') {
2644            // compute receivable payment
2645            $appreciationPayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($userId, false, Configure::read('payment_element_type.appreciation'));
2646            $appreciationPaymentCount = $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;
2647
2648            if ($familyIds) {
2649                //appreciation
2650                $familyAppreciationReceivablePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($familyIds, false, Configure::read('payment_element_type.appreciation'));
2651                $appreciationPayment += $familyAppreciationReceivablePayment;
2652                $appreciationPaymentCount += $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;                                
2653            }
2654        } elseif ($conditionArr['status'] == 'normal') {
2655            // compute receivable payment
2656            $appreciationPayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($userId, false, Configure::read('payment_element_type.appreciation'));
2657            $appreciationPaymentCount = $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;    
2658        }
2659        
2660        // get live lesson payments
2661        $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount = 0;
2662        $familyLiveReceivablePayment = $livePaymentCount = $livePayment = 0;
2663        if ($conditionArr['status'] == 'parent') {
2664            // compute receivable payment
2665            $livePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($userId, false, Configure::read('payment_element_type.live'));
2666            $livePaymentCount = $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;
2667
2668            if ($familyIds) {
2669                $familyLiveReceivablePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($familyIds, false, Configure::read('payment_element_type.live'));
2670            }
2671            $livePayment += $familyLiveReceivablePayment;
2672            $livePaymentCount += $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;
2673        } elseif ($conditionArr['status'] == 'normal') {
2674            // compute receivable payment
2675            $livePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($userId, false, Configure::read('payment_element_type.live'));
2676            $livePaymentCount = $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;
2677        }        
2678
2679        // set page title
2680        $title = 'ご利用明細 | オンライン英会話のネイティブキャンプ';
2681        if (!empty($payments)) {
2682            foreach($payments as $key => $val) {
2683                $payments[$key]['Payment']['nextChargeDate'] = $this->User->getNextChargeDate($val['Payment']['user_id'],$val['Payment']['created']);
2684             
2685            }
2686        }
2687
2688        // if has unpaid receivable and is corporate user
2689        if ($receivablePaymentCount && isset($userCorpId)) {
2690            // check if last charge date is null or is equals to 0000-00-00 00:00:00
2691            if (!isset($lastChargeDate) || $lastChargeDate == '0000-00-00 00:00:00') {
2692                // set first unpaid payment receivable created date as last charge date
2693                if ($unpaidReceivableDate = $this->PaymentReceivable->getFirstUnpaidCreatedDate($userId)){
2694                    $lastChargeDate = $unpaidReceivableDate;
2695                }
2696            }
2697        }
2698
2699        // next charge date
2700        $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
2701        if (
2702            isset($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date']) && 
2703            !is_null($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date'])
2704        ) {
2705            $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date'] . '-1 minute'));
2706        }            
2707        
2708        // set form_types
2709        $appPlanFormTypes = array(Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_paid'), Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_free'));
2710        $premiumPlanFormTypes = array(
2711            Configure::read('payment_credit_monthly_payment'),
2712            Configure::read('payment_credit_force_charge'),
2713            Configure::read('payment_credit_retry'),
2714            Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_upgrade'),
2715        );
2716        $litePlanFormTypes = array (
2717            Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_paid'),
2718            Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_monthly_payment'),
2719            Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_retry'),
2720            Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_downgrade')
2721        );
2722        $chocottoCampFormTypes = array (
2723            Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_monthly_payment'),
2724            Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_retry'),
2725            Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_force_charge'),
2726        );
2727        $textbookPurchaseFormType = array(Configure::read('payment_credit_textbook_purchase'));
2728        $coinPurchaseFormType = array(Configure::read('payment_credit_coin_purchase'));
2729        $paymentReceivableFormType = array(
2730            Configure::read('payment_credit_receivable'),
2731            Configure::read('payment_appreciation_receivable'),
2732            Configure::read('payment_live_lesson_receivable')
2733        );
2734        $familyMonthlyFormType = array(Configure::read('payment_credit_family_monthly_payment'));
2735        $coporateIndiFormTypes = array(
2736            Configure::read('payment_prepaid_corporate_light_member'),
2737            Configure::read('payment_prepaid_corporate_light_member_lesson'),
2738            Configure::read('payment_individual_corporate_standard'),
2739            Configure::read('payment_individual_corporate_premium')
2740        );
2741        $htadoFormType = array(Configure::read('payment_halfway_termination_of_annual_discount_option'));
2742
2743        //NC-8704
2744        $nativeOptioFormTypes = array(Configure::read('payment_native_option_join'), Configure::read('payment_native_option_monthly_payment'));
2745        $callanOptioFormTypes = array(Configure::read('payment_callan_option_join'), Configure::read('payment_callan_option_monthly_payment'));
2746        $currency = $this->Currency->getSymbolAndPosition($this->sharedUserData['User']['currency_code']);
2747
2748
2749        $isMobile = $this->request->isMobile();
2750
2751        $this->log(__METHOD__ . " : aaaaaaaaaaaaaa -> " .  json_encode($userData), "debug");
2752
2753        if ($isMobile) {
2754            $this->layout = "mobapp";
2755            $token = !empty($this->request->query['token']) ? $this->request->query['token'] : "";
2756            // if no token
2757            if(empty($token)) {
2758                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/mobapp/retrypage'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
2759            }
2760
2761            // get user by token
2762            $userData = UserTable::validToken($token);
2763
2764            // if has no user information
2765            if (!$userData) {
2766                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/mobapp/retrypage'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
2767            }
2768        } else {
2769            $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
2770        }
2771        
2772        // if no user data
2773        if (!$userData) {
2774            return $this->redirect('/'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
2775        }
2776
2777        $requestdata = $this->request->data;
2778        $corporateIds = (isset($requestdata['corporate_receivable_ids'])) ? $requestdata['corporate_receivable_ids'] : '';
2779        $this->Session->delete('corporateReceivableBatchIds');
2780        if(sizeOf($payments) == 0 && !$corporateIds) {
2781            return;
2782        }
2783
2784        $has_family = $conditionArr["has_family"];
2785        $userType = $conditionArr["status"];
2786
2787        $user_batch_receipt = array();
2788        if($payments && count($payments) > 0) {
2789            foreach($payments as $key => $payment) { 
2790                // $user_batch_receipt[] = $payment;
2791                if(!$has_family) {
2792                    $flag = false;
2793                }    
2794                $paymentTable = new PaymentTable($payment['Payment']);
2795                if (in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], array_merge($premiumPlanFormTypes, $appPlanFormTypes, $litePlanFormTypes, $coporateIndiFormTypes, $familyMonthlyFormType))) {
2796                    $flag = true;
2797                    $nextMP = $paymentTable->getNextMonthlyPayment(); 
2798                    $nextChargeDate = false;
2799                    $lastChargeDate = $payment['Payment']['created'];
2800                    
2801                    // if payment was created
2802                    if (isset($nextMP['Payment']['created'])) {
2803                        $nextChargeDate = $nextMP['Payment']['created'];
2804                    } else {
2805                        // if mobile
2806                        if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $appPlanFormTypes)) {
2807                            $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($payment['Payment']['created']));
2808                                
2809                        // if pc
2810                        } else {
2811                            $nextChargeDate = $payment['Payment']['nextChargeDate'];
2812        
2813                        }
2814                    }
2815        
2816                    // subtract 1 day
2817                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
2818        
2819                    // if last charge date is equal to next charge date
2820                    if (strtotime($nextChargeDate) <= strtotime($lastChargeDate)) {
2821                        $nextChargeDate = $lastChargeDate;
2822                    }
2823        
2824                // if receivable payment type
2825                } else if (in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], ($paymentReceivableFormType))) {
2826                    $flag = true;
2827                    $lastMP = $paymentTable->getLastMonthlyPayment(); 
2828                    $lastChargeDate = $nextChargeDate = false;
2829                    // if payment was created
2830                    if (isset($lastMP['Payment']['created'])) {
2831                        $lastChargeDate = $lastMP['Payment']['created'];
2832                    
2833                    // if has no duration
2834                    } else {
2835                        $aMonth = date('Y-m-d H:i:s',(strtotime('last month',strtotime(date($payment['Payment']['created'])))));
2836                        $lastChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($aMonth));
2837                    }
2838        
2839                    // if last charge date is equal to next charge date
2840                    if (strtotime($nextChargeDate) <= strtotime($lastChargeDate)) {
2841                        $nextChargeDate = $lastChargeDate;
2842                    }
2843                }
2844                
2845                // NC-3318
2846                $parentNormalCondition = ( $userType == "parent" || $userType == "child" || $userType == "normal" ); // allow entry
2847                $childCondition = ( isset($payment['Payment']['family_plan_start_date']) && strtotime($payment['Payment']['family_plan_start_date']) > strtotime($payment['Payment']['created']) );
2848                $mainFilterCondition = ( $userType == "parent" || $userType == "normal" ) ? $parentNormalCondition : $childCondition ;
2849
2850                if( $mainFilterCondition ) {
2851                    // <!-- if premium plan -->
2852                    if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], array_merge($premiumPlanFormTypes, $appPlanFormTypes))) {
2853                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'premium_plan,1,monthly'.','.$payment['Payment']['id'];
2854                    }
2855                    if (in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $litePlanFormTypes)) {
2856                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'lite_plan,1,monthly'.','.$payment['Payment']['id'];
2857                    }
2858                    if (in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $chocottoCampFormTypes)) {
2859                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'chocotto_camp,1,monthly'.','.$payment['Payment']['id'];
2860                    }
2861                    // <!-- Corporarate Prepaid  -->
2862                    if (in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $coporateIndiFormTypes)) {
2863                        $flag = true;
2864                        $cPayment = $payment['Payment'];
2865                        $basicFee = isset($cPayment['basic_fee']) ? $cPayment['basic_fee'] : 0;
2866                        $basicFee = $basicFee / 1.1;
2867                        $basicFeeTax = $basicFee * $tax;
2868                        $lessonFee = isset($cPayment['lesson_fee']) ? $cPayment['lesson_fee'] : 0;
2869                        $lessonFee = $lessonFee / 1.1;
2870                        $lessonFeeTax = $lessonFee * $tax;
2871
2872                        // <!-- Premium or Standard -->
2873                        if (empty($basicFee) && empty($lessonFee)){
2874                            $user_batch_receipt[] = 'empty_basic_fee,1,monthly,' .$payment['Payment']['id'];
2875                        }
2876                        // <!-- Light Basic Fee -->
2877                        if( $basicFee > 0 ) {
2878                            $user_batch_receipt[] = 'has_basic_fee,1, ' .$basicFee. ',' .$basicFeeTax. ',light,1,monthly,' .$payment['Payment']['id'];
2879                        }
2880                        // <!-- Light Lesson Fee -->
2881                        if( $lessonFee > 0 ) {
2882                            $user_batch_receipt[] = 'lesson_fee,1,' .$lessonFee. ',' .$lessonFeeTax. ',light,1,monthly,' .$payment['Payment']['id'];
2883                        }
2884                    }
2885
2886                    // <!-- if receivable payments -->
2887                    if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $paymentReceivableFormType)) {
2888                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'recievable_payments,1,reserve,' .$payment['Payment']['id']. ',' .$payment['Payment']['user_id'];
2889                    }
2890
2891                    // <!-- if textbook payment -->
2892                    if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $textbookPurchaseFormType)) {
2893                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'textbook_payment,1,textbook,' .$payment['Payment']['id'];
2894                    }
2895
2896                    // <!-- if coin -->
2897                    if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $coinPurchaseFormType)) {
2898                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'coin_payment,1,coin,' .$payment['Payment']['id'];
2899                    }
2900
2901                    // <!-- native option plan payment -->
2902                    if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $nativeOptioFormTypes)) {
2903                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'native_plan_payment,1,nativeoption,' .$payment['Payment']['id'] . ','.$payment['Payment']['latest_premium_plan_payment_date'];
2904                    }
2905
2906                    // - callan option plan payment
2907                    if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $callanOptioFormTypes)) {
2908                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'callan_plan_payment,1,callanoption,' . $payment['Payment']['id'] . ','.$payment['Payment']['form_type'];
2909                    }
2910
2911                    // - annual discount option cancellation fee
2912                    if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $htadoFormType)) {
2913                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'annual_discount_option_cancellation_fee,1,annualdicountoptioncancellation,' . $payment['Payment']['id'] . ','.$payment['Payment']['form_type'];
2914                    }
2915                }
2916
2917                // <!-- family monthly payment -->
2918                if( $userType == "parent" || $userType == "normal" ) {
2919                    $flag = true;
2920                    if(in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $familyMonthlyFormType)) {
2921                        $user_batch_receipt[] = 'family_monthly_payment,1,coin,' .$payment['Payment']['id']. ',FamilyPlan';
2922                    }
2923                }
2924            }
2925        }
2926
2927        $this->log(__METHOD__ . " : user_batch_receipt_test -> " .  json_encode($user_batch_receipt), "debug");
2928
2929        $receiptNewArray = array();
2930        $receiptNewArrayIds = array();
2931        $paymentIDs = array();
2932        $dataResults = array();
2933
2934        $annual_discount_option_cancellation = $premium = $liteplan = $empty_basic = $has_basic = $lesson = $recievable = $textbook = $coin = $native_plan = $family_monthly = array();
2935
2936        if (!empty($user_batch_receipt)) {
2937            foreach ($user_batch_receipt as $key => $userBatchReceiptData) {
2938                $data = explode(',', $userBatchReceiptData);

3133                    $family_monthly_payment  = array(
3134                        'coin' => $data['1'],
3135                        'type' => $data['2'],
3136                        'payment_id' => $data['3'],
3137                        'purchaseDetail' => $data['4']
3138                    );
3139                    array_push($receiptNewArray, $family_monthly_payment);
3140                    array_push($receiptNewArrayIds, $family_monthly_payment['payment_id']);
3141                    array_push($family_monthly, array($family_monthly_payment['payment_id'], $key));
3142                }
3143            }
3144
3145            $newArrays = array(
3146                'receiptNewArray' => $receiptNewArray,
3147                'receiptNewArrayIds' => $receiptNewArrayIds,
3148                'premium' => $premium,
3149                'liteplan' => $liteplan,
3150                'chocottocamp' => $chocotto_camp,
3151                'empty_basic' => $empty_basic,
3152                'has_basic' => $has_basic,
3153                'lesson' => $lesson,
3154                'recievable' => $recievable,
3155                'textbook' => $textbook,
3156                'coin' => $coin,
3157                'native_plan' => $native_plan,
3158                'family_monthly' => $family_monthly,
3159                'annual_discount_option_cancellation' => $annual_discount_option_cancellation
3160            );
3161
3162            $this->Session->write('receiptNewArray', $newArrays);
3163            $dataResults['user_batch_receipt'] = $user_batch_receipt;
3164        }
3165
3166        if ($corporateIds) {
3167            $dataResults['user_batch_receipt'] = array_merge($dataResults, $corporateIds);
3168            $this->Session->write('corporateReceivableBatchIds', $corporateIds);
3169        }
3170
3171        if ($dataResults) {
3172            $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->openDBReplica();
3173            $lastInsertedID = $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->find('first', array(
3174                    'recursive' => -1,
3175                    'fields' => ['id'],
3176                    'order' => array(
3177                        'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt.id' => 'DESC'
3178                    ),
3179                )
3180            );
3181            $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->closeDBReplica();
3182
3183            $this->log(__METHOD__ . " : lastInsertedID -> " .  json_encode($lastInsertedID), "debug");
3184            $dataResults['batch_receipt_id'] = $lastInsertedID['PaymentBatchIssueReceipt']['id'] + 1;
3185        }
3186
3187        return json_encode($dataResults);
3188        // return json_encode($receiptNewArray);
3189    }
3190     /**
3191     * @apiDefine LoadMoreData
3192     *
3193     * @apiParam {String} token Unique identifier.
3194     * @apiBody {Number} onScrollLimit Set scroll limit.
3195     * @apiBody {Number} page Set number of the page.
3196     * @apiBody {Boolean} isSearch Check if request is serach or not.
3197     * @apiBody {Number} offset Set the offset.
3198     * @apiBody {Date} fromDate Set start date.
3199     * @apiBody {Date} toDate Set end date.
3200     * 
3201     * @apiSuccess {View} parentId Set the parent id value.
3202     * 
3203     * @apiSuccessExample {json} Success-Response:
3204      * {
3205      *   "payments": [Objects],
3206      *   "paymentCount": [Objects]
3207      * }
3208     * 
3209     * @apiError {View} TokenNotFound The token is not found.
3210     * @apiError {View} OnScrollLimitNotFound The onScrollLimit is not found.
3211     * @apiError {View} PageNotFound The page is not found.
3212     * @apiError {View} IsSearchNotFound The isSearch is not found.
3213     * @apiError {View} OffsetNotFound The offset is not found.
3214     * @apiError {View} FromDateNotFound The fromDate is not found.
3215     * @apiError {View} ToDateNotFound The toDate is not found.
3216     */
3217    /**
3218     * @api {post} /payment_history/load-more-data loadMoreData()
3219     * @apiName load_more_data
3220     * @apiGroup Account
3221     *

3223     * @apiSampleRequest off
3224     */
3225    /**

3235    public function loadMoreData($queryValue = array()) {

3239        $result = array();

3245        $tax = 0.10;

3298
3299                // if corporate bank transfer or company card
3300                if (in_array($corporateAdminPaymentMethod, [0, 2])) {
3301                    $toDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
3302                    $dateMinus1Year = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 year'));

3306

3318

3320            'type' => 'LEFT',

3324        ];
3325

3329            
3330            $conditions["Payment.created BETWEEN ? AND ?"] = array(
3331                $getFromDate,
3332                $getToDate
3333            );
3334        }
3335
3336        $this->Payment->virtualFields['original_payment_amount'] = "SELECT psp.amount FROM payment_svc_prices AS psp WHERE psp.id = Payment.price_id";
3337

3358            '(SELECT `payment_element_type`
3359                FROM `payment_receivables` AS `pr`
3360                WHERE `pr`.`payment_id` = `Payment`.`id` LIMIT 1

3370        $offset = $this->request->data['offset'];
3371
3372        $this->Payment->openDBReplica();
3373        $payments = $this->Payment->find('all', array(
3374                'recursive' => -1,
3375                'conditions' => $conditions,
3376                'joins' => $joins,
3377                'fields' => $fields,
3378                'limit' => $limit,
3379                'offset' => $offset,
3380                'order' => array(
3381                    'Payment.created' => 'DESC',
3382                    'Payment.id' => 'DESC'
3383                )
3384            )
3385        );
3386        $this->Payment->closeDBReplica();
3387
3388        // NJ-46750
3389        if($payments){
3390            $ordd = '';
3391            $discountedAmount = 0;
3392            $i = 0;
3393            $formTypes = array(
3394                Configure::read('payment_credit_monthly_payment'),
3395                Configure::read('payment_credit_force_charge'),
3396                Configure::read('payment_credit_retry'),
3397                Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_monthly_payment'),
3398                Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_retry'),
3399                Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_force_charge')
3400            );
3401            sort($payments);
3402            foreach ($payments as $key => $payment) {
3403                if ($ordd != $payment['Payment']['ordd']) {
3404                    $ordd = $payment['Payment']['ordd'];
3405                    $discountedAmount = $payment['Payment']['discounted_amount'];
3406
3407                    // check for discount
3408                    if (isset($payment['DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory']['amount'])) {
3409                        $payment['Payment']['original_payment_amount'] -= $payment['DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory']['amount'];
3410                    }
3411
3412                    if (in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $formTypes) && $payment['Payment']['original_payment_amount'] <= $discountedAmount) {
3413                        $payment['Payment']['discounted_amount'] = $payment['Payment']['original_payment_amount'];
3414                        $discountedAmount -= $payment['Payment']['original_payment_amount'];
3415
3416                    } else if (in_array($payment['Payment']['form_type'], $formTypes) && $payment['Payment']['original_payment_amount'] >= $discountedAmount) {
3417                        $payment['Payment']['discounted_amount'] = $discountedAmount;
3418                        $discountedAmount = 0;
3419                    }
3420                } else {
3421                    if ($discountedAmount) {
3422                        $payment['Payment']['discounted_amount'] = $discountedAmount;
3423                        $discountedAmount = 0;
3424                    } else {
3425                        $payment['Payment']['discounted_amount'] = 0;
3426                    }
3427                }
3428
3429                // reset
3430                $payments[$key]['Payment']['discounted_amount'] = $payment['Payment']['discounted_amount'];
3431
3432                $i++;
3433            }
3434            rsort($payments);
3435        }
3436
3437        if ($payments && $paidCorporateReceivablePayment) {
3438            // Merge the arrays
3439            $payments = array_merge_recursive($payments, $paidCorporateReceivablePayment);
3440
3441            // Sort the merged payment data by date
3442            usort($payments, function($a, $b) {
3443                $dateA = isset($a['Payment']['created']) ? $a['Payment']['created'] : $a['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['created'];
3444                $dateB = isset($b['Payment']['created']) ? $b['Payment']['created'] : $b['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['created'];
3445                $dateA = strtotime($dateA);
3446                $dateB = strtotime($dateB);
3447
3448                if ($dateA === false || $dateB === false) {
3449                    return 0;
3450                }
3451
3452                return $dateB <=> $dateA;
3453            });
3454        } else if(!$payments && $paidCorporateReceivablePayment) {
3455            $payments = $paidCorporateReceivablePayment;
3456        }
3457
3458        $familyReceivablePayment = $receivablePaymentCount = $receivablePayment = 0;
3459        $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount = 0;
3460        $familyIds = [];
3461        if ($conditionArr['status'] == 'parent') {
3462            // compute receivable payment
3463            $receivablePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($userId);
3464            $receivablePaymentCount = $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;

3470            }
3471            $receivablePayment += $familyReceivablePayment;
3472            $receivablePaymentCount += $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount;
3473        } elseif ($conditionArr['status'] == 'normal') {
3474            // compute receivable payment
3475            $receivablePayment = $this->PaymentReceivable->computeReceivableReservationPayment($userId);

3492            }

3494            // compute receivable payment

3497        }
3498        
3499        // get live lesson payments
3500        $this->PaymentReceivable->receivablePaymentCount = 0;

3502        if ($conditionArr['status'] == 'parent') {

3530        if (!empty($payments)) {
3531            foreach($payments as $key => $val) {
3532                $payments[$key]['Payment']['nextChargeDate'] = $this->User->getNextChargeDate($val['Payment']['user_id'],$val['Payment']['created']);
