3538                $dateRange = false;
3539                
3540                if (isset($val['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']) && in_array($val['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['type'], [3,4,5,6])) {
3541                    $showTax = true;
3542                }
3543                
3544                if(in_array($val['Payment']['form_type'], $nativeOptionTypes)) {
3545                    $dateRange = true;
3546                    $computeParams['option_type'] = 1;
3547                    
3548                } else if(in_array($val['Payment']['form_type'], $callanOptionTypes)) {
3549                   $dateRange = true;
3550                   $computeParams['option_type'] = 2;
3551                }
3552                
3553                if ($dateRange) {
3554                    $payments[$key]['Payment']['optionDateRange'] = $this->NativeOption->computeDateRange($computeParams);
3555                }
3556                if (isset($val['Payment'])) {
3557                    $payments[$key]['Payment']['nextChargeDate'] = $this->User->getNextChargeDate($val['Payment']['user_id'],$val['Payment']['created']);
3558                }
3559                
3560                if (isset($val['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']) && in_array($val['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['type'], [3,4,5,6])) {
3561                    $showTax = true;
3562                }
3563               
3564            }
3565        }
3566
3567        // if has unpaid receivable and is corporate user
3568        if ($receivablePaymentCount && isset($userCorpId)) {
3569            // check if last charge date is null or is equals to 0000-00-00 00:00:00
3570            if (!isset($lastChargeDate) || $lastChargeDate == '0000-00-00 00:00:00') {
3571                // set first unpaid payment receivable created date as last charge date
3572                if ($unpaidReceivableDate = $this->PaymentReceivable->getFirstUnpaidCreatedDate($userId)){
3573                    $lastChargeDate = $unpaidReceivableDate;
3574                }
3575            }
3576        }
3577
3578        // next charge date
3579        $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
3580        if (
3581            isset($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date']) && 
3582            !is_null($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date'])
3583        ) {
3584            $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date'] . '-1 minute'));
3585        }            
3586        
3587        // set form_types
3588        $appPlanFormTypes = array(Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_paid'), Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_free'));
3589        $premiumPlanFormTypes = array(
3590            Configure::read('payment_credit_monthly_payment'),
3591            Configure::read('payment_credit_force_charge'),
3592            Configure::read('payment_credit_retry'),
3593            Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_upgrade'),
3594        );
3595        $litePlanFormTypes = array (
3596            Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_paid'),
3597            Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_monthly_payment'),
3598            Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_retry'),
3599            Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_downgrade')
3600        );
3601
3602        $chocottoCampFormTypes = array (
3603            Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_monthly_payment'),
3604            Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_retry'),
3605            Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_force_charge'),
3606        );
3607        
3608        $textbookPurchaseFormType = array(Configure::read('payment_credit_textbook_purchase'));
3609        $coinPurchaseFormType = array(Configure::read('payment_credit_coin_purchase'));
3610        $paymentReceivableFormType = array(
3611            Configure::read('payment_credit_receivable'),
3612            Configure::read('payment_appreciation_receivable'),
3613            Configure::read('payment_live_lesson_receivable')
3614        );
3615        $familyMonthlyFormType = array(Configure::read('payment_credit_family_monthly_payment'));
3616        $coporateIndiFormTypes = array(
3617            Configure::read('payment_prepaid_corporate_light_member'),
3618            Configure::read('payment_prepaid_corporate_light_member_lesson'),
3619            Configure::read('payment_individual_corporate_standard'),
3620            Configure::read('payment_individual_corporate_premium')
3621        );
3622
3623        //NC-8704
3624        $nativeOptioFormTypes = array(Configure::read('payment_native_option_join'), Configure::read('payment_native_option_monthly_payment'));
3625        $currency = $this->Currency->getSymbolAndPosition($this->sharedUserData['User']['currency_code']);
3626
3627        $callanOptioFormTypes = array(Configure::read('payment_callan_option_join'), Configure::read('payment_callan_option_monthly_payment'));
3628
3629        $isMobile = $this->request->isMobile();
3630
3631        if ($isMobile) {
3632            $this->layout = "mobapp";
3633            $token = !empty($this->request->query['token']) ? $this->request->query['token'] : "";
3634            // if no token
3635            if(empty($token)) {
3636                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/mobapp/retrypage'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
3637            }
3638
3639            // get user by token
3640            $userData = UserTable::validToken($token);
3641
3642            // if has no user information
3643            if (!$userData) {
3644                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/mobapp/retrypage'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
3645            }
3646        } else {
3647            $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
3648        }
3649
3650        // if no user data
3651        if (!$userData) {
3652            return $this->redirect('/'.myTools::getMobappToken($_GET));
3653        }
3654
3655        if(sizeOf($payments) == 0) {
3656            return;
3657        }
3658
3659        $content = $view->element('seeMoreReceipt', array(
3660            'payments' => $payments,
3661            'showTax' => $showTax,
3662            'tax' => $tax,
3663            'nativeOptionMonthlyAmount' => $nativeOptionMonthlyAmount,
3664            // set title for layout
3665            'title_for_layout' => $title,
3666
3667            // set page css
3668            'page_css' => $page_css ?? '',
3669
3670            // next charge date
3671            'nextChargeDate' => $nextChargeDate,
3672            'lastChargeDate' => $lastChargeDate,
3673
3674            // set receivable payment info
3675            'receivablePayment' => $receivablePayment,
3676            'receivablePaymentCount' => $receivablePaymentCount,
3677
3678            // set live receivable payment info
3679            // set receivable payment info
3680            'appreciationPayment' => $appreciationPayment,
3681            'appreciationPaymentCount' => $appreciationPaymentCount,
3682            'livePayment' => $livePayment,
3683            'livePaymentCount' => $livePaymentCount,
3684
3685            // set form_types
3686            'appPlanFormTypes' => $appPlanFormTypes,
3687            'premiumPlanFormTypes' => $premiumPlanFormTypes,
3688            'litePlanFormTypes' =>     $litePlanFormTypes,
3689            'textbookPurchaseFormType' => $textbookPurchaseFormType,
3690            'coinPurchaseFormType' => $coinPurchaseFormType,
3691            'paymentReceivableFormType' => $paymentReceivableFormType,
3692            'familyMonthlyFormType' => $familyMonthlyFormType,
3693            'coporateIndiFormTypes' => $coporateIndiFormTypes,
3694            'chocottoCampFormTypes' => $chocottoCampFormTypes,
3695            
3696            //NC-8704
3697            'nativeOptioFormTypes' => $nativeOptioFormTypes,
3698            'callanOptioFormTypes' => $callanOptioFormTypes,
3699            'hasFamily' => $conditionArr["has_family"],
3700            'userType' => $conditionArr["status"],
3701            'currencySymbol' => $currency['symbol'],
3702            'prefixSuffixFlg' => $currency['prefix_suffix_flg'],
3703
3704            //searhBtn
3705            'isSearch' => $isSearch,
3706            'userLang' => $this->localizeDir,
3707        ));
3708
3709        $result['payments'] = $content;
3710        $result['paymentCount'] = $payments;
3711
3712        return json_encode($result);
3713    }
3714    /**
3715     * @apiDefine ReceiptReserve
3716     *
3717     * @apiParam {Number} type Check if type is (1,2,3).
3718     * @apiParam {Number} user_id Unique user identifier.
3719     * @apiParam {Number} status Check if status is enabled or disabled.
3720     * @apiParam {Number} payment_id User unique payment ID.
3721     * 
3722     * @apiSuccess {String} page_css CSS class name for the payment history page layout.
3723      * @apiSuccess {Object[]} receivablePayments List of receivable payments with respective details.
3724      * @apiSuccess {Number} receivablePaymentAmount Total amount for receivable payments.
3725      * @apiSuccess {String} nextChargeDate Date and time of the next scheduled charge.
3726      * @apiSuccess {String} lastChargeDate Date and time of the last charge.
3727      * @apiSuccess {Object[]} paymentTable Array of objects with details about each payment record.
3728      * @apiSuccess {String} paymentElementType Type of the payment element.
3729      * @apiSuccess {String} currencySymbol Symbol for the currency in use.
3730      * @apiSuccess {Number} prefixSuffixFlg Flag indicating currency symbol position (1 for prefix, 0 for suffix).
3731      * @apiSuccess {String} userLang Language code for the user's localization settings.
3732     * @apiSuccess {View} render Redirect to /Account/payment_history_reserve.
3733     * 
3734     * @apiError {View} TypeNotFound Type is not set or no value.
3735     * @apiError {View} user_idNotFound User ID is not set or no value.
3736     * @apiError {View} statusNotFound Status is not set or no value.
3737     * @apiError {View} payment_idNotFound Payment ID is not set or no value.
3738     */
3739    /**
3740     * @api {post} /account/payment_history_reserve receipt_reserve()
3741     * @apiName receipt_reserve
3742     * @apiGroup Account
3743     *
3744     * @apiUse ReceiptReserve
3745     * @apiSampleRequest off
3746     */
3747    /**
3748     * @api {post} /:language/account/payment_history_reserve receipt_reserve()
3749     * @apiName language_receipt_reserve
3750     * @apiGroup Account
3751     * 
3752     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
3753      *
3754     * @apiUse ReceiptReserve
3755     * @apiSampleRequest off
3756     */
3757    public function receipt_reserve() {
3758        $data = $this->request->query;
3759        $paymentInfo = $paymentTable = null;
3760        $receivablePaymentAmount = 0;
3761        $parentId = $this->Auth->user('id');
3762        $type = in_array($data['type'], array(1, 2, 3)) ? $data['type'] : 1;
3763        $userId = isset($data['user_id']) && !empty($data['user_id']) ? $data['user_id'] : $parentId;
3764
3765        // This will be check if the id is parent 
3766        $conditionArr = $this->Payment->getAccountPaymentCondition($parentId);
3767        if ($conditionArr['status'] == 'parent') {
3768            // get parent family ids
3769            $familyIds = $this->User->getChildId($parentId);
3770            $familyIds[] = $parentId;
3771        } else {
3772            $familyIds = $parentId;
3773        }
3774        
3775        //NJ-47182: Make sure that the user is part of the family or the current auth user
3776        if(is_array($familyIds) && !in_array($userId, $familyIds)) {
3777            throw new Exception("Error: invalid user!");
3778        }
3779
3780        if(isset($data['user_id']) && !empty($data['user_id'])) {
3781            $familyIds = $data['user_id'];
3782        }
3783        
3784        $conditions = array(
3785            'PaymentReceivable.user_id' => $familyIds,
3786            'PaymentReceivable.payment_element_type' => $type
3787        );
3788        
3789        // get charge dates
3790        $nextChargeDate = date("Y-m-d H:i:s", strtotime($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date'] . " -1 minute"));
3791        $lastChargeDate = $this->sharedUserData['User']['last_charge_date'];
3792
3793        // set last charge date using next charge date minus 1 month if empty or is equals to '0000-00-00 00:00:00'
3794        if (empty($lastChargeDate) || $lastChargeDate == '0000-00-00 00:00:00') {
3795            $lastChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', (strtotime('last month' . $nextChargeDate)));
3796        }
3797
3798        // check if required parameters are present
3799        if (
3800            // if get "receivable" receivable payments
3801            !(isset($data['status']) && $data['status'] == 0) &&
3802            
3803            // if get "received" receivable payments
3804            !(isset($data['status']) && 
3805            $data['status'] == 2 && 
3806            isset($data['payment_id']) &&
3807            $data['payment_id'])
3808        ) {
3809            throw new Exception("Error: invalid parameters!");
3810        }
3811        
3812        // if status exists
3813        if (isset($data['status'])) {
3814            // if get "receivable" payment
3815            if ($data['status'] == 0) {
3816                $conditions['PaymentReceivable.payment_id'] = null;
3817                $conditions['PaymentReceivable.status'] = 0;
3818
3819            // if get "received" payment
3820            } else if ($data['status'] == 2) {
3821                $conditions['PaymentReceivable.payment_id'] = $data['payment_id'];
3822                $conditions['PaymentReceivable.status'] = 2;
3823            
3824            }
3825        }
3826        
3827        // get payment info
3828        if (isset($data['payment_id'])) {
3829            $paymentInfo = $this->Payment->useReplica()->find('first', array(
3830                'conditions' => array(
3831                    'Payment.id' => $data['payment_id']
3832                ),
3833                'recursive' => -1
3834            ));
3835            
3836            // payment information
3837            if ($paymentInfo) {
3838                $paymentTable = new PaymentTable($paymentInfo['Payment']);
3839            }
3840
3841            // last charge date
3842            if (isset($paymentTable) && is_object($paymentTable)) {
3843                $lastMP = $paymentTable->getLastMonthlyPayment();
3844            }
3845            // if payment was created
3846            if (isset($lastMP['Payment']['created'])) {
3847                $lastChargeDate = $lastMP['Payment']['created'];
3848                $nextChargeDate = date("Y-m-d H:i:s", strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created']));
3849            // if has no duration
3850            } else {
3851                $lastChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s',(strtotime('last month',strtotime(date($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])))));
3852                $nextChargeDate = date("Y-m-d H:i:s", strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'] . " -1 day"));
3853            }
3854
3855            // if last charge date is equal to next charge date
3856            if (
3857                $paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] <> Configure::read('payment_live_lesson_receivable') &&
3858                strtotime($nextChargeDate) <= strtotime($lastChargeDate)
3859            ) {
3860                $nextChargeDate = $lastChargeDate;
3861            }
3862        }
3863
3864        // count receivable payment
3865        $this->PaymentReceivable->virtualFields['lesson_time'] = "(
3866            CASE
3867                WHEN
3868                    (SELECT
3869                            first_connect_time
3870                        FROM
3871                            lesson_onairs_viewers
3872                        WHERE
3873                            id = PaymentReceivable.payment_element_id 
3874                            AND PaymentReceivable.payment_element_type = 3) IS NOT NULL
3875                THEN
3876                    (SELECT 
3877                            first_connect_time
3878                        FROM
3879                            lesson_onairs_viewers
3880                        WHERE
3881                            id = PaymentReceivable.payment_element_id AND 
3882                            PaymentReceivable.payment_element_type = 3)            
3883                WHEN 
3884                    PaymentReceivable.payment_element_type = 2
3885                THEN 
3886                    (SELECT 
3887                        lesson_start_time
3888                    FROM
3889                        teacher_coin_box
3890                    WHERE
3891                        id = PaymentReceivable.payment_element_id)                    
3892                WHEN
3893                    (SELECT 
3894                            lesson_time
3895                        FROM
3896                            lesson_schedules
3897                        WHERE
3898                            id = PaymentReceivable.payment_element_id) IS NOT NULL
3899                THEN
3900                    (SELECT 
3901                            lesson_time
3902                        FROM
3903                            lesson_schedules
3904                        WHERE
3905                            id = PaymentReceivable.payment_element_id)
3906                WHEN
3907                    (SELECT 
3908                            lesson_time
3909                        FROM
3910                            lesson_schedule_cancelled
3911                        WHERE
3912                            reservation_id = PaymentReceivable.payment_element_id) IS NOT NULL
3913                THEN
3914                    (SELECT 
3915                            lesson_time
3916                        FROM
3917                            lesson_schedule_cancelled
3918                        WHERE
3919                            reservation_id = PaymentReceivable.payment_element_id)
3920                ELSE NULL
3921            END
3922        )";
3923
3924        // paginator settings
3925        $this->Paginator->settings = array(
3926            'PaymentReceivable' => array(
3927                'recursive' => -1,
3928                'fields' => array(
3929                    'PaymentReceivable.*',
3930                    'PaymentReceivable.lesson_time'
3931                ),
3932                'conditions' => $conditions,
3933                'limit' => 10,
3934                'order' => array('PaymentReceivable.id' => 'DESC')
3935            )
3936        );
3937        
3938        // get payments
3939        $this->PaymentReceivable->openDBReplica();
3940        $receivablePayments = $this->Paginator->paginate('PaymentReceivable');
3941        $this->PaymentReceivable->closeDBReplica();
3942
3943        // get total payment
3944        $paymentReceivableAmount = $this->PaymentReceivable->useReplica()->find('all', array(
3945            'fields' => "SUM(PaymentReceivable.amount) as totalAmount",
3946            'conditions' => $conditions,
3947        ));
3948        
3949        // set page css
3950        $this->set('page_css', 'details_payment_history');
3951        
3952        // set view vars
3953        $this->set('receivablePayments', $receivablePayments);
3954        $this->set('receivablePaymentAmount', isset($paymentReceivableAmount[0][0]['totalAmount']) ? $paymentReceivableAmount[0][0]['totalAmount'] : 0);
3955        $this->set('nextChargeDate', $nextChargeDate);
3956        $this->set('lastChargeDate', $lastChargeDate);
3957        $this->set('paymentTable', $paymentTable);
3958        $this->set('paymentElementType', $paymentElementType);
3959        
3960        $currency = $this->Currency->getSymbolAndPosition($this->sharedUserData['User']['currency_code']);
3961        $this->set('currencySymbol', $currency['symbol']);
3962        $this->set('prefixSuffixFlg', $currency['prefix_suffix_flg']);
3963        
3964        $userLang = $this->localizeDir;
3965        $this->set('userLang', $userLang);
3966
3967        // render view
3968        $this->render('/Account/payment_history_reserve');
3969    }
3970
3971    /**
3972     * @apiDefine Receipt
3973     *
3974     * @apiParam {String} token Unique token identifier.
3975     * @apiParam {Number} payment_id Unique payment identifier.
3976     * @apiParam {String} type Identify what type of receivable.
3977     * @apiParam {Number} user_id Unique user ID identifier.
3978     * @apiParam {Number} purchaseDetail Unique plan identifier.
3979     * 
3980     * @apiSuccess {View} timeDiffSecond  Set the timeDiffSecond value.
3981     * @apiSuccess {View} coinAmount Set the coinAmount value.
3982     * @apiSuccess {View} coporateIndiFormTypes Set the coporateIndiFormTypes value.
3983     * @apiSuccess {View} litePlanFormTypes Set the litePlanFormTypes value.
3984     * @apiSuccess {View} chocottoPlanFormTypes Set the chocottoPlanFormTypes value.
3985     * @apiSuccess {View}  paymentInfo Set the paymentInfo value.
3986     * @apiSuccess {View}  receivablePayments Set the receivablePayments value.
3987     * @apiSuccess {View} mobileDetect  Set the mobileDetect value.
3988     * @apiSuccess {View} userInfo  Set the userInfo value.
3989     * @apiSuccess {View} textbookSales  Set the textbookSales value.
3990     * @apiSuccess {View} nextChargeDate  Set the nextChargeDate value.
3991     * @apiSuccess {View} lastChargeDate  Set the lastChargeDate value.
3992     * @apiSuccess {View} paymentID  Set the paymentID value.
3993     * @apiSuccess {View} purchaseDetail  Set the purchaseDetail value.
3994     * @apiSuccess {View} ts  Set the ts value.
3995     * @apiSuccess {View} currencySymbol  Set the currencySymbol value.
3996     * @apiSuccess {View} prefixSuffixFlg  Set the prefixSuffixFlg value.
3997     * @apiSuccess {View} corporateLightPlan  Set the corporateLightPlan value.
3998     * @apiSuccess {View} corporateUser  Set the corporateUser value.
3999     * @apiSuccess {View} userLang  Set the userLang value.
4000     * @apiSuccess {View} newFormat  Set the newFormat value.
4001     * 
4002     * @apiError {View} tokenNotFound Unique token not found.
4003     * @apiError {View} payment_idNotFound  Unique payment id not found.
4004     * @apiError {View} typeNotFound  Type not found.
4005     * @apiError {View} user_idNotFound  Unique user ID not found.
4006     * @apiError {View} purchaseDetailNotFound  Unique plan not found.
4007     */
4008    /**
4009     * @api {post} /account/receipt receipt()
4010     * @apiName receipt
4011     * @apiGroup Account
4012     *
4013     * @apiUse Receipt
4014     * @apiSampleRequest off
4015     */
4016    /**
4017     * @api {post} /:language/account/receipt receipt()
4018     * @apiName language_receipt
4019     * @apiGroup Account
4020     * 
4021     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
4022      *
4023     * @apiUse Receipt
4024     * @apiSampleRequest off
4025     */
4026    public function receipt() {
4027        // load mobile detector
4028        App::import('Vendor','MobileDetect');
4029        $this->response->disableCache();
4030        
4031        // load variables
4032        $this->autoLayout = false;
4033        $token = isset($this->request->query['token']) && !empty($this->request->query['token']) ? $this->request->query['token'] : myTools::getTokenSession();
4034        $userData = array();
4035        $getData = $this->request->query;
4036        $mobileDetect = new MobileDetect();
4037        $receivablePayments = $rPayments = $textbookSale = $textbookSales = $ts = array();
4038        $nextChargeDate = $lastChargeDate = false;
4039        
4040        // check if parameters exists
4041        if (!isset($getData['payment_id']) || !isset($getData['type'])) {
4042            throw new Exception("Error: missing important parameters");
4043        }
4044
4045        if (isset($_GET['nativeoption']) && $_GET['nativeoption'] == 2) {
4046            // next charge date
4047            $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
4048        }
4049        
4050        // if token exists
4051        if ($token) {
4052            $userData = UserTable::validToken($token);
4053            if (!empty($userData['User']['timezone_id'])) {
4054                $this->Timezone->openDBReplica();
4055                $timezone = $this->Timezone->find('first', array(
4056                    'fields' => array('Timezone.continent_id', 'Timezone.city_eng'),
4057                    'conditions' => array('Timezone.id' => $userData['User']['timezone_id'])
4058                ));
4059                $this->Timezone->closeDBReplica();
4060    
4061                if ($timezone) {
4062                    //get user time difference
4063                    $timeDiffData = $this->Timezone->computeTimeDiff(array(
4064                        'continent_id' => $timezone['Timezone']['continent_id'],
4065                        'city' => $timezone['Timezone']['city_eng']
4066                    ));
4067                }
4068        
4069                //set timezone
4070                if (isset($timeDiffData['success'])) {
4071                    $this->timeDiff = $timeDiffData['timeDiff'];
4072                    $this->set('timeDiffSecond', intval($this->timeDiff * 60));
4073                }
4074            }
4075            if (
4076                isset($_GET['nativeoption']) && 
4077                $_GET['nativeoption'] == 2 &&
4078                isset($userData['User']['next_charge_date']) && 
4079                !is_null($userData['User']['next_charge_date'])
4080            ) {
4081                $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($userData['User']['next_charge_date'] . '-1 minute'));
4082            }            
4083        // else, use session
4084        } else {
4085
4086            $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
4087
4088            if (
4089                isset($_GET['nativeoption']) && 
4090                ($_GET['nativeoption'] == 1 || $_GET['nativeoption'] == 2) && 
4091                isset($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date']) && 
4092                !is_null($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date'])
4093            ) {
4094                $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($this->sharedUserData['User']['next_charge_date'] . '-1 minute'));
4095            }
4096
4097        }
4098        // if no user data
4099        if (!$userData) {
4100            $this->log(__METHOD__ . " Error: missing user information -> " . json_encode($userData), "debug");
4101            return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/');
4102        }
4103
4104        $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userData['User']['payment_plan_id']);
4105        $corporateLightPlan = ( $corpType== Configure::read("corporate_type.light") ) ;
4106        $corporateUser = isset($userData['User']['corporate_id']) && $userData['User']['corporate_id'] ? true : false;
4107        $currency = $this->Currency->getSymbolAndPosition($userData['User']['currency_code']);
4108        
4109        if (isset($getData['type']) && $getData['type'] == "corp_receivable") {
4110            $this->CorporatesPaymentReceivable->openDBReplica();
4111            $paymentInfo = $this->CorporatesPaymentReceivable->find('first', array(
4112                'conditions' => array('CorporatesPaymentReceivable.id' => $getData['payment_id']),
4113                'recursive' => -1
4114            ));
4115            $this->CorporatesPaymentReceivable->closeDBReplica();
4116
4117            // if has no payment
4118            if (!$paymentInfo) {
4119                throw new Exception("Error: missing payment : " . json_encode($getData));
4120            }
4121            // set payment ID
4122            $paymentID = $paymentInfo['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['id'];
4123        } else {
4124            // get payment information
4125            $this->Payment->openDBReplica();
4126            $joins = [];
4127            $fields = ['Payment.*'];
4128
4129            if (isset($_GET['type']) && $_GET['type'] == 'monthly') {
4130                $joins[] = [
4131                    'table' => 'discount_options_settlement_histories',
4132                    'alias' => 'DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory',
4133                    'type' => 'LEFT',
4134                    'conditions' => ['DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory.payment_id = Payment.id AND DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory.amount > 0']
4135                ];
4136                $fields[] = 'DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory.*';
4137            }
4138
4139            $paymentInfo = $this->Payment->find('first', array(
4140                'fields' => $fields,
4141                'conditions' => array(
4142                    'Payment.id' => $getData['payment_id']
4143                ),
4144                'joins' => $joins,
4145                'recursive' => -1,
4146                'order' => array(
4147                    'Payment.created' => 'DESC'
4148                )
4149            ));
4150            $this->Payment->closeDBReplica();
4151
4152            // if has no payment
4153            if (!$paymentInfo) {
4154                $this->log(__METHOD__ . " Error: missing payment -> " . json_encode($getData), "debug");
4155                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/');
4156            }
4157            
4158            // set payment ID
4159            $paymentID = $paymentInfo['Payment']['id'];
4160            
4161            // payment table
4162            $paymentTable = new PaymentTable($paymentInfo['Payment']);
4163            $userId = $userData['User']['id'];
4164            // if textbook
4165            if (isset($_GET['type']) && $_GET['type'] == 'textbook') {
4166                // set new payment object
4167                $textbookPayment = new shippingPaymentMatrix();
4168                
4169                // textbook sale information
4170                $this->TextbookSale->openDBReplica();
4171                $textbookSale = $this->TextbookSale->find('first', array(
4172                    'conditions' => array(
4173                        'TextbookSale.payment_id' => $getData['payment_id']
4174                    )
4175                ));
4176                $this->TextbookSale->closeDBReplica();
4177            
4178                $ts = $textbookSale;
4179
4180                // if has sales item
4181                if (!$textbookSale) {
4182                    $this->log(__METHOD__ . " Error: textbook information -> " . json_encode($getData), "debug");
4183                    return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/');
4184                }
4185
4186                $params = array('item_sales_id' => $textbookSale['TextbookSale']['id']);
4187                // Set Item currency : item_currency
4188                if ( isset($paymentTable->currency_code) && $paymentTable->currency_code ) {
4189                    $params['item_currency'] = $paymentTable->currency_code;
4190                }
4191
4192                $textbookSales = $this->TextbookSalesItem->processProductItems($params);
4193                
4194                // if has textbook sales
4195                if ($textbookSales) {
4196                    // get total shipping cost
4197                    $textbookSales['totalShippingCost'] = $textbookSale['TextbookSale']['sales_shipping_cost'];
4198                }
4199                
4200                // set costs
4201                $textbookSales['totalShippingCost'] = isset($textbookSales['totalShippingCost']) ? $textbookSales['totalShippingCost'] : 0;
4202                $textbookSales['subTotal'] = isset($textbookSales['subTotal']) ? $textbookSales['subTotal'] : 0;
4203
4204            // if reserve
4205            } else if (isset($_GET['type']) && $_GET['type'] == 'reserve') {
4206                // get receivable payments | reservation
4207                $this->PaymentReceivable->openDBReplica();
4208                $receivablePayments = $this->PaymentReceivable->find('all', array(
4209                    'conditions' => array(
4210                        'PaymentReceivable.payment_id' => $getData['payment_id'],
4211                        'PaymentReceivable.status' => 2,
4212                        'PaymentReceivable.user_id' => isset($getData['user_id']) ? $getData['user_id'] : $userData['User']['id'],
4213                        'PaymentReceivable.payment_element_type' => array(1,2,3)
4214                    ),
4215                    'order' => array('PaymentReceivable.id' => 'DESC')
4216                ));
4217                $this->PaymentReceivable->closeDBReplica();
4218
4219                // loop through each receivable payment
4220                if($receivablePayments) {
4221                    foreach($receivablePayments as $key => $receivablePayment) { 
4222
4223                        
4224
4225                        // if payment group exists, update values
4226                        if (isset($rPayments[$receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['amount']])) {
4227                            $rPayments[$receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['amount']]['count'] ++;
4228                            $rPayments[$receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['amount']]['amount'] += $receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['amount'];
4229                            continue;
4230                        }
4231                        
4232                        // payment groupings
4233                        $rPayments[$receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['amount']] = array(
4234                            'count' => 1,
4235                            'amount' => $receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['amount'],
4236                            'original_amount' => $receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['amount'],
4237                            'element_type' => $receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['payment_element_type']
4238                        );
4239                    }
4240                }
4241                
4242                // last charge date
4243                $lastMP = $paymentTable->getLastMonthlyPayment(); 
4244                // if payment was created
4245                if (isset($lastMP['Payment']['created'])) {
4246                    $lastChargeDate = $lastMP['Payment']['created'];
4247                    $nextChargeDate = date("Y-m-d H:i:s", strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created']));
4248                // if has no duration
4249                } else {
4250                    $lastChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s',(strtotime('last month',strtotime(date($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])))));
4251                    $nextChargeDate = $paymentInfo['Payment']['created'];
4252                }
4253
4254                // substract 1 day
4255                $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4256
4257                if (strtotime($nextChargeDate) <= strtotime($lastChargeDate)) {
4258                    $nextChargeDate = $lastChargeDate;
4259                }
4260                
4261            // if monthly
4262            } else if (isset($_GET['type']) && $_GET['type'] == 'monthly') {
4263                $nextMP = $paymentTable->getNextMonthlyPayment(); 
4264
4265                $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userData['User']['payment_plan_id']);
4266                if ($corpType  == Configure::read("corporate_type.light")) {
4267                    $aMonth = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+1 month', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])));
4268                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($aMonth) );
4269                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4270                // if payment was created
4271                } elseif (isset($nextMP['Payment']['created'])) {
4272                    $nextChargeDate = $nextMP['Payment']['created'];
4273                    // substract 1 day
4274                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4275
4276                } else {
4277                    // if mobile
4278                    if(in_array($paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'], array(Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_paid'), Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_free')))) {
4279                        $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+6 days', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])));
4280                         
4281                    // if pc
4282                    } else {
4283                        $nextChargeDate = $this->User->getNextChargeDate($userId,$paymentInfo['Payment']['created']);
4284                        // substract 1 day
4285                        $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4286                    }
4287                }
4288            } else if (isset($getData['purchaseDetail']) && $getData['purchaseDetail'] == 'FamilyPlan') { //NJ-12284: apply date range in family plan
4289                $nextMP = $paymentTable->getNextMonthlyPayment();
4290                $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userData['User']['payment_plan_id']);
4291                if ($corpType  == Configure::read("corporate_type.light")) {
4292                    $aMonth = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+1 month', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])));
4293                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($aMonth));
4294                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4295                    // if payment was created
4296                } elseif (isset($nextMP['Payment']['created'])) {
4297                    $nextChargeDate = $nextMP['Payment']['created'];
4298                    // substract 1 day
4299                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4300                } else {
4301                    // if mobile
4302                    if (in_array($paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'], array(Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_paid'), Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_free')))) {
4303                        $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+6 days', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])));
4304    
4305                        // if pc
4306                    } else {
4307                        $nextChargeDate = $this->User->getNextChargeDate($userId, $paymentInfo['Payment']['created']);
4308                        // substract 1 day
4309                        $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4310                    }
4311                }
4312            } else if (isset($_GET['type']) && $_GET['type'] == 'coin') {
4313                $this->loadModel('PurchaseCoinPrice');
4314                $coinData = $this->PurchaseCoinPrice->getCoinPrice(array(
4315                    'type' => 'first',
4316                    'args' => array(
4317                        'fields' => array('PurchaseCoin.coin'),
4318                        'conditions' => array('PurchaseCoinPrice.id' => $paymentInfo['Payment']['payment_id']),
4319                        'joins' => array(
4320                            array(
4321                                'table' => 'purchase_coins',
4322                                'alias' => 'PurchaseCoin',
4323                                'type' => 'LEFT',
4324                                'conditions' => 'PurchaseCoinPrice.coin_id = PurchaseCoin.id'
4325                            )
4326                        )
4327                    )
4328                ));
4329
4330                if ($coinData) {
4331                    $this->set('coinAmount', $coinData['PurchaseCoin']['coin']);
4332                } else {
4333                    // get coin data using currency code and price
4334                    $coinData = $this->PurchaseCoinPrice->getCoinPrice(array(
4335                        'type' => 'first',
4336                        'args' => array(
4337                            'fields' => array('PurchaseCoin.coin'),
4338                            'conditions' => array(
4339                                'PurchaseCoinPrice.currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
4340                                'PurchaseCoinPrice.price' => number_format($paymentInfo['Payment']['amount'], 2),
4341                                'PurchaseCoinPrice.created <=' =>  $paymentInfo['Payment']['created']
4342                            ),
4343                            'joins' => array(
4344                                array(
4345                                    'table' => 'purchase_coins',
4346                                    'alias' => 'PurchaseCoin',
4347                                    'type' => 'LEFT',
4348                                    'conditions' => 'PurchaseCoinPrice.coin_id = PurchaseCoin.id'
4349                                )
4350                            )
4351                        )
4352                    ));
4353
4354                    if ($coinData) {
4355                        $this->set('coinAmount', $coinData['PurchaseCoin']['coin']);
4356                    }
4357                }
4358            } else if (isset($_GET['type']) && $_GET['type'] == 'isForNativeOption') {
4359                $nextMP = $paymentTable->getNextMonthlyPayment(); 
4360                $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userData['User']['payment_plan_id']);
4361                if ($corpType  == Configure::read("corporate_type.light")) {
4362                    $aMonth = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+1 month', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])));
4363                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($aMonth) );
4364                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4365                    // if payment was created
4366                } elseif (isset($nextMP['Payment']['created'])) {
4367                    $nextChargeDate = $nextMP['Payment']['created'];
4368                    // substract 1 day
4369                    $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4370    
4371                } else {
4372                    // if mobile
4373                    if(in_array($paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'], array(Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_paid'), Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_free')))) {
4374                        $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+6 days', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])));
4375                         
4376                    // if pc
4377                    } else {
4378                        $nextChargeDate = $this->User->getNextChargeDate($userId,$paymentInfo['Payment']['created']);
4379                        // substract 1 day
4380                        $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextChargeDate)));
4381                    }
4382                }
4383            }
4384        }
4385
4386        //get user time difference for mobapp
4387        $userTimeDiff = $this->Timezone->getTimeDiff(
4388            array(
4389                'id' => $userData['User']['timezone_id']
4390            )
4391        );
4392        
4393        //compute to seconds
4394        $userTimeDiffSecond = $userTimeDiff * 60;
4395
4396        $this->set('coporateIndiFormTypes', array(
4397            Configure::read('payment_prepaid_corporate_light_member'),
4398            Configure::read('payment_prepaid_corporate_light_member_lesson'),
4399            Configure::read('payment_individual_corporate_standard'),
4400            Configure::read('payment_individual_corporate_premium')
4401        ));
4402
4403        $litepaid = Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_paid');
4404        $litemonthly = Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_monthly_payment');
4405        $literetry = Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_retry');
4406        $litedowngrade = Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_downgrade');
4407        if($paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] == $litepaid || $paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] == $litemonthly ||
4408           $paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] == $literetry || $paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] == $litedowngrade ) {
4409            $this->set('litePlanFormTypes', array(
4410                Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_paid'),
4411                Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_monthly_payment'),
4412                Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_retry'),
4413                Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_downgrade'),
4414            ));
4415        }
4416
4417        //- Chocotto Camp
4418        if(
4419            $paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] == Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_monthly_payment') ||
4420            $paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] == Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_retry') ||
4421            $paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] == Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_force_charge')
4422        ) {
4423            $this->set('chocottoPlanFormTypes', array(
4424                Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_monthly_payment'),
4425                Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_retry'),
4426                Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_force_charge'),
4427            ));
4428        }
4429        
4430        $userLang = $this->localizeDir;
4431        if (isset($getData['input_user_name']) && !empty($getData['input_user_name'])) {
4432            $input_user_name = $getData['input_user_name'];
4433        }
4434        // set view vars
4435        $this->set(array(
4436            'paymentInfo' => $paymentInfo,
4437            'receivablePayments' => $rPayments,
4438            'mobileDetect' => $mobileDetect,
4439            'userInfo' => $userData,
4440            'textbookSales' => $textbookSales,
4441            'nextChargeDate' => $nextChargeDate,
4442            'lastChargeDate' => $lastChargeDate,
4443            'paymentID' => $paymentID,
4444            'purchaseDetail' => (isset($getData['purchaseDetail'])) ? $getData['purchaseDetail'] : '',
4445            'ts' => $textbookSale,
4446            'currencySymbol' => $currency['symbol'],
4447            'prefixSuffixFlg' => $currency['prefix_suffix_flg'],
4448            'corporateLightPlan' => $corporateLightPlan,
4449            'corporateUser' => $corporateUser,
4450            'userLang' => $userLang,
4451            'newFormat' => ($userData['User']['currency_code'] == Configure::read('default.user_currency')),
4452            'input_user_name' => $input_user_name
4453        ));
4454    }
4455    /**
4456     * @apiDefine ReceiptBatch
4457     *
4458     * @apiParam {String} token Unique token identifier.
4459     * @apiParam {Number} batch_receipt_id Unique payment identifier.
4460     * 
4461     * @apiSuccess {View} timeDiffSecond Set the page timeDiffSecond value.
4462     * @apiSuccess {View} coporateIndiFormTypes Set the page coporateIndiFormTypes value.
4463     * @apiSuccess {View} callanOptionMonthlyAmount Set the page callanOptionMonthlyAmount value.
4464     * @apiSuccess {View} appPlanFormTypes Set the page appPlanFormTypes value.
4465     * @apiSuccess {View} paymentBatchReceiptID Set the page paymentBatchReceiptID value.
4466     * @apiSuccess {View} allReceiptInfos Set the page allReceiptInfos value.
4467     * @apiSuccess {View} mobileDetect Set the page mobileDetect value.
4468     * @apiSuccess {View} userInfo Set the page userInfo value.
4469     * @apiSuccess {View} paymentID Set the page paymentID value.
4470     * @apiSuccess {View} corporateUser Set the page corporateUser value.
4471     * @apiSuccess {View} corporateLightPlan Set the page corporateLightPlan value.
4472     * @apiSuccess {View} currencySymbol Set the page currencySymbol value.
4473     * @apiSuccess {View} newFormat Set the page newFormat value.
4474     * @apiSuccess {View} total_all_amount Set the page total_all_amount value.
4475     * @apiSuccess {View} total_discount_amount Set the page total_discount_amount value.
4476     * @apiSuccess {View} total_discount_option_amount Set the page total_discount_option_amount value.
4477     * @apiSuccess {View} total_all_amount_after_discount Set the page total_all_amount_after_discount value.
4478     * @apiSuccess {View} taxAmount Set the page taxAmount value.
4479     * @apiSuccess {View} total_all_shipping_cost Set the page total_all_shipping_cost value.
4480     * @apiSuccess {View} total_all_consumption_tax Set the page total_all_consumption_tax value.
4481     * @apiSuccess {View} userLang Set the page userLang value.
4482     * 
4483     * @apiError {View} tokenNotFound  Unique token not found.
4484     * @apiError {View} batch_receipt_idNotFound  Unique batch receipt id not found.
4485     */
4486    /**
4487     * @api {post} /account/receipt_batch receipt_batch()
4488     * @apiName receipt_batch
4489     * @apiGroup Account
4490     *
4491     * @apiUse ReceiptBatch
4492     * @apiSampleRequest off
4493     */
4494    /**
4495     * @api {post} /:language/account/receipt_batch receipt_batch()
4496     * @apiName language_receipt_batch
4497     * @apiGroup Account
4498     * 
4499     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
4500      *
4501     * @apiUse ReceiptBatch
4502     * @apiSampleRequest off
4503     */
4504    public function receipt_batch() {
4505        // load mobile detector
4506        App::import('Vendor','MobileDetect');
4507        $this->response->disableCache();
4508        
4509        // load variables
4510        $this->autoLayout = false;
4511        $token = isset($this->request->query['token']) && !empty($this->request->query['token']) ? $this->request->query['token'] : myTools::getTokenSession();
4512        $userData = array();
4513        $mobileDetect = new MobileDetect();
4514        $receivablePayments = $rPayments = $textbookSale = $textbookSales = $ts = array();
4515        $nextChargeDate = $lastChargeDate = false;
4516        $batch_receipt_id = $this->request->query['batch_receipt_id'];
4517        $getPaymentsSession = $this->Session->read('receiptNewArray');
4518
4519        $now = $this->request->query;
4520        $ip = $this->request->clientIp();
4521        $getDataResults = array(); 
4522        // NJ-12284: get native option amount
4523        $nativeOptionMonthlyAmount = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionAmount(array('currencyCode' => $this->sharedUserData['User']['currency_code'], 'startDate' => date('Y-m-d 00:00:00')));
4524
4525        if(isset($batch_receipt_id)){
4526
4527            $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->openDBReplica();
4528            $batchReceiptInfo = $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->find('first', array(
4529                'conditions' => array(
4530                    'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt.id' => $batch_receipt_id
4531                ),
4532                'fields' => array(
4533                    'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt.id',
4534                    'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt.payment_id',
4535                    'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt.corporate_receivable_ids'
4536                ),
4537                "recursive" => -1
4538            ));
4539            $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->closeDBReplica();
4540
4541        };
4542
4543        if (isset($now['input_user_name']) && !empty($now['input_user_name'])) {
4544            $input_user_name = $now['input_user_name'];
4545        }
4546        $batchReceipts = json_decode($batchReceiptInfo['PaymentBatchIssueReceipt']['payment_id'], true);
4547
4548        $getPaymentIDs = isset($batchReceipts) ? $batchReceipts : $getPaymentsSession;
4549
4550        // if token exists
4551        if ($token) {
4552            $userData = UserTable::validToken($token);
4553
4554            if (!empty($userData['User']['timezone_id'])) {
4555                $this->Timezone->openDBReplica();
4556                $timezone = $this->Timezone->find('first', array(
4557                    'fields' => array('Timezone.continent_id', 'Timezone.city_eng'),
4558                    'conditions' => array('Timezone.id' => $userData['User']['timezone_id'])
4559                ));
4560                $this->Timezone->closeDBReplica();
4561
4562                if ($timezone) {
4563                    //get user time difference
4564                    $timeDiffData = $this->Timezone->computeTimeDiff(array(
4565                        'continent_id' => $timezone['Timezone']['continent_id'],
4566                        'city' => $timezone['Timezone']['city_eng']
4567                    ));
4568                }
4569        
4570                //set timezone
4571                if (isset($timeDiffData['success'])) {
4572                    $this->timeDiff = $timeDiffData['timeDiff'];
4573                    $this->set('timeDiffSecond', intval($this->timeDiff * 60));
4574                }
4575            }            
4576        // else, use session
4577        } else {
4578            $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
4579        }
4580
4581        // if userData not exists
4582        if (!$userData) {
4583            return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/');
4584        }
4585        
4586        $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userData['User']['payment_plan_id']);
4587        $corporateLightPlan = ( $corpType == Configure::read("corporate_type.light") ) ;
4588        $corporateUser = isset($userData['User']['corporate_id']) && $userData['User']['corporate_id'] ? true : false;
4589        // $corporateUser = true;
4590        
4591        $currency = $this->Currency->getSymbolAndPosition($userData['User']['currency_code']);
4592
4593        $getDataResults = array();
4594        $joins = array(
4595            [
4596                'table' => 'discount_options_settlement_histories',
4597                'alias' => 'DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory',
4598                'type' => 'LEFT',
4599                'conditions' => ['DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory.payment_id = Payment.id AND DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory.amount > 0']
4600            ]
4601        );
4602        $conditions = array(
4603            'Payment.id' => $getPaymentIDs['receiptNewArrayIds']
4604        );
4605
4606        if ($corporateUser) {
4607            $joins[] = array(
4608                'type' => 'LEFT',
4609                'table' => 'users',
4610                'alias' => 'User',
4611                'conditions' => array('User.id = Payment.user_id')
4612            );
4613            $joins[] = array(
4614                'type' => 'LEFT',
4615                'table' => 'corporates',
4616                'alias' => 'Corporate',
4617                'conditions' => array('Corporate.id = User.corporate_id')
4618            );
4619        }
4620        
4621        // get payment information
4622        $this->Payment->openDBReplica();
4623        $paymentInfos = $this->Payment->find('all', array(
4624            'fields' => ['*'],
4625            'conditions' => $conditions,
4626            'joins' => $joins,
4627            'order' => array(
4628                'Payment.created' => 'DESC',
4629                'Payment.id' => 'DESC'
4630            ),
4631            'recursive' => -1
4632        ));
4633        $this->Payment->closeDBReplica();
4634
4635        // get textbook information
4636        if (!empty($getPaymentIDs['textbook'])) {
4637
4638            $textRes = $textKey = array();
4639
4640            foreach($getPaymentIDs['textbook'] as $getPaymentID){
4641                $text_payment_id = $getPaymentID['payment_id'];
4642                $text_key = $getPaymentID['key'];
4643                array_push($textRes, $text_payment_id);
4644                array_push($textKey, $text_key);
4645            }
4646
4647            // textbook sale information
4648            $this->TextbookSale->openDBReplica();
4649            $textbookSales = $this->TextbookSale->find('all', array(
4650                'conditions' => array(
4651                    'TextbookSale.payment_id' => $textRes
4652                ),
4653                'order' => array(
4654                    'TextbookSale.created' => 'DESC'
4655                )
4656            ));
4657            $this->TextbookSale->closeDBReplica();
4658
4659            $textArr = array();
4660            foreach ($textbookSales as $key => $textbookSale) {
4661                $b = $textKey[$key];
4662                $a = array(
4663                    $b => $textbookSale
4664                );
4665                array_push($textArr, $a);
4666            }        
4667        }
4668
4669        //Get receivable information
4670        if (!empty($getPaymentIDs['recievable'])) {
4671
4672            $receiveResultsID = $receiveResultsUserID = $receiveResultsKey = array();
4673
4674            foreach($getPaymentIDs['recievable'] as $getPaymentID){
4675                $result_paymentID = $getPaymentID['payment_id'];
4676                $result_userID = $getPaymentID['user_id'];
4677                $result_key = $getPaymentID['key'];
4678                array_push($receiveResultsID, $result_paymentID);
4679                array_push($receiveResultsUserID, $result_userID);
4680                array_push($receiveResultsKey, $result_key);
4681            }
4682
4683            // get receivable payments | reservation
4684            $this->PaymentReceivable->openDBReplica();
4685            $receivablePayments = $this->PaymentReceivable->find('all', array(
4686                'conditions' => array(
4687                    'PaymentReceivable.payment_id' => $receiveResultsID,
4688                    'PaymentReceivable.status' => 2,
4689                    'PaymentReceivable.user_id' => $receiveResultsUserID ? $receiveResultsUserID : $userData['User']['id'],
4690                    'PaymentReceivable.payment_element_type' => array(1,2,3)
4691                ),
4692                'order' => array(
4693                    'PaymentReceivable.payment_collection_date' => 'DESC'
4694                )
4695            ));
4696            $this->PaymentReceivable->closeDBReplica();
4697            
4698            $recArrs = array();
4699            foreach ($receivablePayments as $key => $receivablePayment) {
4700                if(in_array($receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['payment_id'], $receiveResultsID)) {
4701                    $paymentId = $receivablePayment['PaymentReceivable']['payment_id'];
4702                    $recArrs[$paymentId][] = $receivablePayment;
4703                }
4704            }
4705        }
4706        
4707        //Get coin information
4708        if (!empty($getPaymentIDs['coin'])) {
4709            $coinResultsID = $coinResultsUserID = $coinResultsKey = array();
4710
4711            foreach($getPaymentIDs['coin'] as $getPaymentID){
4712                $result_paymentID = $getPaymentID['payment_id'];
4713                $result_userID = $getPaymentID['user_id'];
4714                $result_key = $getPaymentID['key'];
4715                array_push($coinResultsID, $result_paymentID);
4716                array_push($coinResultsUserID, $result_userID);
4717                array_push($coinResultsKey, $result_key);
4718            }
4719
4720            
4721
4722            // get payment information
4723            $this->Payment->openDBReplica();
4724            $paymentInfoCoins = $this->Payment->find('all', array(
4725                'conditions' => array(
4726                    'Payment.id' => $coinResultsID
4727                ),
4728                'recursive' => -1
4729            ));
4730            $this->Payment->closeDBReplica();
4731
4732            $getCoinPaymentInfoIds = $getCoinPaymentInfoAmount = $getCoinPaymentInfoCreated = array();
4733
4734            foreach($paymentInfoCoins as $paymentInfoCoin){
4735                $result_paymentID = $paymentInfoCoin['Payment']['payment_id'];
4736                $result_amount = $paymentInfoCoin['Payment']['amount'];
4737                $result_created = $paymentInfoCoin['Payment']['created'];
4738                array_push($getCoinPaymentInfoIds, $result_paymentID);
4739                array_push($getCoinPaymentInfoAmount, $result_amount);
4740                array_push($getCoinPaymentInfoCreated, $result_created);
4741
4742                
4743            }
4744            
4745            $coinDataArr = array();
4746            $this->loadModel('PurchaseCoinPrice');
4747            foreach ($getCoinPaymentInfoIds as $key => $getCoinPaymentInfoId) {
4748                $coinDatas = $this->PurchaseCoinPrice->getCoinPrice(array(
4749                    'type' => 'all',
4750                    'args' => array(
4751                        'fields' => array('PurchaseCoin.coin'),
4752                        'conditions' => array('PurchaseCoinPrice.id' => $getCoinPaymentInfoId),
4753                        'joins' => array(
4754                            array(
4755                                'table' => 'purchase_coins',
4756                                'alias' => 'PurchaseCoin',
4757                                'type' => 'LEFT',
4758                                'conditions' => 'PurchaseCoinPrice.coin_id = PurchaseCoin.id'
4759                            )
4760                        ),
4761                        'replica' => array(
4762                            'open' => "openDBReplica",
4763                            'close' => "closeDBReplica"
4764                        )
4765                    )
4766                ));
4767
4768                if (!$coinDatas) {
4769                    // get coin data using currency code and price
4770                    $coinDatas = $this->PurchaseCoinPrice->getCoinPrice(array(
4771                        'type' => 'all',
4772                        'args' => array(
4773                            'fields' => array('PurchaseCoin.coin'),
4774                            'conditions' => array(
4775                                'PurchaseCoinPrice.currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
4776                                'PurchaseCoinPrice.price' => $getCoinPaymentInfoAmount,
4777                                'PurchaseCoinPrice.created <=' =>  $getCoinPaymentInfoCreated
4778                            ),
4779                            'joins' => array(
4780                                array(
4781                                    'table' => 'purchase_coins',
4782                                    'alias' => 'PurchaseCoin',
4783                                    'type' => 'LEFT',
4784                                    'conditions' => 'PurchaseCoinPrice.coin_id = PurchaseCoin.id'
4785                                )
4786                            ),
4787                            'replica' => array(
4788                                'open' => "openDBReplica",
4789                                'close' => "closeDBReplica"
4790                            )
4791                        )
4792                    ));
4793                }
4794                array_push($coinDataArr, $coinDatas);
4795            }    
4796            
4797            $coinArr = array();
4798            foreach (array_reverse($coinDataArr) as $key => $coinData) {
4799                $b = $coinResultsKey[$key];
4800                $a = array(
4801                    $b => $coinData[0]
4802                );
4803                array_push($coinArr, $a);
4804            }
4805            
4806        }
4807        if (!empty($getPaymentIDs['receiptNewArray'])) {
4808            $iKey = $iTextKey = $coinKey = 0;
4809            $paymentInfo = array();
4810            foreach ($getPaymentIDs['receiptNewArray'] as $key => $getData) {
4811                $checkPaymentInfos = $paymentInfos[$key] ? $paymentInfos[$key] : [];
4812                if(in_array($checkPaymentInfos['Payment']['id'], $getPaymentIDs['receiptNewArrayIds'])) {
4813                    $paymentInfo = $checkPaymentInfos;
4814                    $discountOptionData = $checkPaymentInfos['DiscountOptionsSettlementHistory'];
4815                    $discountOptionAmount = isset($discountOptionData['amount']) ? $discountOptionData['amount'] : 0;
4816                    if ($checkPaymentInfos['Payment']['form_type'] == Configure::read('payment_halfway_termination_of_annual_discount_option')) {
4817                        $discountOptionAmount = 0;
4818                    }
4819                    
4820                    //If individual user
4821                    $discountAmount = $paymentInfo['Payment']['discounted_amount'];
4822                    $paidAmount = $paymentInfo['Payment']['amount'];
4823                    $isDiscounted = !is_null($paymentInfo['Payment']['discounted_amount']) && $paymentInfo['Payment']['discounted_amount'] > 0;
4824                    $paymentAmount = $isDiscounted ? ($paidAmount + $discountAmount) : $paidAmount;
4825                    $paymentAmount = $paymentAmount + $discountOptionAmount;
4826        
4827                    if ($corporateUser && $getData['type'] == 'monthly') {
4828                        $basicFee = isset($paymentInfo['Payment']['basic_fee']) ? $paymentInfo['Payment']['basic_fee'] : 0;
4829                        $basicFee = $basicFee / 1.1;
4830                        $basicFeeTax = $basicFee * 0.10;
4831                        $lessonFee = isset($paymentInfo['Payment']['lesson_fee']) ? $paymentInfo['Payment']['lesson_fee'] : 0;
4832                        $lessonFee = $lessonFee / 1.1;
4833                        $lessonFeeTax = $lessonFee * 0.10;
4834                        $basicFeePrice = $basicFee;
4835                        $lessonFeePrice = $lessonFee;
4836                        $basicTaxPrice = $basicFeeTax;
4837                        $lessonTaxPrice = $lessonFeeTax;
4838                        $cAmountPrice = $paymentInfo['Payment']['amount'] / 1.1;
4839                        $cAmountTaxPrice = $cAmountPrice * 0.10;
4840        
4841                        $basicAmountTaxPrice = $basicFeePrice + $basicTaxPrice;
4842                        $lessonAmountTaxPrice = $lessonFeePrice + $lessonTaxPrice;
4843                        $cAmountWithTaxPrice = $cAmountPrice + $cAmountTaxPrice;
4844        
4845                        if ( isset($getData['basic_fee']) ) {
4846                            $paymentAmount = $basicAmountTaxPrice;
4847                            $consumptionTax = $basicTaxPrice;
4848                        } elseif (isset($getData['lesson_fee'])) {
4849                            $paymentAmount = $lessonAmountTaxPrice;
4850                            $consumptionTax = $lessonTaxPrice;
4851                        } else {
4852                            $paymentAmount = $cAmountWithTaxPrice;
4853                            $consumptionTax = $cAmountTaxPrice;
4854                        }
4855                    }
4856    
4857                    $paymentInfo['Payment']['total_amount'] = '';
4858                    $paymentInfo['Payment']['total_all_subtotal'] = '';
4859                    $paymentInfo['Payment']['total_all_amount_after_discount'] = '';
4860

4862                    $paymentInfo['Payment']['total_all_consumption_tax'] = '';
4863

4869

4871

4874                }

4927                            }

4950                        }

4954
4955                        if (strtotime($nextChargeDate) <= strtotime($lastChargeDate)) {
4956                            $nextChargeDate = $lastChargeDate;
4957                        }
