5167            $computeParams = array(
5168                    'payment_created' => $getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['created'],
5169                    'payment_amount' => $getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['amount'],
5170                    'currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code']
5171                );
5172            $needDateRange = false;
5173            if(in_array($getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'], $nativeOptionFormTypes)) {
5174                $computeParams['option_type'] = 1;
5175                $needDateRange = true;
5176            } else if(in_array($getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'], $callanOptionFormTypes)) {
5177                $computeParams['option_type'] = 2;
5178                $needDateRange = true;
5179            }
5180
5181            if ($needDateRange) {
5182                $getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['unlioption_date_range'] = $this->NativeOption->computeDateRange($computeParams);
5183            }
5184
5185            if ($getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'] == $litemonthly || $getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'] == $litepaid ||
5186                $getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'] == $literetry || $getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'] == $litedowngrade) {
5187                $getDataResults[$i]['litePlan'] = array(
5188                    Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_paid'),
5189                    Configure::read('payment_lite_credit_monthly_payment'),
5190                    Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_retry'),
5191                    Configure::read('payment_lite_plan_downgrade')
5192                );
5193            } else {
5194                $getDataResults[$i]['litePlan'] = array();    
5195            }        
5196
5197            if ($getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'] == Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_monthly_payment') || $getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'] ==  Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_retry') || $getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['form_type'] ==  Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_force_charge')) {
5198                $getDataResults[$i]['chocottoCampPlan'] = array(
5199                    Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_monthly_payment'),
5200                    Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_retry'),
5201                    Configure::read('payment_credit_chocotto_force_charge')
5202                );
5203            } else {
5204                $getDataResults[$i]['chocottoCampPlan'] = array();    
5205            }    
5206
5207            $total_all_shipping_cost += floatval($getDataResults[$i]['paymentInfo']['Payment']['total_all_shipping_cost']);
5208        }
5209
5210        $batchReceiptWithCorporate = json_decode($batchReceiptInfo['PaymentBatchIssueReceipt']['corporate_receivable_ids'], true);
5211        $batchReceiptWithCorporateSession = $this->Session->read('corporateReceivableBatchIds');
5212        $corporateReceivableBatchIds = isset($batchReceiptWithCorporate) ? $batchReceiptWithCorporate : $batchReceiptWithCorporateSession;
5213        $corporateReceivableBatchIdsData = NULL;
5214        if ($corporateReceivableBatchIds) {
5215            $corporateReceivableBatchIdsData = json_encode($corporateReceivableBatchIds);
5216            $corpParams = array(
5217                'arrayIds' => $corporateReceivableBatchIds
5218            );
5219            $corporateReceivablePaymentInfo = $this->CorporatesPaymentReceivable->getPaidCorporateReceivablePayment($corpParams);
5220
5221            if ($corporateReceivablePaymentInfo) {
5222                // Merge the arrays
5223                $getDataResults = array_merge_recursive($getDataResults, $corporateReceivablePaymentInfo);
5224                // Sort the merged payment data by date
5225                usort($getDataResults, function($a, $b) {
5226                    $dateA = isset($a['paymentInfo']['Payment']['created']) ? $a['paymentInfo']['Payment']['created'] : $a['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['created'];
5227                    $dateB = isset($b['paymentInfo']['Payment']['created']) ? $b['paymentInfo']['Payment']['created'] : $b['CorporatesPaymentReceivable']['created'];
5228                    $dateA = strtotime($dateA);
5229                    $dateB = strtotime($dateB);
5230
5231                    if ($dateA === false || $dateB === false) {
5232                        return 0;
5233                    }
5234
5235                    return $dateB <=> $dateA;
5236                });
5237
5238                foreach ($corporateReceivablePaymentInfo as $item) {
5239                    $cPayment = $item["CorporatesPaymentReceivable"];
5240                    $cAmount = $cPayment["amount"];
5241                    $cDiscount = 0;
5242                    if (in_array($cPayment["type"], [3,4,5,6])) {
5243                        $cDiscount = $cPayment["discount"];
5244                        if (!is_null($cDiscount) && $cDiscount > 0) {
5245                            $cAmount = $cAmount - $cDiscount;
5246                        }
5247                        $oldTax = ".08";
5248                        $newTax = ".10";
5249                        $newTaxDate = Configure::read('corporate_new_tax.date');
5250                        $cTax = (strtotime($cPayment["created"]) >= strtotime($newTaxDate)) ? $newTax : $oldTax ;
5251                        $cAmountTax = $cAmount * $cTax; 
5252                        $cTotalAmount = $cAmount + $cAmountTax;
5253                    } else {
5254                        $cTotalAmount = $cAmount;
5255                    }
5256                    $cAmountDiscounted = $cAmount;
5257
5258                    $total_all_amount += (float) $cTotalAmount;
5259                    $total_discount_amount += (float) $cDiscount;
5260                    $total_all_amount_after_discount += (float) $cTotalAmount;
5261                    $total_all_consumption_tax += (float) $cAmountTax;
5262                }
5263            }
5264        }
5265
5266        $batchReceiptSave = array(
5267            'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt' => array(
5268                'user_id' => $userData['User']['id'],
5269                'payment_id' => json_encode($getPaymentIDs),
5270                'address' => $userData['User']['nickname'],
5271                'currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
5272                'payment_total' => $total_all_amount,
5273                'corporate_receivable_ids' => $corporateReceivableBatchIdsData,
5274                'created' => $now,
5275                'modified' => $now,
5276                'created_ip' => $ip,
5277                'modified_ip' => $ip
5278            )
5279        );
5280        
5281        $callanOptionMonthlyAmount = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionAmount(
5282            array(
5283                'currencyCode' => $this->sharedUserData['User']['currency_code'], 
5284                'startDate' => date('Y-m-d 00:00:00'),
5285                'option_type' => Configure::read('callan_unlimited.options.callan_unlimited_option')
5286            )
5287        );
5288        $this->set('callanOptionMonthlyAmount', $callanOptionMonthlyAmount);
5289        $this->set('appPlanFormTypes', array(Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_paid'), Configure::read('mobile_payment_credit_free')));
5290
5291        // save data
5292        if($this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->save($batchReceiptSave)) {
5293
5294            //Update Batch Receipt Number
5295            $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->save(array(
5296                'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt' => array(
5297                    'id' =>  $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->getLastInsertID(),
5298                    'batch_receipt_number' => $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->getLastInsertID()
5299                )
5300            ));
5301            $userLang = $this->localizeDir;
5302            $this->set(array(
5303                'paymentBatchReceiptID' => $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->getLastInsertID(),
5304                'allReceiptInfos' => $getDataResults,
5305                'mobileDetect' => $mobileDetect,
5306                'userInfo' => $userData,
5307                'paymentID' => $paymentID,
5308                'corporateUser' => $corporateUser,
5309                'corporateLightPlan' => $corporateLightPlan,
5310                'currencySymbol' => $currency['symbol'],
5311                'newFormat' => ($userData['User']['currency_code'] == Configure::read('default.user_currency')), // ~new format for receipt for JA users
5312                
5313                //Payments
5314                'total_all_amount' => $total_all_amount,
5315                'total_discount_amount' => $total_discount_amount,
5316                'total_discount_option_amount' => $total_discount_option_amount,
5317                'total_all_amount_after_discount' => $total_all_amount_after_discount,
5318                'taxAmount' => (($total_all_amount / 1.1) * 0.1),
5319
5320                //shipping cost
5321                'total_all_shipping_cost' => $total_all_shipping_cost,
5322                
5323                //Corporate
5324                'total_all_consumption_tax' => $total_all_consumption_tax,
5325                'userLang' => $userLang,
5326                'input_user_name' => $input_user_name
5327            ));
5328        }
5329
5330        // save data
5331        if(isset($getPaymentsSession) || isset($batchReceiptWithCorporateSession)) {
5332            if($this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->save($batchReceiptSave)) {
5333
5334                //Update Batch Receipt Number
5335                $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->save(array(
5336                    'PaymentBatchIssueReceipt' => array(
5337                        'id' =>  $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->getLastInsertID(),
5338                        'batch_receipt_number' => $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->getLastInsertID()
5339                    )
5340                ));
5341
5342                if (isset($_SESSION['receiptNewArray'])) {
5343                    unset($_SESSION['receiptNewArray']);
5344                }
5345            }
5346        }
5347
5348        $paymentBatchReceiptID = $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->getLastInsertID() ? $this->PaymentBatchIssueReceipt->getLastInsertID() : $batch_receipt_id;
5349
5350        $this->set(array(
5351            'paymentBatchReceiptID' => $paymentBatchReceiptID,
5352            'allReceiptInfos' => $getDataResults,
5353            'mobileDetect' => $mobileDetect,
5354            'userInfo' => $userData,
5355            'paymentID' => $paymentID,
5356            'corporateUser' => $corporateUser,
5357            'corporateLightPlan' => $corporateLightPlan,
5358            'currencySymbol' => $currency['symbol'],
5359            'newFormat' => ($userData['User']['currency_code'] == Configure::read('default.user_currency')), // ~new format for receipt for JA users
5360            
5361            //Payments
5362            'total_all_amount' => $total_all_amount,
5363            'total_discount_amount' => $total_discount_amount,
5364            'total_discount_option_amount' => $total_discount_option_amount,
5365            'total_all_amount_after_discount' => $total_all_amount_after_discount,
5366            'taxAmount' => (($total_all_amount / 1.1) * 0.1),
5367
5368            //shipping cost
5369            'total_all_shipping_cost' => $total_all_shipping_cost,
5370            
5371            //Corporate
5372            'total_all_consumption_tax' => $total_all_consumption_tax,
5373        ));
5374    }
5375     /**
5376     * @api {get} /account/receipt_batch/generatePDF GeneratePDF
5377     * @apiName generatePDF
5378     * @apiGroup Account
5379     * 
5380     * @apiQuery {Number} userid The user ID for whom the receipt is generated.
5381     * 
5382     * @apiSuccess {File} PDF The generated payment batch receipt in PDF format.
5383     * 
5384     * @apiError {View} InternalServerError Unable to generate the PDF.
5385     * @apiSampleRequest off
5386     */
5387    public function generatePDF() {
5388        $this->autoRender = false;
5389        $data = $this->request->query;
5390
5391        set_time_limit(5000);
5392        ini_set('max_execution_time', '5000');
5393        ini_set('memory_limit', '256M');
5394
5395        $defaultPath = APP."webroot/receipt_batch_issue_pdf/";
5396        $fileName = "payment_batch_receipt" . $data["userid"] . time() . ".pdf";
5397        $baseUrl = myTools::getUrl($this->localizeDir);
5398        $html_file_url = '"'. $baseUrl . '/account/receipt_batch/downloadBatchRecieptPdf?' . http_build_query($data) .'"';
5399        $pdf_path = $defaultPath . $fileName;
5400        
5401        // wkhtml service
5402        $wkhtmlcommand = Configure::read('wkhtmltopdf_path');
5403        if (getenv("DOCKER_PHP8_ENVIRONMENT")) {
5404            $wkhtmlcommand = "wkhtmltopdf";
5405        }
5406        $command = "$wkhtmlcommand --print-media-type $html_file_url $pdf_path";
5407        
5408        $this->log('wkhtmltopdf: ' . json_encode($command), 'debug');
5409
5410        // execute command for converting website to pdf
5411        self::executeCommand($command);
5412
5413        if (file_exists($pdf_path)) {
5414            $content = file_get_contents($pdf_path);
5415            header('Content-Type: application/pdf');
5416            header('Content-Length: '.filesize($pdf_path));
5417            header('Content-disposition: attachment; filename='. $fileName);
5418            header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0');
5419            header('Pragma: public');
5420            header('Expires: 0');
5421            return $content;
5422        }
5423    }
5424    /**
5425     * @api {get} /account/receipt_batch/downloadBatchRecieptPdf DownloadBatchRecieptPdf
5426     * @apiName DownloadBatchRecieptPdf
5427     * @apiGroup Account
5428     * 
5429     * @apiQuery {String} name Name of the user.
5430     * @apiQuery {Date} from Date start.
5431     * @apiQuery {Date} to Date ended.
5432     * @apiQuery {Time} lesson_times Time of the lessons.
5433     * @apiQuery {Time} lesson_time Time of the lesson.
5434     * @apiQuery {Object} lesson_history  History of the lesson(s).
5435     * @apiQuery {Number} userid User's unique identifier.
5436     * @apiQuery {Number} timeDiffSec Time difference in seconds.
5437     * 
5438     * @apiSuccess {View} htmlContent Load receipt_batch_pdf view.
5439     * 
5440     * @apiError {View} Exception Missing certificate information.
5441     *
5442     * @apiSampleRequest off
5443     */
5444    public function downloadBatchRecieptPdf () {
5445        $this->autoLayout = false;
5446        $this->autoRender = false;
5447
5448        $getData = $this->request->query;
5449
5450        // if no user data
5451        if (!isset($getData['name'])
5452            || !isset($getData['from'])
5453            || !isset($getData['to'])
5454            || !isset($getData['lesson_times'])
5455            || !isset($getData['lesson_time'])
5456            || !isset($getData['lesson_history'])
5457            || !isset($getData['userid'])
5458        ) {
5459            throw new Exception("Error: Missing certificate information -> " . json_encode($getData));
5460        }
5461
5462        $dateRange = TimezoneTable::dateRangeUserTimeToJP(array(
5463            'from' => $getData['from'],
5464            'to' => $getData['to'],
5465            'timestamp' => $getData['timeDiffSec']
5466        ));
5467
5468        $condition_array = array(
5469            'LessonOnairsLog.user_id' => $getData['userid'],
5470            'LessonOnairsLog.start_time IS NOT NULL',
5471            'LessonOnairsLog.end_time IS NOT NULL',
5472            'LessonOnairsLog.connect_id IS NOT NULL',
5473            'LessonOnairsLog.end_time BETWEEN ? AND ?' => $dateRange,
5474            'LessonOnairsLog.delete_flg <>' => $this->LessonOnairsLog::DELETED
5475        );
5476
5477        $data = $this->generateData($getData, $condition_array);
5478
5479        $datael = array(
5480            'lesson_count' => $data['lesson_count'],
5481            'total_hours' => $data['total_hours'],
5482            'duration' => $data['duration'],
5483            'userName' => $data['userName'],
5484            'lesson_history' => $data['lesson_history'],
5485            'getData' => $getData,
5486            'displayTime' => $this->displayTime,
5487            'timeDiffSecond' => $getData['timeDiffSec']
5488        );
5489
5490        $view = new View($this, false);
5491        $htmlContent = $view->element('receipt_batch_pdf', $datael);
5492        return $htmlContent;
5493    }
5494    
5495    private function generateData ($getData, $condition_array) {
5496        $this->autoLayout = false;
5497        $lesson_count = null;
5498        $total_hours = null;
5499        $lesson_history = null;
5500        $token = !empty($this->request->query['token']) ? $this->request->query['token'] : "";
5501
5502        // get total lesson from date given.
5503        if ($getData['lesson_times']) {
5504            $lesson_count = $this->LessonOnairsLog->useReplica()->find('count', array(
5505                'conditions' => $condition_array
5506            ));
5507        }
5508
5509        // get total hours
5510        if ($getData['lesson_time']) {
5511            $total_hours = $this->LessonOnairsLog->useReplica()->find('all', array(
5512                'fields' => 'SUM(time_to_sec(TIMEDIFF(LessonOnairsLog.end_time, LessonOnairsLog.start_time))) as total_minutes',
5513                'conditions' => $condition_array
5514            ));
5515        }
5516
5517        if ($getData['lesson_history']) {
5518
5519            $joinArr = array(
5520                array(
5521                    'type'    => 'LEFT',
5522                    'table' => 'users',
5523                    'alias' => 'User',
5524                    'conditions' => array('User.id = LessonOnairsLog.user_id')
5525                ),
5526                array(
5527                    'type'    => 'LEFT',
5528                    'table' => 'teachers',
5529                    'alias' => 'Teacher',
5530                    'conditions' => array('Teacher.id = LessonOnairsLog.teacher_id')
5531                ),
5532                array (
5533                    'type' => 'LEFT',
5534                    'table' => 'textbook_connects',
5535                    'alias' => 'TextbookConnect',
5536                    'conditions' => 'TextbookConnect.id = LessonOnairsLog.connect_id'
5537                ),
5538                array (
5539                    'type' => 'LEFT',
5540                    'table' => 'textbook_categories',
5541                    'alias' => 'TextbookCategory',
5542                    'conditions' => 'TextbookCategory.id = TextbookConnect.category_id',
5543                )
5544            );
5545
5546
5547            $fieldArr = array (
5548                'Teacher.id',
5549                'Teacher.name',
5550                'LessonOnairsLog.id',
5551                'LessonOnairsLog.user_id',
5552                'LessonOnairsLog.teacher_id',
5553                'LessonOnairsLog.connect_id',
5554                'LessonOnairsLog.start_time',
5555                'LessonOnairsLog.end_time',
5556                'TextbookCategory.id',
5557                'TextbookCategory.name',
5558            );
5559
5560            if (!empty($token)) {
5561            // get user by token
5562                $userData = UserTable::validToken($token);
5563                $userLang = $userData['User']['native_language2'];
5564            } else {
5565                $userLang = $this->localizeDir;
5566            }
5567
5568            if(isset($userLang) && in_array($userLang, Configure::read("global_textbook_support_languages"))){
5569                // - get the user's language id
5570                $langId = ClassRegistry::init('CountryCode')->getUserLanguageId($userLang);
5571                if ($langId) {
5572                    $joinArr[] = array(
5573                        'type' => 'LEFT',
5574                        'table' => 'global_textbook_categories',
5575                        'alias' => 'GlobalTextbookCategory',
5576                        'conditions' => array(
5577                            'GlobalTextbookCategory.language_id' => $langId,
5578                            'GlobalTextbookCategory.textbook_category_id = TextbookCategory.id'
5579                        )
5580                    );
5581                    $this->LessonOnairsLog->virtualFields = array(
5582                        'gl_name' => 'GlobalTextbookCategory.gl_name',
5583                    );
5584                    $fieldArr[] = 'gl_name';
5585                }
5586            }
5587
5588
5589            $lesson_history = $this->LessonOnairsLog->useReplica()->find('all', array(
5590                'fields' => $fieldArr,
5591                'conditions'=> $condition_array,
5592                'order' => 'LessonOnairsLog.start_time DESC',
5593                'joins' => $joinArr
5594            ));
5595        }
5596        // $duration = myTools::dateJPFormat(array('date' => $getData['from'], 'po_file' => 'certificate')) . '～' . myTools::dateJPFormat(array('date' => $getData['to'], 'po_file' => 'certificate'));
5597        $duration = date_format(date_create($getData['from']),'Y/m/d') . ' - ' . date_format(date_create($getData['to']),'Y/m/d');
5598
5599        $result = array(
5600            'lesson_count' => $lesson_count,
5601            'total_hours' => $this->convertToHoursMins($total_hours[0][0]['total_minutes']),
5602            'duration' => $duration,
5603            'userName' => $getData['name'],
5604            'lesson_history' => $lesson_history,
5605            'getData' => $getData
5606        );
5607
5608        return $result;
5609
5610    }
5611    
5612    /**
5613     * Added on NJ-24238 ticket because
5614     * convertToHoursMins() function is not available in this controller
5615     * and it is called in generateData() function.
5616     * 
5617     * Can cause fatal error - Call to undefined method.
5618     * 
5619     * convertToHoursMins
5620     * @param int $time
5621     */
5622    private function convertToHoursMins($time = 0) {
5623        $overallMinutes = (int) $time;
5624        $timeH = floor($overallMinutes / 60);
5625        $timeM = $overallMinutes % 60;
5626        return sprintf(__d('lesson_history','%1$s時間 %2$s分'), $timeH, $timeM);
5627    }
5628
5629    private function executeCommand($command){
5630        ob_start();
5631        system($command);
5632        $output = ob_get_contents();
5633        ob_end_clean();
5634        return $output;    
5635    }
5636     /**
5637     * @apiDefine LessonCertificate
5638     * 
5639     * @apiParam {String} token The token for validating user session.
5640     * @apiParam {Number} payment_id The ID of the payment associated with the lesson certificate.
5641     * 
5642     * @apiSuccess {View} paymentInfo Set payment value.
5643     * @apiSuccess {View} mobileDetect Set the user's device (mobile or desktop).
5644     * @apiSuccess {View} userInfo Set user data including user ID and nickname.
5645     * @apiSuccess {View} userName Set the nickname of the user.
5646     * @apiSuccess {View} nextDate Set the next payment due date.
5647     * @apiSuccess {View} createdDate Set the date when the payment was created.
5648     * @apiSuccess {View} getCountLesson Set the count of lessons taken by the user within the payment period.
5649     * 
5650     * @apiError {View} parametersException Lesson certificate missing important parameters.
5651     * @apiError {View} userException Lesson certificate missing user information.
5652     * @apiError {View} paymentException Lesson certificate missing payment information.
5653     */
5654
5655     /**
5656     * @api {get} /account/lesson_certificate lessonCertificate()
5657     * @apiName lesson_certificate
5658     * @apiGroup Account
5659     * 
5660     * @apiUse LessonCertificate
5661     * @apiSampleRequest off
5662     */
5663
5664     /**
5665     * @api {get} /:language/account/lesson_certificate lessonCertificate()
5666     * @apiName language_lesson_certificate
5667     * @apiGroup Account
5668     * 
5669     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
5670     * 
5671     * @apiUse LessonCertificate
5672     * @apiSampleRequest off
5673     */
5674    public function lessonCertificate() {    
5675        // load mobile detector
5676        App::import('Vendor','MobileDetect');
5677        
5678        // load 
5679        $mobileDetect = new MobileDetect();
5680        $this->autoLayout = false;
5681        $token = (isset($this->request->query['token']) && !empty($this->request->query['token'])) ? $this->request->query['token'] : '';
5682        $getData = $this->request->query;
5683
5684        // check if parameters exists
5685        if (!isset($getData['payment_id'])) {
5686            throw new Exception("Error: lesson certificate missing important parameters -> " . json_encode($getData));
5687        }
5688        
5689        // if token exists
5690        if ($token) {
5691            $userData = UserTable::validToken($token);
5692            
5693        // else, use session
5694        } else {
5695            $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
5696            
5697        }
5698
5699        // if no user data
5700        if (!$userData) {
5701            throw new Exception("Error: lesson certificate missing user information -> " . json_encode($getData));
5702        }
5703        
5704        // payment information
5705        $paymentInfo = $this->Payment->useReplica()->find('first', array(
5706            'conditions' => array(
5707                'Payment.id' => $getData['payment_id']
5708            )
5709        ));
5710        
5711        // if has no payment information
5712        if (!$paymentInfo) {
5713            throw new Exception("Error: lesson certificate missing payment information -> " . json_encode($getData));
5714        }
5715        
5716        // set user
5717        $userId = $userData['User']['id'];
5718        $isMobile = myTools::getDevice();
5719        $paymentId = $paymentInfo['Payment']['id'];
5720        $paymentTable = new PaymentTable($paymentInfo['Payment']);
5721        
5722        // get created information
5723        $createdYmd = date('Y-m-d', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created']));
5724        
5725        // check payment information
5726        $checkPayment = $paymentTable->getNextMonthlyPayment();    
5727        
5728        // if has payment
5729        if($checkPayment) {
5730            $nextDate = date('Y-m-d', strtotime($checkPayment['Payment']['created']));
5731            $newNextDate = date('Y-m-d', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($nextDate)));
5732            
5733            // if date settlement and next charge is same dont subtract -1 day
5734            $nextDate = ($nextDate == $createdYmd) ? $createdYmd : $newNextDate;
5735        // else, add next month
5736        } else {
5737            $aMonth = date('Y-m-d',(strtotime('next month',strtotime(date($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])))));
5738            $nextDate = date('Y-m-d', strtotime('-1 day', strtotime($aMonth)));
5739            
5740            // mobile monthly
5741            if($paymentInfo['Payment']['form_type'] == 21) {
5742                $nextDate = date('Y-m-d', strtotime('+6 days', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created'])));
5743            }
5744        }
5745
5746        $created = date('Y-m-d', strtotime($paymentInfo['Payment']['created']));
5747        $nextDate = date('Y-m-d', strtotime($nextDate));
5748
5749        // include time
5750        $created = $created.' 00:00:00';
5751        $nextDate = $nextDate.' 23:59:59';
5752        
5753        // get lesson count
5754        $getCountLesson = $this->LessonOnairsLog->useReplica()->find('count', array(
5755            'recursive' => -1,
5756            'conditions' => array(
5757                'LessonOnairsLog.user_id' => $userId,
5758                'LessonOnairsLog.start_time BETWEEN ? and ?' => array($created, $nextDate)
5759            )
5760        ));
5761        
5762        // get user name
5763        $userName = (isset($userData['User']['nickname']) ? $userData['User']['nickname'] : '');
5764
5765        // set view vars
5766        $this->set(array(
5767            'paymentInfo' => $paymentInfo,
5768            'mobileDetect' => $mobileDetect,
5769            'userInfo' => $userData,
5770            'userName' => $userName,
5771            'nextDate' => $nextDate,
5772            'createdDate' => $paymentInfo['Payment']['created'],
5773            'getCountLesson' => $getCountLesson
5774        ));
5775    }
5776    /**
5777     * @api {get} /sp/account SpIndex
5778     * @apiName spIndex
5779     * @apiGroup Account
5780     * 
5781     * @apiSuccess {View} headtext Set the header text for the account settings page.
5782     * @apiSuccess {View} title_for_layout Set the title of the page.
5783     * @apiSuccess {View} meta_keywords Set meta keywords for SEO.
5784     * @apiSuccess {View} data Set the user data retrieved from the database.
5785     * @apiSuccess {View} isNeedToChangePass Set if the user needs to change their password.
5786     * @apiSuccess {View} render Render the page to (/Mobile/Account/index).
5787     * 
5788     * @apiError {View} Redirect Redirects to user account if the action is spIndex.
5789     */
5790    public function spIndex(){
5791        if($this->action == 'spIndex') {
5792            return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/account');
5793        }
5794        
5795        $this->layout = "mobile";
5796        $this->set('headtext', __d('default_pc','ユーザー設定'));
5797        $this->set('title_for_layout', __d('default_pc','ユーザー設定 | オンライン英会話のネイティブキャンプ'));
5798        $this->set('meta_keywords', __d('default_pc','ユーザー設定,ネイティブキャンプ,オンライン英会話'));
5799
5800        $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
5801        $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
5802
5803        //get the updated data of the login user
5804        $this->User->unbindModel(array(
5805            'hasOne' => array('UsersCourse'),
5806            'hasMany' => array('LessonSchedule')
5807        ));
5808        $isNeedToChangePass = (isset($userData['UsersExtend']['temporary_pw_flg']) && $userData['UsersExtend']['temporary_pw_flg']) || (isset($userData['CorporateActivationManagement']['temporary_pw_flg']) && $userData['CorporateActivationManagement']['temporary_pw_flg']) ?  true : false;
5809        $this->set('isNeedToChangePass', $isNeedToChangePass);
5810        $data = $this->User->findById($userId);
5811        $this->set('data',$data);
5812
5813        $this->render('/Mobile/Account/index');
5814    }
5815      /**
5816     * @apiDefine ProfileEdit
5817     * 
5818     * @apiBody {Object} UserImage User image properties. 
5819     * @apiBody {File} UserImage.image-upload User image directory.
5820     * @apiBody {Number} User.id User unique identifier. 
5821     * @apiBody {Object} User User object(s). 
5822     * @apiBody {Date} User.UserBirthday Users date of birth. 
5823     * 
5824     * @apiSuccess {View} headtext Set header text value.
5825     * @apiSuccess {View} title_for_layout Set the title layout value.
5826     * @apiSuccess {View} meta_keywords Set meta keywords.
5827     * @apiSuccess {View} dailyEnglishTestLevel Set daily english test level.
5828     * @apiSuccess {View} dailyEnglishTestDateTaken Set daily englist test date taken value.
5829     * @apiSuccess {View} data Set the data value.
5830     * @apiSuccess {View} callanOptionManageFlg Set callan option manage flag value.
5831     * @apiSuccess {View} callanOptionFlg Set callan option flag value.
5832     * @apiSuccess {View} callanOptionData Set callan option data value.
5833     * @apiSuccess {View} nativeOptionManageFlg Set native option manage flag value.
5834     * @apiSuccess {View} nativeOptionFlg Set native option flag value.
5835     * @apiSuccess {View} nativeOptionData Set native option data value.
5836     * @apiSuccess {View} showNativeOptionUrl Set show native option url value.
5837     * @apiSuccess {View} countryCodes Set country code(s) value.
5838     * @apiSuccess {View} countTotalVerify Set number of total verified user.
5839     * @apiSuccess {View} litePlanDataUser Set plan data user.
5840     * @apiSuccess {View} studentNicknameSettingFlg Set student nickname flag value.
5841     * @apiSuccess {View} nationalityLists Set nationality list.
5842     * @apiSuccess {View} error Set error message.
5843     * @apiSuccess {View} residenceList Set residence list value.
5844     * @apiSuccess {View} userNickNameChangeData Set user nickname value.
5845     * @apiSuccess {View} tracker Set tracker value.
5846     * @apiSuccess {View} getSnsType Set Snstype value.
5847     * @apiSuccess {View} showCancelStudentDiscountModalFlg Set student cancel discount modal flag.
5848     * @apiSuccess {View} render Redirect page to (/Mobile/Account/profile_edit).
5849     * 
5850     * @apiError {View} render Redirect to (/user/account).
5851     */
5852
5853     /**
5854     * @api {post} /account/profile_edit profile_edit()
5855     * @apiName profile_edit
5856     * @apiGroup Account
5857     * 
5858     * @apiUse ProfileEdit
5859     * @apiSampleRequest off
5860     */
5861
5862     /**
5863     * @api {post} /:language/account/profile_edit profile_edit()
5864     * @apiName language_profile_edit
5865     * @apiGroup Account
5866     * 
5867     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
5868     * 
5869     * @apiUse ProfileEdit
5870     * @apiSampleRequest off
5871     */
5872    public function profile_edit(){
5873        if($this->action == 'spIndex') {
5874            return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/account');
5875        }
5876        
5877        $this->layout = "mobile";
5878        $this->set('headtext', __d('default_pc','ユーザー設定'));
5879        $this->set('title_for_layout', __d('default_pc','ユーザー設定 | オンライン英会話のネイティブキャンプ'));
5880        $this->set('meta_keywords', __d('default_pc','ユーザー設定,ネイティブキャンプ,オンライン英会話'));
5881
5882        $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
5883
5884        //get the data of the login user
5885        $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
5886        $userObj = new UserTable($this->sharedUserData['User']);
5887
5888        $error = false;
5889        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
5890            if (isset($this->request->data['UserImage'])) {
5891                $fileOK = $this->uploadFiles(array(
5892                        'folder' => 'img/uploads', 
5893                        'formdata' => array($this->request->data['UserImage']['image-upload'])
5894                    ));
5895
5896                //check if image passes checkers
5897                if(isset($fileOK['filename'])) {
5898                    //$this->deletePrevImage('img/uploads');
5899
5900                    $image = $fileOK['filename'];
5901                    $this->User->validate = array();
5902                    $this->User->read(array('profile_image', 'image_url'), $userId);
5903                    $this->User->set(array('profile_image' => $image, 'image_url' => null));
5904                    $this->User->save();
5905                }
5906
5907                //check if image had errors
5908                if (isset($fileOK['errors'])) {
5909                    $error = __($fileOK['errors'][0]);
5910                }
5911            } else { // for gender and birthday only
5912                
5913                $this->request->data['User']['id'] = $userId;
5914                $this->User->set($this->request->data);
5915                if($this->User->validates()){
5916                    $user = $this->request->data['User'];
5917                    $this->User->set('gender',(isset($user['gender']) ? $user['gender'] : $userData['User']['gender']));
5918                    $birthday = null;
5919                    $bdayShowFlg = $userData['User']['birthday_show_flg'];
5920                    $userBirthday = $this->request->data['User']['UserBirthday'];
5921
5922                    if(!empty($userBirthday['byear']) && !empty($userBirthday['bmonth']) && !empty($userBirthday['bday'])) {
5923                        $birthday = $userBirthday['byear']."-".$userBirthday['bmonth']."-".$userBirthday['bday'];
5924                        $birthday = date("Y-m-d", strtotime($birthday));
5925                        $this->User->set('birthday', $birthday);
5926                    }
5927                    // NJ-45455: calculate age and set kid_ui_flg if user is 13 years old or younger
5928                    if ($birthday) {
5929                        // Calculate age
5930                        $age = myTools::getAge($birthday);
5931                        // Check if user is a kid (under 13 years old)
5932                        $kidUiFlag = ($age < 13) && myTools::checkKidsPlans($userObj) ? 1 : 0;
5933                    
5934                        // Update UsersDetail
5935                        $this->UsersDetail->clear();
5936                        $this->UsersDetail->set(array(
5937                            'user_id' => $this->Auth->user('id'),
5938                            'kid_ui_flg' => $kidUiFlag
5939                        ));
5940                        $this->UsersDetail->validate = [];
5941                        $this->UsersDetail->save();
5942                    }
5943                    $_appreciationSupportedMembership = Configure::read("appreciation.supported_membership_type");
5944                    $_userPaymentPlan = $this->sharedUserData['User']['payment_plan_id'];
5945
5946                    $_appreciationSupportedMembership = Configure::read("appreciation.payment_plan_id");
5947                    $_appreciationFamilyPlan = Configure::read('appreciation.can_coin_purchase_check');
5948
5949                    //NJ-7548 : check if there is changes in the birthdate
5950                    //check if allowed appreciation member and not family plan
5951                    if (
5952                        $userData['User']['birthday'] != $birthday && 
5953                        in_array($_userPaymentPlan, $_appreciationSupportedMembership) && 
5954                        !in_array($_userPaymentPlan,$_appreciationFamilyPlan)
5955                    ) {
5956                        
5957                        //set the show appreciation flag
5958                        $showAppreciationFlg = UserTable::setUpdatedShowAppFlag($_userPaymentPlan,$birthday);
5959
5960                        //set the show appreciation flg 
5961                        $this->User->set('show_appreciation_flg', $showAppreciationFlg);
5962                        //default value for allow FLAG for eligible membership types
5963                        $this->User->set('allow_appreciation_flg', true);
5964                    }
5965
5966                    //NJ-7548 : check if there is changes in the birthdate
5967                    if ($userData['User']['birthday'] != $birthday) {
5968                        $this->User->set('display_appreciation_message_flg', true);
5969                        $this->User->set('allow_appreciation_message_flg', true);
5970                    }
5971
5972                    $this->User->save();
5973                    /* update users_class_evaluations table */
5974                    $this->UsersClassEvaluation->updateAllAge($birthday, $bdayShowFlg, $userId);
5975                    return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/account/profile_edit');
5976
5977                } else {
5978                    $errors = myError::validation($this->User->validationErrors);
5979                    $error = __($errors[0]);
5980                }
5981
5982            }
5983
5984        }
5985
5986        //NJ-7101 - get latest monthly test result for english speaking
5987        $dailyEnglishTestLevel = $dailyEnglishTestDateTaken = "";
5988        $usersChivoxMonthlyDiagnosis = ClassRegistry::init('UsersChivoxMonthlyDiagnosis');
5989        $userMonthlyLevelResult = $usersChivoxMonthlyDiagnosis->getUserMonthlyTestLevel($userData['User']['id']);
5990        if (!empty($userMonthlyLevelResult['date_taken']) && !empty($userMonthlyLevelResult['level'])) {
5991            $dateFormatParams = array(
5992                'datetime' => $userMonthlyLevelResult['date_taken'],
5993                'removeDay' => true,
5994                'removeTime' => true,
5995                'lang' => $this->localizeDir
5996            );
5997            $dailyEnglishTestLevel = $userMonthlyLevelResult['level'];
5998            $dailyEnglishTestDateTaken = myTools::formatDateByLanguage($dateFormatParams);
5999        }
6000
6001        $this->set('dailyEnglishTestLevel', $dailyEnglishTestLevel);
6002        $this->set('dailyEnglishTestDateTaken', $dailyEnglishTestDateTaken);
6003        // - end of NJ-7101
6004
6005        //get the updated data of the login user
6006        $this->User->unbindModel(array(
6007            'hasOne' => array('UsersCourse'),
6008            'hasMany' => array('LessonSchedule')
6009        ));
6010        $data = $this->User->findById($userId);
6011        $this->set('data',$data);
6012
6013
6014        $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userObj->payment_plan_id);
6015
6016        //NC-8704 Native option plan
6017        $nativeOptionManageFlg = false;
6018        $showNativeOptionUrl = true;
6019        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('native_speaker.valid_memberships'))){
6020            //If user is family plan paid or free
6021            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(8, 14))){
6022                if ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseNativeOption($userObj->id)) {
6023                    $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
6024                }
6025            } else {
6026                $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
6027            }
6028        } elseif (isset($corpType) && in_array($corpType , array(1,2))) {
6029            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array_merge(Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_allowed_user'), Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_fail_users')))){
6030                $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
6031            } else {
6032                $showNativeOptionUrl = false;
6033                if ($userObj->charge_flg) {
6034                    $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
6035                }
6036            }
6037        }
6038
6039        // - callan option manage flag
6040        $callanOptionManageFlg = false;
6041        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('callan_unlimited.valid_memberships'))){
6042            //If user is family plan paid or free
6043            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(8, 14))){
6044                if ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseCallanOption($userObj->id)) {
6045                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
6046                } elseif ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseNativeOption($userObj->id)) {
6047                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
6048                }
6049            } else {
6050                $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
6051            }
6052        } elseif (isset($corpType) && in_array($corpType , array(1,2))) {
6053            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array_merge(Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_allowed_user'), Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_fail_users')))){
6054                $showNativeOptionUrl = true;
6055            } else {
6056                $showNativeOptionUrl = false;
6057                if ($userObj->charge_flg) {
6058                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
6059                }
6060            }
6061        }
6062
6063        if ($callanOptionManageFlg) {
6064            $callanOptionData = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionData(array(
6065                'user_currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
6066                'option_id' => Configure::read('callan_unlimited.options.callan_unlimited_option')
6067            ));
6068            $this->set('callanOptionManageFlg', $callanOptionManageFlg);
6069            $this->set('callanOptionFlg', $userData['User']['callan_option']);
6070            $this->set('callanOptionData', ($callanOptionData) ? $callanOptionData : array());
6071        }
6072
6073        if ($nativeOptionManageFlg) {
6074            $nativeOptionData = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionData(array(
6075                'user_currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
6076                'option_id' => Configure::read('native_speaker.options.all_you_can_eat')
6077            ));
6078            $this->set('nativeOptionManageFlg', $nativeOptionManageFlg);
6079            $this->set('nativeOptionFlg', $userData['User']['native_option']);
6080            $this->set('nativeOptionData', ($nativeOptionData) ? $nativeOptionData : array());
6081        }
6082
6083        $this->set('showNativeOptionUrl', $showNativeOptionUrl);
6084
6085        # set next charge date
6086        $nextChargeDate = NULL;
6087        if (
6088            !is_null($data["User"]["next_charge_date"])
6089            && $data["User"]["charge_flg"] == 1
6090            && $data["User"]["fail_flg"] == 0
6091        ) {
6092            $nextChargeDate = $data["User"]["next_charge_date"];
6093            $userDate = TimezoneTable::computeTimeToUser(array(
6094                'time' => strtotime($nextChargeDate),
6095                'timestamp' => $this->timeDiffSecond,
6096                'format' => 'Y-m-d H:i:s'
6097            ));
6098            $nextChargeDate = $userDate;
6099        }
6100
6101        //compute to seconds
6102        $userTimeDiffSecond = $this->timeDiffSecond * 60;
6103        $userNickNameChangeData = $this->userNickNameChangeData();
6104        $corporateData = $this->Corporate->findById($data['User']['corporate_id']);
6105        $showChangePassModal = (isset($userData['UsersExtend']['temporary_pw_flg']) && $userData['UsersExtend']['temporary_pw_flg']) ? true : false;
6106        //SMS認証回数
6107        $this->PhoneVerifyCheckLog->openDBReplica();
6108        $countTotalVerify = $this->PhoneVerifyCheckLog->find('count',array(
6109            'conditions'=> array(
6110                'user_id' => $this->Auth->user('id'),
6111                'status' => 0
6112            )
6113        ));
6114        $this->PhoneVerifyCheckLog->closeDBReplica();
6115        //電話番号入力対象会員の場合、国コードを取得
6116        $this->CountryCode->openDBReplica();
6117        $countryCodes = $this->CountryCode->find('all',array(
6118            'fields' => array(
6119                'code',
6120                'country_name'
6121            ),
6122            'order' => 'country_name ASC'
6123        ));
6124        $this->CountryCode->closeDBReplica();
6125        $this->set('countryCodes', $countryCodes);
6126        $this->set('countTotalVerify', $countTotalVerify);
6127
6128        $this->set('litePlanDataUser',$this->sharedUserData['User']);
6129
6130        $this->setCorporateContractPeriod(); //NJ-14905
6131        $this->set('studentNicknameSettingFlg', ($corporateData ? $corporateData['Corporate']['student_nickname_setting_flg'] : 1));
6132        $userNickNameChangeData = $this->userNickNameChangeData();
6133        $nationalityLists = $this->Nationality->nationalityOptions();
6134        $this->set('nationalityLists', $nationalityLists);
6135        $countryList = $this->Country->countryOptions();
6136        $this->set('error', $error);
6137        $this->set('residenceList', $countryList);
6138        $this->set('userNickNameChangeData', $userNickNameChangeData);
6139        $this->set('tracker', myTools::getTracker($this->Cookie->read('campaign_code')));
6140        $this->set(myTools::getSnsType($data['User']));
6141        $this->setCorporateMonthlyPrice();
6142
6143        $usersDetailData = $this->sharedUserData['UsersDetail'];
6144        $showCancelStudentDiscountModalFlg = isset($usersDetailData['show_cancel_student_discount_modal_flg']) && $usersDetailData['show_cancel_student_discount_modal_flg'] ? true : false;
6145

6149    }
6150    /**
6151     * @api {post} /:language/Account/updateNicknameAjax UpdateNicknameAjax
6152     * @apiName updateNicknameAjax
6153     * @apiGroup Account
6154     * 
6155     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
6156     * 
6157     * @apiBody {String} nickname The new nickname to be set for the user.
6158     * 
6159     * @apiSuccessExample {json} Success-Response:
6160     *  HTTP/1.1 200 OK
6161     *  {
6162     *    "result": 1,
6163     *    "new_nickname": "newNickname",
6164     *    "nickname_change_date": "2024/10/16 12:30"
6165     *  }
6166     *
6167     * @apiErrorExample {json} Error-Response:
6168     *  HTTP/1.1 200 OK
6169     *  {
6170     *    "result": 0
6171     *  }
6172     */
6173    public function updateNicknameAjax(){
6174        $this->layout = false;
6175        $this->autoRender = false;
6176        $result = array("result" => 0);
6177
6178        // check corporate users
6179        $userCorpData = $this->User->findById($this->Auth->user('id'));
6180        if ($userCorpData['User']['corporate_id']) {
6181            $corpAdminData = $this->Corporate->findById($userCorpData['User']['corporate_id']);
6182            if($corpAdminData['Corporate']['student_nickname_setting_flg'] == 0) {
6183                $this->Session->setFlash(__('This function cannot be used by members of corporate services.'));
6184                return json_encode($result);
6185            }
6186        }
6187
6188        if ( $this->request->is('ajax') ) {
6189            $postData = $this->request->data;
6190            $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
6191
6192            if ( isset($postData["nickname"]) ) {
6193                // check if user nickname_change_date still available
6194                $curDate = date("Y-m-d H:i:s");
6195                $ncdData = $this->userNickNameChangeData();
6196                $timeDiffSecond = isset($ncdData["time_diff_second"]) && $ncdData["time_diff_second"] ? $ncdData["time_diff_second"] : 0 ;
6197                // check user last change date
6198                if ( isset($ncdData["original_next_nickname_change_date"]) && $ncdData["original_next_nickname_change_date"] ) {
6199                    $currentNextDate = date( "Y-m-d H:i:s", strtotime($ncdData["original_next_nickname_change_date"]) );
6200                    if ( $currentNextDate > $curDate ) {
6201                        return json_encode($result);
6202                    }
6203                }
6204                $oldNickName = isset($ncdData["old_nickname"]) && $ncdData["old_nickname"] ? $ncdData["old_nickname"] : null;
6205                $oldMemo = isset($ncdData["memo"]) && $ncdData["memo"] ? $ncdData["memo"] : null;
6206                $memoData = date("Y/m/d");
6207                $newMemo = "{$memoData}\n ニックネーム変更\n・旧：{$oldNickName}\n・新：{$postData["nickname"]}\n{$oldMemo}";
6208                $newDate = $curDate;
6209                $dateWithTimeZone = date( 'Y/m/d H:i', strtotime($curDate) + $timeDiffSecond );
6210                $this->User->validate['nickname'] = array();
6211                $this->User->read(array('nickname','nickname_change_date'),$userId);
6212                $this->User->set(array(
6213                        "nickname" => ($this->studySapuriId ? '[Study Sapuri ENGLISH] '.$postData["nickname"] : $postData["nickname"]),
6214                        "nickname_change_date" => $newDate,
6215                        "memo" => $newMemo,
6216                    )
6217                );
6218
6219                if ($this->User->save()) {
6220                    $result["result"] = 1;
6221                    $result["new_nickname"] = $postData["nickname"];
6222                    $result["nickname_change_date"] = $dateWithTimeZone;
6223                }
6224            }
6225        }
6226        return json_encode($result);
6227    }
6228/**
6229     * @api {post} /account/change-nickname ChangeNicknameAjax
6230     * @apiName changeNicknameAjax
6231     * @apiGroup Account
6232     * 
6233     * @apiSuccessExample {json} Success-Response:
6234     *  HTTP/1.1 200 OK
6235     *  {
6236     *    "result": 1,
6237     *    "change_available": "change_available",
6238     *    "next_nickname_change_date": "2024/10/16 12:30"
6239     *  }
6240     *
6241     * @apiErrorExample {json} Error-Response:
6242     *  HTTP/1.1 200 OK
6243     *  {
6244     *    "result": 0
6245     *  }
6246     */
6247    public function changeNicknameAjax(){
6248        $this->layout = false;
6249        $this->autoRender = false;
6250        $result = array("result" => 0);
6251
6252        if ( $this->request->is('ajax') ) {
6253            $changeAvailable = 0;
6254            $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
6255            $getData = $this->User->find("first",array(
6256                    "conditions" => array("User.id" => $userId),
6257                    "fields" => array(
6258                        "User.nickname_change_date",
6259                        "User.timezone_id"
6260                    ),
6261                    "recursive" => -1
6262                )
6263            );
6264            if ($getData) {
6265                $result["result"] = 1;
6266                $userNickNameChangeData = $this->userNickNameChangeData();
6267                $result["change_available"] = $userNickNameChangeData["change_available"];
6268                $result["next_nickname_change_date"] = $userNickNameChangeData["next_nickname_change_date"];
6269            }
6270
6271        }
6272        return json_encode($result);
6273    }
6274    private function userNickNameChangeData(){
6275        $result = array();
6276        $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
6277        if ($userData) {
6278            $dateOri = $dateWithTimeZone = null;
6279            $userTimeDiffSecond = 0;
6280            $user = new UserTable($userData["User"]);
6281            $currDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
6282            $nextChangeNicknameDate = $user->nextChangeNicknameDate();
6283            $ncnDate = $nextChangeNicknameDate ? date( 'Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($nextChangeNicknameDate) ) : null;
6284
6285            if ($ncnDate) {
6286                $userTimeDiff = $this->Timezone->getTimeDiff(
6287                    array(
6288                        'id' => $user->timezone_id
6289                    )
6290                );
6291                //compute to seconds
6292                $userTimeDiffSecond = $userTimeDiff * 60;
6293                $dateWithTimeZone = date( 'Y/m/d H:i', strtotime($nextChangeNicknameDate) + $userTimeDiffSecond );
6294            }
6295
6296            if (!$ncnDate) {
6297                $changeAvailable = 1;
6298            } elseif ( $nextChangeNicknameDate > $currDate ) {
6299                $changeAvailable = 0;
6300                $dateOri = $ncnDate;
6301            } else {
6302                $changeAvailable = 1;
6303                $dateOri = $ncnDate;
6304            }
6305
6306            $result["change_available"] = $changeAvailable;
6307            $result["next_nickname_change_date"] = $dateWithTimeZone;
6308            $result["original_next_nickname_change_date"] = $dateOri;
6309            $result["time_diff_second"] = $userTimeDiffSecond;
6310            $result["old_nickname"] = $user->nickname;
6311            $result["memo"] = isset($user->memo) ? $user->memo : null;
6312        }
6313        return $result;
6314    }
6315
6316    private function setCorporateMonthlyPrice() {
6317        $userData = $this->sharedUserData['User'];
6318
6319        // corporate user
6320        if (isset($userData['corporate_id'])) {
6321            // get corporate admin payment method
6322            $corporateAdminPaymentMethod = $this->Corporate->getPaymentMethod($userData['corporate_id']);
6323            $this->set('corporateAdminPaymentMethod', $corporateAdminPaymentMethod);
6324            $this->set('corporateTypes', Configure::read('corporate_type_arr'));
6325            $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userData['payment_plan_id']);
6326            // if individual
6327            if (
6328                $corporateAdminPaymentMethod == 1 && $corpType != 4 &&
6329                isset($userData['next_charge_date']) && $userData['charge_flg']
6330            ) {
6331                // get corporate payment plan data
6332                $corporatePaymentData = $this->PaymentPlanPrice->getPaymentData(array(
6333                    'currencyCode' => $userData['currency_code'],
6334                    'paymentPlanId' => $userData['payment_plan_id']
6335                ));
6336
6337                $corporateMonthlyPayment = $corporatePaymentData ? $corporatePaymentData['amount'] : 0;
6338
6339                if ($corporateMonthlyPayment) {
6340                    $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userData['payment_plan_id']);
6341                    $cdrParam = array('corporateId' => $userData['corporate_id'], 'corporateType' => $corpType);
6342
6343                    // get corporate discount
6344                    $discount = $this->CorporateDiscountRate->getDiscount($cdrParam);
6345                    $corporateMonthlyPayment -= $discount;
6346                    $corporateMonthlyPaymentWithTax = $corporateMonthlyPayment * Configure::read('tax.increase');
6347
6348                    $this->set('corporateMonthlyPayment', myTools::formatAmount($corporateMonthlyPayment));
6349                    $this->set('corporateMonthlyPaymentWithTax', myTools::formatAmount($corporateMonthlyPaymentWithTax));
6350                }
6351            }
6352        }
6353    }
6354     /**
6355     * @apiDefine Linkage
6356     * 
6357     * @apiBody {Object} UserImage User image properties. 
6358     * @apiBody {File} UserImage.image-upload User image directory.
6359     * @apiBody {Number} User.id User unique identifier. 
6360     * @apiBody {Object} User User object(s). 
6361     * @apiBody {Date} User.UserBirthday Users date of birth. 
6362     * 
6363     * @apiSuccess {View} render Set view(s) :
6364     *             - 'view' => '/Account/account_linkage'
6365     *            - 'spView' => '/Mobile/Account/account_linkage'
6366     * 
6367     * @apiError {View} render Redirect to (/account).
6368     */
6369
6370     /**
6371     * @api {post} /account/linkage linkage()
6372     * @apiName linkage
6373     * @apiGroup Account
6374     * 
6375     * @apiUse Linkage
6376     * @apiSampleRequest off
6377     */
6378
6379     /**
6380     * @api {post} /:language/account/linkage/:socialLink linkage()
6381     * @apiName language_socialLink_linkage
6382     * @apiGroup Account
6383     * 
6384     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
6385     * @apiParam {String} socialLink User's social link.
6386     * 
6387     * @apiUse Linkage
6388     * @apiSampleRequest off
6389     */
6390    public function linkage(){
6391        $user = new UserTable($this->sharedUserData['User']);
6392        // ~block corporate and sapuri users
6393        if ($user->corporate_id || $user->studysapuri_id) {
6394            return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/account');
6395        }
6396
6397        $this->set('deviceType', myTools::getDevice());
6398
6399        $userSocialLink = myTools::getEnabledSNS($this->sharedUserData['User']);
6400        $this->set($userSocialLink);
6401        $this->set('headtext', __d('default_pc','アカウント連携'));
6402        $this->set('title_for_layout', __d('default_pc','アカウント連携 | オンライン英会話のネイティブキャンプ'));
6403        myTools::render(array(
6404            'this' => $this,
6405            'view' => '/Account/account_linkage',
6406            'spView' => '/Mobile/Account/account_linkage',
6407            'layout' => 'mobile'
6408        ));
6409    }

6411    // public function sms_questionnaire() {
6412    //     $originUrl = $this->Session->read('origin_url');
6413    //     $successUrl = $this->Session->read('success_url');
6414        
6415    //     $user = $this->Auth->user();
6416    //     if (!$user || !$originUrl || !$successUrl) {
6417    //         return $this->redirect('/');
6418    //     }
6419
6420    //     $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
6421
6422    //     $hasSmsReason = $this->User->getUserData(
6423    //         array(
6424    //             'User.id' => $userId,

6609     */

6612            $this->set('shortFooter',True);
6613        }
6614
6615        $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');

6617        //     'id' => $userId
6618        // );
6619        // $userData = $this->User->getUserData($conditions, array('next_charge_date', 'complimentary_code', 'card_company', 'timezone_id', 'currency_code', 'payment_plan_id'), 'first');
6620
6621        $userData = $this->User->findById($userId);
6622
6623        if(isset($userData['User']['timezone_id']) && !empty($userData['User']['timezone_id'])){
6624            $timezone = $userData['User']['timezone_id'];
6625        } else {
6626            $timezone = $this->getTimezoneData();
6627        }
6628
6629        $_timeDiff = $this->Timezone->getTimeDiff(
6630            array(
6631                'id' => $timezone
6632            )
6633        );
6634        $timeDiff = $_timeDiff * 60;
6635        $nextSettlementDate = '';
6636
6637
6638        # Give coins if valid user
6639        if ($userId) {
6640            $userData = $this->User->findById($userId);

6642            if (!$receiveBonus && empty($userData['User']['complimentary_code'])) {
6643                UsersPointTable::giveBonusCoins(['userId' => $userId, 'triggerNo' => 1]);
6644            }
6645        }
6646
6647        if(!empty($userData['User']['next_charge_date']) && $userData['User']['next_charge_date'] != 0) {
6648            $date = date('Y-m-d H:59', strtotime($userData['User']['next_charge_date'] . '-1 hour'));
6649        } else {
6650            $date = $this->User->getFirstNextChargeDate();
6651            if($userData['User']['card_company'] == Configure::read('card_company.zeus')) {
6652                $date = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($date . '-1 minute'));
6653            } else {
6654                $date = date('Y-m-d ', strtotime($date)) . date('H:59');
6655            }
6656        }
6657
6658        // NC-7520
6659        $isComplimentaryPlan = false;
6660        if (
6661            $userData['User']['complimentary_code']
6662            && isset($userData['User']['payment_plan_id'])
6663            && $userData['User']['payment_plan_id'] != Configure::read('payment_plans.free_trial') // except if user is registering to free trial from complimentary
6664            && $userData['User']['payment_plan_id'] != Configure::read('payment_plans.premium_plan')
6665        ) { 
6666            $ccData = $this->ComplimentaryCode->useReplica()->find('first', array(
6667            'fields' => array('available_days'),
6668            'conditions' => array('code' => $userData['User']['complimentary_code'])
6669            ));
6670
6671            if (!$ccData) {
6672                $this->log(__METHOD__.' complimentary code does not exist.' . json_encode($userData), 'card_registration');
6673                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl().'/mypage');
6674            }
6675            $availableDays = $ccData['ComplimentaryCode']['available_days'] ? $ccData['ComplimentaryCode']['available_days'] - 1 : 0;
6676            $date = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+'.$availableDays.' days'));
6677            $isComplimentaryPlan = true;
6678        }
6679
6680        if (!empty($userData['User']['complimentary_code'])
6681            && isset($userData['User']['payment_plan_id'])
6682            && $this->Session->read('complimentaryToPlan')) {
6683            $this->Session->delete('complimentaryToPlan');
6684            $isComplimentaryPlan = true;

6686
6687        // convert to user time
6688        $userDate = TimezoneTable::computeTimeToUser(array(
6689            'time' => strtotime($date),
6690            'timestamp' => $timeDiff,
6691            'format' => 'Y-m-d H:i:s'
6692        ));

6695

6698
6699        $weekdate = date('w', strtotime($userDate));
6700        if ($userData['User']['complimentary_code']) {
6701            $time = date('23:59', strtotime($userDate));
6702        } else {
6703            $time = date('H:i', strtotime($userDate));
6704        }
6705
6706        $this->loadModel('PaymentPlanPrice');
6707        $monthlyPrice = $this->PaymentPlanPrice->getMonthlyPrice(array(
6708            'currencyCode' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
6709            'paymentPlanId' => Configure::read('payment_plans.premium_plan'),
6710            'numberFormatFlg' => true
6711        ));
6712        
6713        $nextSettlementDate = date(__d('account','Y年m月d日'), strtotime($userDate));
6714
6715        if (!$this->globalLanguage) {
6716            $week = array(__dx('account','week',"日"), __dx('account','week',"月"), __dx('account','week',"火"), __dx('account','week',"水"), __dx('account','week',"木"), __dx('account','week',"金"), __dx('account','week',"土"));

6727

6812    public function native_plan() {

6821            $isCashBackCampaign = true;
6822        } else {
6823            $isCashBackCampaign = false;
6824        }
6825
6826        // get user annual discount option
6827        $annualDiscountOptionData = $this->UserDiscountOptionsTerm->getTerm([
6828            'user_id' => $userId,
6829            'discount_option_id' => Configure::read('discount_option.annual.plan_id'),
6830            'status' => 1
6831        ]);
6832

6839                'user_id' => $userId,

6848        $num1 = str_replace(',', '', $monthly_price);
6849        $num2 = str_replace(',', '', $amount);
6850        $total = $num1 + $num2;
6851        $formatTotal = 0;
6852        if (!empty(strpos($total, "."))) {
6853            $formatTotal = number_format($total, 2);
6854        } else {
6855            $formatTotal = number_format($total);
6856        }
6857
6858
6859           //  ----------- NJ-23812 : start support for automatic charge native option
6860            $userDataTable = new UserTable($this->sharedUserData['User']);
6861                $ifFreeTrialUser = (in_array($userDataTable->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(2, 14))) ? true : false;
6862                $logFileName = 'native_option_debug';
6863            $initialAmount = 0;
6864            $nativeOptionName = '';
6865            $currencySymbol = '';
6866
6867            // - unli option
6868            $request_data = $this->request->query;
6869            $unli_option_type = isset($request_data['unli_option']) ? $request_data['unli_option'] : Configure::read('native_speaker.options.all_you_can_eat');
6870
6871            $this->checkIfUserValidForNativeOption($unli_option_type);
6872
6873        
6874            // - for native unli option
6875            if($unli_option_type == Configure::read('native_speaker.options.all_you_can_eat')) {
6876                if (time() < strtotime(Configure::read('native_option_cashback_campaign.period.end'))) {
6877                    $isCashBackCampaign = true;
6878                } else {    
6879                    $isCashBackCampaign = false;
6880                }
6881                $getNativeOptionPaymentCharge = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionPaymentCharge(
6882                    array(
6883                        'daily_calculation' => true,
6884                        'half_price' => $isCashBackCampaign,
6885                        'user_id' => $userDataTable->id,
6886                        'option_type' => Configure::read('native_speaker.options.all_you_can_eat'),
6887                        'annualDiscountOptionAmount' => $annualDiscountOptionAmount
6888                    )    
6889                );
6890

6892                    // redirect to error page if native option is not available
6893                    if (!$this->User->ifNativeOptionAvailable($getNativeOptionPaymentCharge['native_option_data']['limit'])) {
6894                        $this->log(__METHOD__ . ' native option limit exceeded.', $logFileName);
6895                        return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/option/start_disabled');
6896                    }
6897                    $this->set('nativeOptionPaymentChargeData', $getNativeOptionPaymentCharge);
6898                } else {
6899                    return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/option/start_disabled?reason=2');
6900                }
6901
6902                $initialAmount = $getNativeOptionPaymentCharge['native_option_data']['initial_amount'];
6903            }
6904

6906            if($unli_option_type == Configure::read('callan_unlimited.options.callan_unlimited_option')) {

6913                    )

7046
7047        $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
7048        if ($userId) {
7049            $userData = $this->User->findById($userId);
7050            $receiveBonus = UsersPointTable::checkIfUserReceiveBonusUponRegister($userId);

7052                UsersPointTable::giveBonusCoins(['userId' => $userId, 'triggerNo' => 1]);
7053            }
7054

7057            ));

7060                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/account/complete');
7061            }
7062        } else {
7063            return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/mypage');
7064        }

7072

7074                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/mypage');
7075            }
7076            if ($this->request->is('post')) {
7077                $post = $this->request->data['User'];

7079                $jsonQuestReason = array();
7080                $errors = array();

7082                $q1Text = isset($post['quest_trigger_text'])? trim($post['quest_trigger_text']) : "";
7083                $q2Text = isset($post['quest_reason_text'])? trim($post['quest_reason_text']) : "";

7085

7087
7088                if (empty($qOccupation) && $qOccupation != '0') { //for occupation validation
7089                    $errors['q4'] = "どれか１つ選択してください。";
7090                }
7091
7092                if (empty($q1)) {
7093                    $errors['q1'] = "どれか１つ選択してください。";
7094                } else {
7095                    if ($q1 == 8 && empty($q1Text)) {
7096                        $errors['q1'] = "その他」を選択された場合はコメントを入力してください。";
7097                    }
7098                }
7099
7100                for ($i = 1; $i<=6; $i++) {

7102                        $noSelected++;
7103                    } else {
7104                        $jsonQuestReason[] = $post['quest_reason'.$i];
7105                    }
7106                }
7107                $this->Session->write('quest_reason_choices', $jsonQuestReason);
7108
7109                if ($noSelected == 6) {
7110                    $errors['q2'] = "どれか１つ以上選択してください。";
7111                } else {
7112                    if (isset($post['quest_reason6']) && !empty($post['quest_reason6']) && $q2Text == null) {
7113                        $errors['q2'] = "その他」を選択された場合はコメントを入力してください。";
7114                    }

7119                    'quest_trigger' => $q1,
7120                    'quest_trigger_text' => $q1Text,
7121                );

7124                    'user_id' => $userId,
7125                    'source' => $q1,
7126                    'source_other' => strip_tags($q1Text),
7127                    'reason' => json_encode($jsonQuestReason),
7128                    'reason_other' => strip_tags($q2Text),

7283                        $this->redirect('/account/complete');
7284                    }
7285                    $browser = $this->request->header('User-Agent');
7286                    if(!preg_match('/(Chrome|Firefox)/i',$browser) || preg_match('/Edge/i',$browser)){
7287                        $this->redirect('/browser-install');
7288                    }
7289
7290                    $this->Session->delete('payment_credit_register_complete');
7291                      $this->Cookie->delete('rt_ck');
7292                    return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/account/complete');
7293                }
7294            }
7295            //set hash16
7296            $this->set('hash16', $user['hash16']);
7297        }
7298        myTools::render(array(
7299            'this' => $this,
7300            'forceMobile' => $forceMobile,
7301            'spView' => '/Mobile/Register/questionnaire',
7302            'layout' => 'mobile'
7303        ));
7304    }

7332     *

7334     * @apiSampleRequest off
7335     */
7336    public function complete() {
7337        $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
7338        if(!$userId){
7339            return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl());
7340        }
7341
7342        $userData = $this->User->find('first', array('conditions' => array('User.id' => $userId)));
7343
7344        // Get user point
7345        $authBonusCoins = UsersPointTable::getPoint($userId);
7346
7347        // Get user point if campaign master
7348        $bcCount = $this->CoinBox->getCoins($userId);
7349        $cmNotExpired = false;
7350        if (!empty($userData['User']['campaign_id'])) {
7351            $cmNotExpired = $this->CampaignMaster->checkCampaignCodeDate($userData['User']['campaign_id']);
7352        }
7353
7354        if ($bcCount > 0 || $cmNotExpired) {
7355            $authBonusCoins = $bcCount;
7356        }
7357
7358        // Get info complimentary code
7359        $codeInfo = $this->ComplimentaryCode->useReplica()->find('first', array(
7360            'fields' => array('template_type'),
7361            'conditions' => array('code' => $userData['User']['complimentary_code'])
7362        ));
7363        
7364        // Set bonus coin = 500 when exist complimentary code.
7365        if ($userData['User']['payment_plan_id'] != Configure::read('payment_plans.complimentary_plan') && isset($codeInfo) && $userData['User']['complimentary_code']) {
7366            if ($codeInfo['ComplimentaryCode']['template_type'] == 0) {
7367                $authBonusCoins = 500;
7368            } else if($codeInfo['ComplimentaryCode']['template_type'] == 2){
7369                $authBonusCoins = $codeInfo['ComplimentaryCode']['coin_award'];
7370            }
7371        }
7372
7373
7374        // NJ-23812 : start support , redirect  to account and show modal
7375        $checkShowWelcomeModal = $this->Session->read('show_welcome_back_modal');
7376
7377        // - re write session
7378        if ($checkShowWelcomeModal) {
7379            $this->Session->delete('show_welcome_back_modal');// - delete session 
7380
7381            // - over ride the session details
7382            $sessionParams = array(
7383                'result' => true,
7384                'auth_bonus_coin' => $authBonusCoins,
7385                'is_register_card' => true
7386            );
7387
7388            $this->Session->write('show_welcome_back_modal',$sessionParams);
7389
7390            // - redirect to account
7391            return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/user/account');
7392        }
7393        // - NJ-23812 : end support
7394    
7395        $this->set('authBonusCoins',  $authBonusCoins);
7396        $this->render('/Account/account_complete');
7397
7398        //set view
7399        $renderParam = array(
7400            'forceMobile' => true,
7401            'this' => $this,
7402            'spView' => '/Mobile/Account/complete',
7403            'layout' => 'mobile'
7404        );
7405
7406        //mobile
7407        myTools::render($renderParam);
7408    }
