7628    //NJ-14905 Set Corporate Contract Period Information
7629    private function setCorporateContractPeriod() {
7630        $userObj = new UserTable($this->sharedUserData['User']);
7631        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('corporate_company_payments'))) {
7632            $contractPeriod = $this->User->getCorporateDeactivationInfo(array('user_id' => $userObj->id));
7633            $contractStart = null;
7634            $contractEnd = null;
7635
7636            if ($contractPeriod) {
7637                $contractStart = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($contractPeriod['User']['first_charge_date']) + $this->timeDiffSecond);
7638                $contractEnd = date('Y-m-d', strtotime($contractPeriod['CorporateScheduledDeactivation']['deactivation_date']));
7639                $contractEnd = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($contractEnd. ' 04:59') + $this->timeDiffSecond);
7640            }
7641
7642            $this->set('contractPeriod', $contractPeriod);
7643            $this->set('contractStart', $contractStart);
7644            $this->set('contractEnd', $contractEnd);
7645        }
7646        
7647        $shownextChargeDate = true;
7648        //Hide Next Settlement/Charge Date Info if Contract Information is shown
7649        if (
7650            (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('corporate_company_failed_settlement'))) || 
7651            (isset($contractPeriod) && $contractPeriod)
7652        ) {
7653            $shownextChargeDate = false;
7654        }
7655
7656        $this->set('shownextChargeDate', $shownextChargeDate);
7657    }
7658
7659    // NJ-23812 : copy from option controller to check if valid option
7660    /**
7661     * @api{get} /account/checkIfUserValidForNativeOption  CheckIfUserValidForNativeOption
7662     * @apiName CheckIfUserValidForNativeOption
7663     * @apiGroup Account
7664     * 
7665     * @apiSuccess {View} redirect_url The URL to redirect to (/option/start_disabled?reason=2).
7666     * 
7667     * @apiError {View} getMembershipTypeIndex The URL to redirect to (/option/start_disabled?reason=' . $reason . '&type=2).
7668     * 
7669     * @apiSampleRequest off
7670     *
7671     */
7672    public function checkIfUserValidForNativeOption ($option_type = null) {
7673        $userData = new UserTable($this->sharedUserData['User']);
7674
7675        $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userData->payment_plan_id);
7676
7677        // if user membership type is invalid
7678        if (!in_array($userData->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('callan_unlimited.valid_memberships'))) {
7679            $reason = 2;
7680            if (isset($corpType)) {
7681                // light or limited
7682                if (in_array($corpType, array(3,4))) {
7683                    $reason = 4;
7684                } else {
7685                    $reason = 3;
7686                }
7687            }
7688
7689            if (in_array($userData->payment_plan_id, Configure::read('lite_payment_plans'))) {
7690                # allow the light payment plan but display modal
7691            }else{
7692                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/option/start_disabled?reason=' . $reason . '&type=2');
7693            }
7694        }
7695
7696        // if user membership type is invalid
7697        if (!in_array($userData->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('native_speaker.valid_memberships'))) {
7698            $reason = 2;
7699            if (isset($corpType)) {
7700                // light or limited
7701                if (in_array($corpType, array(3,4))) {
7702                    $reason = 4;
7703                } else {
7704                    $reason = 3;
7705                }
7706            }
7707
7708            if (in_array($userData->payment_plan_id, Configure::read('lite_payment_plans'))) {
7709                # allow the light payment plan but display modal
7710            }else{
7711                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/option/start_disabled?reason=' . $reason . '&type=1');
7712            }
7713        }
7714
7715        // if user is family plan or free
7716        if (in_array($userData->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(8, 14))){
7717            if (!$this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseNativeOption($userData->id)) {
7718                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . '/option/start_disabled?reason=2');
7719            }
7720        }
7721    }
7722    /**
7723     * @api{get} /account/sp_contract_information SPContractInformation
7724     * @apiName GetContractInformation
7725     * @apiGroup Account
7726     * 
7727     * @apiSuccess {View} headtext Set page heading text, localized as "ご契約情報".
7728      * @apiSuccess {View} title_for_layout Set page title, localized as "ご契約情報 | オンライン英会話のネイティブキャンプ".
7729      * @apiSuccess {View} data Set user's contract information data.
7730      * @apiSuccess {View} data.User Set user object containing user-specific contract details.
7731      * @apiSuccess {View} nextChargeDate Set next scheduled charge date for the user, if applicable.
7732      * @apiSuccess {View} callanOptionManageFlg Set flag indicating if the user can manage the Callan option.
7733      * @apiSuccess {View} callanOptionFlg Set if the Callan option is currently active for the user.
7734      * @apiSuccess {View} callanOptionData Set details for the Callan option, including price and subscription status.
7735      * @apiSuccess {View} nativeOptionManageFlg Set flag indicating if the user can manage the native speaker option.
7736      * @apiSuccess {View} nativeOptionFlg Set if the native speaker option is currently active for the user.
7737      * @apiSuccess {View} nativeOptionData Set details for the native speaker option, including price and subscription status.
7738     * @apiSuccess {View} render Set redirect page to (/Mobile/Account/contract_information_2).
7739     * @apiSampleRequest off
7740     */
7741    public function sp_contract_information() {
7742        
7743        $this->layout = "mobile";
7744        $this->set('headtext', __d('default_pc','ご契約情報'));
7745        $this->set('title_for_layout', __d('default_pc','ご契約情報 | オンライン英会話のネイティブキャンプ'));
7746
7747        $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
7748
7749        //get the data of the login user
7750        $userData = $this->sharedUserData;
7751
7752        //get the updated data of the login user
7753        $this->User->unbindModel(array(
7754            'hasOne' => array('UsersCourse'),
7755            'hasMany' => array('LessonSchedule')
7756        ));
7757        $data = $this->User->findById($userId);
7758        $this->set('data',$data);
7759        # set next charge date
7760        $nextChargeDate = NULL;
7761        if (
7762            !is_null($data["User"]["next_charge_date"])
7763            && $data["User"]["charge_flg"] == 1
7764            && $data["User"]["fail_flg"] == 0
7765            && $data["User"]["admin_flg"] == 0
7766        ) {
7767            $nextChargeDate = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime($data["User"]["next_charge_date"]) + $this->timeDiffSecond);
7768        }
7769        $userObj = new UserTable($this->sharedUserData['User']);
7770
7771        $corpType = myTools::getCoporateTypeUsingPaymentPlanId($userObj->payment_plan_id);
7772
7773        //NC-8704 Native option plan
7774        $nativeOptionManageFlg = false;
7775        $showNativeOptionUrl = true;
7776        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('native_speaker.valid_memberships'))){
7777            //If user is family plan paid or free
7778            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(8, 14))){
7779                if ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseNativeOption($userObj->id)) {
7780                    $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
7781                }
7782            } else {
7783                $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
7784            }
7785        } elseif (isset($corpType) && in_array($corpType , array(1,2))) {
7786            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array_merge(Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_allowed_user'), Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_fail_users')))){
7787                $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
7788            } else {
7789                $showNativeOptionUrl = false;
7790                if ($userObj->charge_flg) {
7791                    $nativeOptionManageFlg = true;
7792                }
7793            }
7794        }
7795
7796        // - callan option manage flag
7797        $callanOptionManageFlg = false;
7798        if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), Configure::read('callan_unlimited.valid_memberships'))){
7799            //If user is family plan paid or free
7800            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array(8, 14))){
7801                if ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseCallanOption($userObj->id)) {
7802                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
7803                } elseif ($this->FamilyPlanList->canPurchaseNativeOption($userObj->id)) {
7804                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
7805                }
7806            } else {
7807                $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
7808            }
7809        } elseif (isset($corpType) && in_array($corpType , array(1,2))) {
7810            if (in_array($userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex(), array_merge(Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_allowed_user'), Configure::read('corporate_company_payment.native_option_fail_users')))){
7811                $showNativeOptionUrl = true;
7812            } else {
7813                $showNativeOptionUrl = false;
7814                if ($userObj->charge_flg) {
7815                    $callanOptionManageFlg = true;
7816                }    
7817            }
7818        }
7819
7820        if ($callanOptionManageFlg) {
7821            $callanOptionData = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionData(array(
7822                'user_currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
7823                'option_id' => Configure::read('callan_unlimited.options.callan_unlimited_option')
7824            ));
7825            $this->set('callanOptionManageFlg', $callanOptionManageFlg);
7826            $this->set('callanOptionFlg', $userData['User']['callan_option']);
7827            $this->set('callanOptionData', ($callanOptionData) ? $callanOptionData : array());
7828        }
7829
7830        if ($nativeOptionManageFlg) {
7831            $nativeOptionData = $this->NativeOption->getNativeOptionData(array(
7832                'user_currency_code' => $userData['User']['currency_code'],
7833                'option_id' => Configure::read('native_speaker.options.all_you_can_eat')
7834            ));
7835            $this->set('nativeOptionManageFlg', $nativeOptionManageFlg);
7836            $this->set('nativeOptionFlg', $userData['User']['native_option']);
7837            $this->set('nativeOptionData', ($nativeOptionData) ? $nativeOptionData : array());
7838        }
7839        //TODO:: fetch a single corporate data related to the user's corporate ID to retrieve the student_email_flg
7840        $this->Corporate->openDBReplica();
7841        $corporateData = $this->Corporate->find('first', array(
7842            'fields' => array(
7843                'Corporate.student_email_setting_flg'
7844                ),
7845            'conditions' => array(
7846                'Corporate.id' => $data['User']['corporate_id']
7847                ),
7848            'recursive' => 1
7849        ));
7850        $this->Corporate->closeDBReplica();
7851        $this->set('studentEmailSettingFlg', ($corporateData ? $corporateData['Corporate']['student_email_setting_flg'] : 1));
7852        $this->set('nextChargeDate', $nextChargeDate);
7853        $this->render('/Mobile/Account/contract_information_2');
7854    }
7855    /**
7856     * @api {post} /user/sp_change_email SPChangeEmail
7857     * @apiName ChangeEmail
7858     * @apiGroup Account
7859     * 
7860     * @apiQuery {String} referrer User's referrer.
7861     * 
7862     * @apiBody {String} UserEmail User's email address.
7863     * @apiBody {Number} User.id User's unique identifier.
7864     * @apiBody {String} User User's email. 
7865     * 
7866     * @apiError {String} ValidationError Error message if data invalid.
7867     * @apiSampleRequest off
7868     */
7869    public function sp_change_email() {
7870        $this->layout = "mobile";
7871        $this->action = 'sp_change_email';
7872        $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
7873        $error = false;
7874        
7875        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
7876
7877            if (isset($this->request->data['UserEmail'])) {
7878                $this->request->data['User'] = $this->request->data['UserEmail'];
7879                $this->request->data['User']['id'] = $userId;
7880                $this->User->set($this->request->data);
7881
7882                $user = $this->request->data['User'];
7883                $user_new_email = $user['email'];
7884
7885                if (UserTable::checkEmail($user_new_email, $userId)) {
7886                    $this->User->invalidate('email', __d('validate','入力されたメールアドレスは使用できません。'));
7887                }
7888                if($this->User->validates()){
7889                    $this->User->save();
7890
7891                    $this->HeyNCUser->openDBReplica();
7892                    $checkUserExist = $this->HeyNCUser->find('first', array(
7893                        'fields' => array('HeyNCUser.email', 'HeyNCUser.id'),
7894                        'conditions' => array('HeyNCUser.ncuser_id' => $userId),
7895                        'recursive' => -1
7896                    ));
7897                    $this->HeyNCUser->closeDBReplica();
7898
7899                    $heyncUserData = array(
7900                        'ncuser_id' => $userId,
7901                        'email' => $user_new_email
7902                    );
7903
7904                    if($checkUserExist) {
7905                        $this->HeyNCUser->updateData($heyncUserData, $checkUserExist['HeyNCUser']['id']);
7906                    }
7907
7908                    $referrer = $this->request->query['referrer'];
7909                    $default_path = '/account/sp_contract_information';
7910
7911                    if (isset($referrer) && $referrer == 'account') {
7912                        $default_path = '/account';
7913                    }
7914
7915                    return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . $default_path);
7916                } else {
7917                    $errors = myError::validation($this->User->validationErrors);
7918                    $error = __($errors[0]);
7919                }
7920            }
7921        }
7922
7923        $id = $this->Auth->user('id');
7924        $data = $this->User->findById($id);
7925        $user = new UserTable($data['User']);
7926        
7927        $this->set('user',$user);
7928        $this->set('error', $error);
7929        $this->render('/Mobile/Account/change_email');
7930    }
7931    /**
7932     * @api {post} /user/sp_change_pass ChangePassword
7933     * @apiName ChangePassword
7934     * @apiGroup Account
7935     * 
7936     * @apiQuery {String} referrer User's referrer.
7937     * @apiBody {String} UserPassword User password data.
7938     * @apiBody {String} UserPassword.password Current password.
7939     * @apiBody {String} UserPassword.password_new New password.
7940     * @apiBody {String} User.id User's unique identifier.
7941     * 
7942     * @apiSuccess {String} headtext Password changed successfully.
7943     * 
7944     * @apiError {String} error Error message if the current password is incorrect or if validation fails.
7945     * @apiSampleRequest off
7946     */
7947    public function sp_change_pass() {
7948        
7949        $this->layout = "mobile";
7950        $this->action = 'sp_change_password';
7951        $this->set('headtext', __d('default_pc','パスワード変更'));
7952
7953        $userId = $this->Auth->user('id');
7954
7955        $error = false;
7956        if ($this->request->is('post')) {
7957            $this->request->data['User'] = $this->request->data['UserPassword'];
7958            $this->request->data['User']['id'] = $userId;
7959            $this->User->set($this->request->data);
7960            unset($this->User->validate['password']);
7961            unset($this->User->validate['password_confirm']);
7962            $current = AuthComponent::password($this->request->data['User']['password']);
7963            $this->User->openDBReplica();
7964            $userData = $this->User->find('first', array(
7965                'fields' => [
7966                    'User.id',
7967                    'UsersExtend.id',
7968                    'UsersExtend.temporary_pw_flg',
7969                    'CorporateActivationManagement.id',
7970                    'CorporateActivationManagement.temporary_pw_flg'
7971                ],
7972                'joins' => [
7973                    [
7974                        'table' => 'users_extend',
7975                        'alias' => 'UsersExtend',
7976                        'type' => 'LEFT',
7977                        'conditions' => 'UsersExtend.user_id = User.id'
7978                    ],
7979                    [
7980                        'table' => 'corporate_activation_managements',
7981                        'alias' => 'CorporateActivationManagement',
7982                        'type'    => 'LEFT',
7983                        'conditions'    => 'User.id = CorporateActivationManagement.user_id'
7984                    ],
7985                ],
7986                'conditions' => array(
7987                    'User.id' => $userId,
7988                    'User.password' => $current
7989                )
7990            ));
7991            $this->User->closeDBReplica();
7992
7993            if (!$userData) {
7994                $this->User->invalidate('password',__d('validate','現在のパスワードが正しくありません。'));
7995            }
7996            if ($this->User->validates()) {
7997                $this->User->validate = array();
7998                $this->User->read(null, $userId);
7999                $new = AuthComponent::password($this->request->data['User']['password_new']);
8000                $this->User->set('password', $new);
8001                $this->User->save();
8002                $referrer = $this->request->query['referrer'];
8003                $default_path = '/account/change-pass/complete';
8004
8005                if(isset($userData['UsersExtend']) && isset($userData['UsersExtend']['id'])) {
8006                    // set temporary password flag to 0
8007                    $this->loadModel('UsersExtend');
8008                    $this->UsersExtend->clear();
8009                    $this->UsersExtend->read(['temporary_pw', 'temporary_pw_flg'], $userData['UsersExtend']['id']);
8010                    $this->UsersExtend->set(['temporary_pw_flg' => 0]);
8011                    $this->UsersExtend->save();
8012                    return $this->redirect('/account/change-pass/complete');
8013                }
8014
8015                if(isset($userData['CorporateActivationManagement']) && isset($userData['CorporateActivationManagement']['id'])) {
8016                    // set temporary password flag to 0
8017                    $this->loadModel('CorporateActivationManagement');
8018                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->clear();
8019                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->read(['temporary_pw_flg'], $userData['CorporateActivationManagement']['id']);
8020                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->set(['temporary_pw_flg' => 0]);
8021                    $this->CorporateActivationManagement->save();
8022                    return $this->redirect('/account/change-pass/complete');
8023                }
8024                
8025                if (isset($referrer) && $referrer == 'account') {
8026                    $default_path = '/account';
8027                }
8028
8029                return $this->redirect(myTools::getUrl() . $default_path);
8030            } else {
8031                $error = $this->User->validationErrors;
8032            }
8033        }
8034
8035        $this->set('error', $error);
8036        $this->render('/Mobile/Account/change_pass');
8037    }
8038    /**
8039     * @apiDefine ContractInformation
8040     * 
8041     * @apiSuccess {View} liteMonthlyPrice Set lite monthly price value.
8042     * @apiSuccess {View} liteMonthylyPriceNoTax Set lite monthly price no tax value.
8043     * @apiSuccess {View} monthlyPrice Set monthly price value.
8044     * @apiSuccess {View} monthylyPriceNoTax Set monthly price no tax value.
8045     * @apiSuccess {View} chocottoMonthlyPrice Set chocotto monthly price value.
8046     * @apiSuccess {View} chocottoMonthlyPriceNoTax Set chocotto monthly price no tax value.
8047     * @apiSuccess {View} currentPlanID Set current plan id value.
8048     * @apiSuccess {View} userCurrentPlanText Set user current plan text value.
8049     * @apiSuccess {View} formType Set form type value.
8050     * @apiSuccess {View} apiToken Set token value.
8051     * @apiSuccess {View} userID Set user's unique identifier value.
8052     * @apiSuccess {View} monthlyPriceSymbol Set monthly price symbol value.
8053     * @apiSuccess {View} planBefore Set plan before value.
8054     * @apiSuccess {View} planAfter Set plan after value.
8055     * @apiSuccess {View} annualDiscountOptionInUse Set annual dicsount option value.
8056     * @apiSuccess {View} annualDiscountOptionAmount Set annoual discount option amount value.
8057     * @apiSuccess {View} monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscount Set monthly price annual discount value.
8058     * @apiSuccess {View} monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscountNoTax Set monthly price annual discount no tax value.
8059     * @apiSuccess {View} headtext Set header text value.
8060     * @apiSuccess {View} title_for_layout Set title layout value.
8061     * @apiSuccess {View} render Set render page url ('view' => '/Account/contract_information',
8062     *        'spView' => '/Mobile/Account/contract_information')
8063     * 
8064     * @apiError {View} UserNotValid Set redirect url to (/).
8065     */
8066
8067     /**
8068     * @api {get} /account/contract_information contract_information()
8069     * @apiName contract_information
8070     * @apiGroup Account
8071     * 
8072     * @apiUse ContractInformation
8073     * @apiSampleRequest off
8074     */
8075
8076     /**
8077     * @api {get} /:language/account/contract_information contract_information()
8078     * @apiName language_contract_information
8079     * @apiGroup Account
8080     * 
8081     * @apiParam {String} language User's default language.
8082     * 
8083     * @apiUse ContractInformation
8084     * @apiSampleRequest off
8085     */
8086    public function contract_information(){
8087        $user = $this->sharedUserData['User'];
8088        $membershipTypes = UserTable::getEngMembershipTypeData();
8089        $userObj = new UserTable($user);
8090        $membership = $userObj->getMembershipTypeIndex();
8091        $compTempType = $userObj->complimentary_code ? $this->ComplimentaryCode->getTemplateType($userObj->complimentary_code) : null;
8092
8093        if (!$user) {
8094            return $this->redirect('/');
8095        } elseif (in_array($membership, Configure::read('membership_type_credit_retry'))) {
8096            return $this->redirect('/payment/payment_credit_retry');
8097        } elseif (
8098            $membership == Configure::read('membership_type_plan_free') ||
8099            (isset($compTempType) && $compTempType == 1) // if complimentary plan and template type is not equal to free
8100        ) {
8101            return $this->redirect('/payment/payment_credit_charge');
8102        } elseif (
8103            $membership == 13 ||
8104            (isset($compTempType) && $compTempType != 1) // if complimentary plan and template type is equal to free
8105        ) {
8106            return $this->redirect('/payment/payment_credit_register');
8107        }
8108
8109        // - set user current plan
8110        $currentPlanID = $user['payment_plan_id'];
8111
8112        $premUserArr = array(
8113            Configure::read('payment_plans.free_trial'),
8114            Configure::read('payment_plans.premium_plan')
8115        );
8116
8117        $isPremiumser = ( in_array((int) $currentPlanID , $premUserArr)) ? true : false;
8118        $isLitePlanUser = (in_array((int) $currentPlanID, Configure::read('lite_payment_plans'))) ? true : false;
8119
8120        $userCurrentPlanText = ($isPremiumser) ? 'prem_user' : (($isLitePlanUser) ? 'lite_plan' : '' );
8121
8122        #lite plan data 
8123        $litePlanData = $this->PaymentPlanPrice->getPaymentData(array(
8124            'currencyCode' => $user['currency_code'],
8125            'paymentPlanId' => Configure::read('payment_plans.light_plan'),
8126            'logFileName' => 'card_reregister'
8127        ));
8128
8129        #premium plan data 
8130        $premiumPlanData = $this->PaymentPlanPrice->getPaymentData(array(
8131            'currencyCode' => $user['currency_code'],
8132            'paymentPlanId' => Configure::read('payment_plans.premium_plan'),
8133            'logFileName' => $logFileName ?? 'card_reregister'
8134        ));
8135
8136        #chocotto plan data
8137        $chocottoPlanData = $this->PaymentPlanPrice->getPaymentData(array(
8138            'currencyCode' => $user['currency_code'],
8139            'paymentPlanId' => Configure::read('payment_plans.chocotto_plan'),
8140            'logFileName' => $logFileName ?? 'card_reregister'
8141        ));
8142
8143        #family plan data
8144        $familyPlanData = $this->PaymentPlanPrice->getPaymentData(array(
8145            'currencyCode' => $user['currency_code'],
8146            'paymentPlanId' => Configure::read('payment_plans.family_plan'),
8147            'logFileName' => $logFileName ?? 'card_reregister'
8148        ));
8149
8150        // - check plan description
8151        $monthlyPriceSymbol =  myTools::getCurrencySymbol($userObj->currency_code);
8152        // - set view  for lite payment plan
8153        $this->set('liteMonthlyPrice', $litePlanData['fAmount']);
8154        $this->set('liteMonthylyPriceNoTax', myTools::formatAmount($litePlanData['amountConstTaxDeducted']));
8155
8156        $this->set('monthlyPrice',$premiumPlanData['fAmount']);
8157        $this->set('monthylyPriceNoTax', myTools::formatAmount($premiumPlanData['amountConstTaxDeducted']));
8158
8159        $this->set('chocottoMonthlyPrice',$chocottoPlanData['fAmount']);
8160        $this->set('chocottoMonthlyPriceNoTax', myTools::formatAmount($chocottoPlanData['amountConstTaxDeducted']));
8161
8162        $this->set('familyMonthlyPrice',$familyPlanData['fAmount']);
8163        $this->set('familyMonthlyPriceNoTax', myTools::formatAmount($familyPlanData['amountConstTaxDeducted']));
8164
8165        $this->set('currentPlanID',$currentPlanID);
8166        $this->set('userCurrentPlanText',$userCurrentPlanText);
8167        $this->set('formType',Configure::read('payment_credit_change'));
8168        $this->set('apiToken',$user['api_token']);
8169        $this->set('userID',$user['id']);
8170
8171        $this->set('monthlyPriceSymbol', $monthlyPriceSymbol);
8172
8173        $liteMemTypePaid = Configure::read('membership_type_lightplan_paid');
8174        $planAfter = ($userCurrentPlanText == "prem_user") ? $membershipTypes[$liteMemTypePaid] : $membershipTypes[1];
8175
8176        // - set change plan description
8177        $this->set("planBefore",$membershipTypes[$membership]);
8178        $this->set("planAfter",$planAfter);
8179
8180        // get user annual discount option
8181        $annualDiscountOptionData = $this->UserDiscountOptionsTerm->getTerm([
8182            'user_id' => $userObj->id,
8183            'discount_option_id' => Configure::read('discount_option.annual.plan_id'),
8184            'status' => 1
8185        ]);
8186
8187        $annualDiscountOptionAmount = 0;
8188        $annualDiscountOptionInUse = false;
8189        if ($annualDiscountOptionData) {
8190            $annualDiscountOptionInUse = true;
8191            $annualDiscountOptionAmount =  $annualDiscountOptionData['amount'];
8192        } else {
8193            // get active annual discount option
8194            $annualDiscountOptionData = $this->DiscountOptionsPrice->getPaymentData(['currencyCode' => $userObj->currency_code, 'discountOptionId' => Configure::read('discount_option.annual.plan_id')]);
8195
8196            // - check if there is annual discount option data
8197            if ($annualDiscountOptionData) {
8198                $annualDiscountOptionAmount = $annualDiscountOptionData['amount'];
8199            }
8200        }
8201
8202        $monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscount = $premiumPlanData['amount'] - $annualDiscountOptionAmount;
8203        $monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscountNoTax = $monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscount / Configure::read('added_tax_percentage');
8204        $monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscountNoTax = round($monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscountNoTax);
8205
8206        $this->set('annualDiscountOptionInUse', $annualDiscountOptionInUse);
8207        $this->set('annualDiscountOptionAmount', myTools::formatAmount($annualDiscountOptionAmount));
8208        $this->set('monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscount', myTools::formatAmount($monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscount));
8209        $this->set('monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscountNoTax', myTools::formatAmount($monthlyPriceWithAnnualDiscountNoTax));
8210
8211        $this->set('headtext', __d('default_pc','現在のプラン'));
8212        $this->set('title_for_layout', __d('default_pc','現在のプラン'));
8213
8214        if (
8215            (isset($user) && $user['currency_code'] != Configure::read('default.user_currency')) ||
8216            $this->localizeDir != Configure::read('default.user_language')
8217        ) {
8218            myTools::render(array(
8219                'this' => $this,
8220                'view' => '/Account/overseas_contract_information',
8221                'spView' => '/Mobile/Account/overseas_contract_information',
8222                'layout' => 'mobile'
8223            ));
8224        } else {
8225            myTools::render(array(
8226                'this' => $this,
8227                'view' => '/Account/contract_information',
8228                'spView' => '/Mobile/Account/contract_information',
8229                'layout' => 'mobile'
8230            ));
8231        }
8232    }

8276    private function saveStep($userId, $stepKey) {
8277        $sp = Configure::read('registration_platforms.sp');
8278        $pc = Configure::read('registration_platforms.pc');
8279        $platformId = $this->RequestHandler->isMobile() ? $sp : $pc;
8280
8281        $saveStepParams = array(
8282            'user_id' => $userId,
8283            'step_key' => $stepKey,
8284            'platform' => $platformId,
8285            'language' => $this->localizeDir
8286        );
8287
8288        $this->UserRegistrationStatus->saveStep($saveStepParams);
8289    }
